loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric and to renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en:
Meet 32-year-old Mabinty from Tombo eastern area in Freetown. She is married with 3 children who are currently attending school.  Mabinty established her local food business. She began her business because she wants to generate income to take care of her family. She works at the business 7 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is transportation problem within her operation area.

Mabinty requires a loan in order to purchase more groundnut to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children, and increase her business. In the future, Mabinty plans to expand her business to a higher level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more groundnut to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester and biogas stove

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to provide support and maintenance for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester and biogas stove

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester and biogas stove

loans.name: Susana

texts.en: Susana is a young, enthusiastic farmer excited about implementing better farming practices. Her family's primary income comes from selling vegetables from their small plot. They are investing in a 12 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester and biogas stove in order to turn their animal waste into energy and fertilizer. They will use the methane-rich, renewable biogas produced to cook and heat bathwater, allowing Susana to decrease her propane costs and the biofertilizer produced by the system will allow her to improve crop yields while lowering her costs. She and her family will save money and reduce their farm's environmental impact. This loan represents 35% of the total cost of her Sistema Biobolsa biodigester and biogas stove.

loans.use: to purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester and biogas stove.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is 43 years old from Guindulman, Bohol. She is married with children ages 3 to 24. Her husband worked as a carpenter to support their family. She is also engaged in selling home-cooked meals and snacks. She is also into selling of beauty and health products from Personal Collection. Her business started 15 years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy soft drinks, seasoning, vegetables, meat and Personal Collection products.

In the future, she hopes to expand her business and increase business profitability for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, seasoning, vegetables, meat and Personal Collection products

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita is 51 years old from Guindulman, Bohol. She is married with 11 children ages 9 to 38. Her husband worked as a carpenter to provide for their family’s needs. On the other hand, Emelita helps by selling home-cooked dish like noodles, barbecue, sautéed vegetables and soups. Her business started 5 years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy pork chicken, catsup, skewer, soy sauce, noodles, peppercorn, salt and garlic.
 
In the future, she hopes to improve her menu to attract more customers and increase profits.

loans.use: to buy pork chicken, catsup, skewer, soy sauce, noodles, peppercorn, salt and garlic

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en: Francisca is a 47-year-old woman from Guindulman, Bohol. She is married with seven children. Her eldest is 24 and the youngest is 10. For ten years now, Francisca farms vegetable for a living. She plants eggplant, bitter gourd and okra to support her family. She also sell barbecue for additional income. She is asking for a loan to buy meat, spices and skewer.  In the future, she hope to be more successful in her business.

loans.use: to buy meat, spices and skewer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's education.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en: Adelaida is 57 years old and is from Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. She is married with four grown children. For more than ten years now, she has been engaged in raising hogs for an income. She is asking for a loan to buy piglets, feed and supplements. Adelaida knows the importance of the availability of feed for her hogs. Because of this, she will not buy feed on a per-kilo basis from a sari-sari (general) store, which is more expensive. In the future, she hopes to have a bigger barn and more pigs to raise for a better income and savings.

loans.use: to buy piglets, feed and supplements

loans.name: Mariacicel

texts.en:
27-year-old Mariacicel lives in Garcia Hernandez, Bohol with her husband and three children ages 2, 6 and 8. She has had a thriving hog raising business for four years now. This livelihood helps in bringing in an income of 6,000 PHP every three months. 

Mariacicel is asking for a loan to buy feed for her hogs, including pre-starter and hog grower. She plans to continue investing in hog raising and make it even bigger to uplift her family's living conditions. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and have a bigger piggery for increased profits and for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs

loans.name: Anida

texts.en:
Anida has been scheduled for a surgery and she needs financial help to achieve this. Part of this loan will cover the surgery, and with the rest she will pay for some debt incurred from her previous medical treatments. Anida, who is a seamstress, has been practicing her profession for nearly eighteen years. She inherited the talents from her mother.

She is a married mother of three children ranging in age from 15 to 9 years old. Her husband works in the trades industry and their family lives in the city of Elbasan, one of the largest cities in Albania. Kindly note that due to the poverty level, many Albanians buy second-hand clothes or other items such as bed linens that they repair to fit correctly. Hence, the seamstress profession is widely practiced in Albania in addition to that of shoe repairs. The latter is also practiced a lot because the streets in the cities are mostly unpaved or damaged, and shoes need repairs all the time.

loans.use: to pay for a surgery and some debt incurred from previous medical treatments.

loans.name: Marte

texts.en:
Upon their arrival ten years ago from a colder region to the new region with milder weather, Marte had some repairs done to the rundown home they purchased. The population in the village where she currently resides has been increasing rapidly.
 
Marte is requesting a loan from lenders in the amount of 150,000 Albanian Lek to help her pay for the construction materials that were used for house repairs and also to pay the worker.

Marte is a married mother of five children who practices raising livestock as a means of making a living. She has been dealing in animal husbandry of pigs, cows and chickens. She then sells fresh products and baby animals and organic eggs to the farmers' market.

loans.use: to repair the family's rundown home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of plastic slippers and sandals, which she will resell

loans.name: Bledar

texts.en:
This is Bledar, photographed at his insurance business that he’s been operating for a couple of months now. After graduating from the university, he went to live in his home town. While there, he realized that there was no insurance agency in his town of residence, nor in the nearby regions. This factor convinced him that he would be successful at this type of business due to targeting a large clientele. 

This is not the only job he does for living; he also works as a driver for a construction company. For years, Bledar worked as a bus driver traveling the Tirana (Albania) –Selanic (Greece) route, but he suffered a severe accident and was treated for a long time in a hospital in Athens. After all, according to him, he became fine, thanks be to God.

Bledar is a 29-year-old young married father of a 2-year-old. He needs this loan to buy business equipment.

loans.use: to buy equipment for his insurance business.

loans.name: Gjoke

texts.en:
Gjoke (husband) and Marte (wife) were photographed inside the stable with their goats! They are parents of two, ages 12 and 16, with one of them needing permanent medication, unfortunately. The loan they are applying for will be used to buy medication for their son.
 
They have been in the animal husbandry business for a long time now. Not only have they sold baby goats, but they also make homemade goat cheese and butter. Goat products have always been in demand in Albania due to the lower fat % and also its taste. During summer months, Gjok takes the goats to the prairies, very far from home, where he builds a little hutch to live in. Hence, he stays away from his family during all this time.

loans.use: to pay for medication for their son who suffers from a permanent illness.

loans.name: Bukurije

texts.en:
This is Bukurije, a widowed mother, whose name in Albanian means ‘Pretty’ and whose business is working as a street vendor, selling mostly cigarettes. She needs your help to take her grandson to a hospital in Greece for an immediate medical treatment that has been required lately due to his condition that has been worsening. 

Bukurije lives in a little town in southeastern Albania. Her married son and his children live with her in accordance with Albanian family tradition. Almost everyone in the rural areas practices this tradition of living together with parents. Most of the time it is the youngest sons who live in. This tradition is seen as very healthy, considering the fact that both sides help one another. 

Grandparents help the little ones grow and do other chores as well around the home, and they also help with the rural agricultural activities. In return, the youngsters repay this in kindness to their parents through their latest years. In the cities, though, this tradition is not followed as much as in the villages.

loans.use: to take her grandson to a hospital in Greece for an immediate medical treatment.

loans.name: Nazmi

texts.en:
Nazmi and Risie practice agriculture/livestock. They sell raw milk to a nearby dairy farm and they also sell at the farmers’ market in their nearby city of Korca. They also sell other fresh organic produce such as seasonal veggies and quantities of apple fruits (gold and starkinga varieties) grown on their farm. They also plant fodder and corn in large quantities that they use to feed their herd of one hundred sheep and sixty lambs. 

The village they live in is the largest one in the entire region; it has approximately 1,600 residents.  Due to the fact that there is a scarcity of agricultural land, the majority of villagers run animal husbandry type of practices. 

The loan Nazmi and Risie are requesting will be used to buy a water pump to irrigate their crop plantations.

loans.use: to buy a water pump to irrigate their crops and other plants.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and air-conditioner.

loans.name: Tukole N'amaanyi Group

texts.en:
The group is comprised mainly of retailers from a rural area in Kyotera. They sell general merchandise ranging from food stuffs to clothing and utensils, among other items, in different weekly markets around Kyotera. They decided to form a group that would help them access loans to supplement their meagre capital. 

Sarah will use the loan to buy corn flour, sugar, soap, salt, and bread to sell to her customers. She is hardworking and resilient.

loans.use: buy corn, sugar, soap and other items to sell

loans.name: Afire

texts.en:
Afire is a 46-year-old refugee. She is married and has a daughter and a son. She earns money raising and selling fruits and vegetables. She has been working in this field for 22 years and has had a good experience. Her monthly income is 150 AZN. Her husband works as a laborer and gets additional earnings for his family. 

Gardening has expanded much in Azerbaijan because there is a high demand for fresh fruits and vegetables. People buy fruits for dessert and for daily life, too. They eat them fresh because they know the use of fruits.

Afire doesn’t earn enough money to cover life's demands. She needs to pay for her children’s education and for life's costs. She applied for 1500 AZn in order to buy quality fertilizers to enlarge her harvest. This will increase her income and allow her to par life's costs. Let’s be kind and help Afire and her family!

loans.use: to buy quality fertilizers to enlarge her harvest

loans.name: Aida

texts.en: Aida is a 58-year-old married woman from the town of Guindulman, Bohol. She has been engaged in a sari-sari store business for four years now. Aida earns an average income of 5,000 PHP per month. She is asking for a loan to buy stock such as canned goods, shampoo, detergent, bath soap, cooking oil, sugar and coffee. In the future, she hopes to expand her business, as well as renovate her store, to attract customers and increase the profitability of her business.

loans.use: to buy stock such as canned goods, shampoo, detergent, bath soap, cooking oil, sugar and coffee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies in order to take care of her coffee crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goods and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Shem

texts.en: Shem is a former client of Ugafode.  He is married with seven children, two of whom attend school. He is an agriculturalist dealing in cabbage and coffee production.  He carries out goat trading to supplement his income from farming. Shem has been taking loans to boost his farming activities.  He also took this loan to buy agricultural inputs including manure, seedlings and herbicides to increase his production. Shem thanks Ugafode for the financial assistance which has enabled him to educate his children, which would have not possible using agriculture alone.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs including organic manure, seedlings and herbicides

loans.name: Elias

texts.en:
Elias is a 24-year-old, single client with one child. He does bodaboda (transportation via motorcycle) as his major source of income. Elias took his first loan and bought a motorcycle.

Elias takes care of his mother since his father died. With the money he got from bodaboda he started constructing a small house. He is taking this loan of USh 3,000,000 to buy building materials to finish his house because he wants to rent it out to supplement his income. 

Elias appreciates UGAFODE for the financial assistance which has enabled him to accumulate assets, and he encourages UGAFODE to continue serving low-income earners since it improves their standards of living.

loans.use: To buy building materials

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es:
Agustín tiene 63 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedican a la crianza de animales menores gallos, gallinas, pollos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Agustín is 63 years old, and he lives with his wife and children in the district of Oyotún, a community with a varied climate, where the people work in agriculture, trade, and livestock raising. It is located within the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque Region on Peru’s northern coast.

He and his wife work together, raising small animals such as hens, chickens, and roosters. His business is located behind his home.  He has requested a loan of 500 Nuevos Soles for the purchase of feed in order to fatten his animals, and in this way, generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase feed in order to fatten his animals.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 20 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la cultivo de maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarlos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gatos de us hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de abonos, fertilizantes controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para continuar con sus cultivos y asi poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This borrower is 20 years old and lives in his own home along with his wife and child. He grows corn and beans. When his crops are ready to be harvested, the output is stored in granaries (like the one shown in the photo) before being sold at different markets near his home. With the profit he earns, the borrower is able to pay for some of his household expenses.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy compost, fertilizers, pest controls, herbicide, and other supplies so that he can continue growing his crops and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, pest controls, herbicide, and other supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge, tuvo muy buenos resultados con la inversión anterior, le permitió tener a la disposición los materiales agrícolas que necesitaba en su momento, la cosecha fue muy abundante, sus nuevos ingresos le ayudan a cancelar las cuotas y también algunos muebles para su hogar.
Como está preparando todo para su próxima siembra opta por un nuevo crédito para comprar abono, insecticida, pesticida, herbicidas y semilla, de esta manera continuara fortaleciendo el negocio y cubriendo las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge had very good results with his previous investment, which allowed him to have at his disposal the agricultural materials he needed at that time. The harvest was plentiful and his new income helps him to pay the monthly fees and also buy some furniture for his home.
Jorge is getting everything ready for the next sowing, and so is asking for a new loan to purchase manure, insecticide, pesticide, herbicide and seeds. In this way he will continue strengthening his business and meeting the needs of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure, insecticide, pesticide, herbicide and seeds.

loans.name: Franklin Manfredis

texts.es:
Franklin es un joven de 24 años de edad, esta soltero y solo pudo estudiar hasta educación media.

Este joven trabajador se levanta a las 5:00 AM Junto a sus abuelos que lo apoyan en la actividades agricolas y en el ordeño de las vacas, siendo esas las actividades a las cuales Franklin se dedica, para llegar a la parcelas debe hacer un recorrido de 7 Km a pie y trabaja durante la mañana, su abuela se dedica tambien a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar las vacas que poseen. 

El credito que el esta solicitando lo necesita para comprar dos vacas, ya que desea incrementar la producción de leche para la venta y obtener mejores ingresos. 

Entre sus sueños a futuro estan, comprar un vehiculo para realiza viajes, y seguira trabajando muy duro para lograr lo que se ha propuesto.
texts.en:
Franklin is a young man who is 24 years of age. He is single and was only able to obtain a secondary education.

This young man and his grandparents wake up at 5:00 A.M. so that they help one another with the farming duties and the milking of the cows. In order to handle these responsibilities, Franklin must travel seven kilometers on foot in order to reach his parcel of land. He works in the mornings. His grandmother also takes care of the household chores and looks after the cows that they own.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy two cows. He wants to increase milk production so that he can generate more income from his sales. Franklin’s dreams for the future include buying a vehicle for making trips and to continue working hard so that he can accomplish the things he has planned.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, tiene 35 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. El siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de café, tiene varios años de realizar esta actividad. Cosecha el café y lo vende despulpado y lavado a los intermediarios de la zona.  Esta solicitando el sexto ciclo de préstamo que es por 12,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y darle asistencia a la parcela  de café. El piensa seguir trabajando y obtener mejores ingresos para ayudar a su familia a tener mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge is 35 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in the town of Gracias, Lempira.

Jorge has always been involved in coffee production. He has been in this line of work for several years. The coffee beans that he harvests are washed and have the pulp removed before they are sold to brokers in the area.

Jorge is requesting his sixth loan in the amount of 12,000 HNL. He will buy fertilizers and pay for the maintenance of his coffee plot. Jorge plans to continue working and generating more income so that he can help his family attain a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay for the maintenance of his coffee plot.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweet bread in bulk that she can sell.

loans.name: Dina Emerita

texts.es:
Dina Emerita tiene 58 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de crianza y venta de animales menores cerdos y gallinas en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 600 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlos a un mayor precio.
texts.en:
Dina Emerita, 58, lives with her spouse and children in the district of Cayalti, a community dedicated to farming, livestock and trade, located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque in the northern coast of Peru.
Dina works as a farmer, in particular breeding and selling small livestock such as pigs and hens from the back of her house. She is asking for a loan of 1,600 Nuevos Soles to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals and then offer them for a higher price.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed to fatten her animals.

loans.name: Maria Nelly

texts.es:
María Nelly tiene 50 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre, que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores en la parte posterior a su domicilio, realiza esta labor para apoyar con los gastos familiares, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y una segunda parte para la compra de cerdos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Nell is 50 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the district of Morropon, a community dedicated to farming, trade and cattle raising, located in the province of the same name, belonging to the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

María Nell raises small animals at the rear of her house. She engages in this task to help with household expenses. She has requested a loan of S/.2,000 in order to purchase nutritional feed to fatten her animals and also to purchase pigs. In this way she will generate more earnings for her family.

loans.use: to purchase nutritional feed to fatten her animals.

loans.name: Maria Raquel

texts.es:
María, requiere un nuevo capital para invertirlo en la compra de plaguicidas, insecticidas, fertilizantes, abono y una vaca para destazo, de esta manera preparara el terreno para su nueva cosecha y fortalecerá más el negocio para tener mejores ingresos.
Para María el préstamo anterior le ayudo positivamente pues conto con los insumos agrícolas necesarios para realizar su cultivo teniendo una cosecha abundante y mejores ganancias con las cuales ha cancelado las deudas y mejorado el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
María needs more capital to invest in the purchase of pesticide, insecticide, fertilizer, manure and a cow to butcher. In this way she will prepare the land for the new crop and she will strengthen her business in order to improve her income.
Maria's previous loan helped her because she was able to have the farming supplies needed for her crops. She had an abundant harvest and increased her income. She has cancelled debts and improved her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase pesticide, insecticide, fertilizer, manure and a cow to butcher.

loans.name: Carmen Mayte

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 44 años y vive en la ciudad de Pisco, es una mujer humilde y de trato amable, es madre de 2 hijos a quienes quiere muchísimo. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado tener su negocio de venta de abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad desde hace 3 años, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante; ella cree que le va bien porque ofrece productos cómodos pero en buen estado.

Carmen esta agradecida con el apoyo otorgado por los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a ello podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como atún al por mayor, arroz, entre otros, ais como también útiles escolares para ofrecer en su bodega, así podrá atender los pedidos de sus clientes y seguir esforzándose por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión al menor de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carmen is 44 years old and lives in the city of Pisco. She is a humble and friendly woman. Carmen is the mother of two children who she loves dearly. With great effort, she was able to establish a grocery business where she has been selling basic necessity products for the past three years. This enables her to earn the income she needs to move forward. She believes she is doing well because she offers familiar products that are in good condition.

Carmen is grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders have provided. Thanks to their assistance, she will be able to buy merchandise for her business. These items include tuna in bulk, rice, and other products. She will also buy school supplies that she can sell in her store. This will enable her to fulfill the requests from her customers. Carmen continues to strive toward fulfilling her greatest wish of seeing her youngest child become a professional.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase land.

loans.name: Edith Yamileth

texts.es:
Edith, necesita capital para invertirlo en la compra de pescado, conchas, camarones, calamares, etc., para surtir su negocio, las demandas de sus clientes son mayores.
Con el capital anterior surtió el inventario de productos frescos y a buen precio lo que le facilito aumentar la clientela, mejorar sus ventas y los ingresos son mejores, por lo que ha cancelado puntualmente sus cuotas y le da una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en: Edith needs capital to invest in the purchase of fish, shellfish, shrimp, calamari, etc. to stock her business. The orders from her customers have grown. With the previous capital she stocked her inventory of fresh products and at a good price, which enabled her to expand her customers, improve sales and earnings and make her repayments on time. Consequently she is able to provide her son with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase fish, shellfish, shrimp, calamari, etc.

loans.name: Maria Lorensa

texts.es:
María, aprendió de sus familiares la elaboración de pan, desde hace 28 años atiende una panadería que es la que le da los ingresos económicos para solventar los gastos familiares, poco a poco ha ido incorporando otros rubros en su negocio en la actualidad también posee la venta de lácteos, y leña. María vive con su compañero de vida y una hija.
El capital que solicita es para invertirlo en la compra de harina, azúcar, papel, levaduras, quesos, crema, cuajada y leña, teniendo todos los materiales necesarios para realizar sus diferentes actividades y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, espera mejorar su economía.
Como objetivo tiene mejorar su vivienda, dar a su familia un mejor estilo de vida, comprar equipo para aumentar la producción de pan y calidad de sus productos.
texts.en:
María learned how to make bread from her relatives. For the past 28 years, she has operated a bakery that has allowed her to generate income to pay for her family’s expenses. Over time, she has incorporated other types of work into her business. At the moment, María also sells dairy products and firewood. She lives with her life companion and a daughter.

The capital that she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of flour, sugar, paper, yeast, cheese, cream, curds, and firewood. All of these items are necessary for her various businesses and will allow her to satisfy the needs of her customers. She hopes to improve her finances.

María wants to buy equipment so that she can increase bread production and improve the quality of her products. She intends to make improvements to her home and provide a better lifestyle for her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, paper, yeast, cheese, cream, curds, and firewood.

loans.name: Shannon Kevin

texts.es:
Shannon vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante es por ello que trabaja con mucho esfuerzo en su trabajo en una pequeña empresa de su ciudad, asimismo con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa con el cual puede tener un ingreso extra para los gastos de su hogar y de esta manear seguir adelante.

Shannon está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio de ropa y de esta manera poder seguir luchando por hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Shannon lives in the city of Pucallpa. He is a young man who is eager to get ahead, which is why he works hard at his job in a small company from his city. Besides, with a lot of effort and with his savings, he owns a small clothing business which provides an extra income for the household expenses and allows him to continue forward.
Shannon is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he will be able to purchase merchandise for his clothing business in order to keep fighting to make his dream come true: "to have a house of his own".

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Maria Sara

texts.es:
María, manifiesta que el crédito anterior le permitió contar con la materia prima para elaborar las meriandas y brindar una mejorar atención a sus clientes, sus ventas incrementaron así mismo las ganancias son mejores.
 El crédito nuevo que está solicitando le servirá para realizar la compra de aceite, maíz, frijol, yuca, platano, tomates, maiz, etc., para continuar trabajando y mejorando su economía familiar.
texts.en:
María states that the previous loan enabled her to have the basic supplies to make snacks and provide better service to her customers. Thereupon her sales increased and her profits are better.

The new loan will be used to purchase oil, corn, beans, yucca, plantain, tomatoes, etc. in order to continue working and improving household finances.

loans.use: to purchase oil, corn, beans, yucca, plantain, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en: Anastacia is a 64-year-old woman from the town of Guindulman, Bohol. She is married and has two adult children. Her husband worked as a farmer to help meet their daily needs. On the other hand, Anastacia sells snacks like bread to earn a living. Her business started 30 years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy more bread that she can sell and deliver for more profit. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and increase profitability for savings and a comfortable living.

loans.use: to buy more bread

loans.name: Nicomedes

texts.es:
Nicomedes vive en el distrito de Santiago, es un hombre humilde y trabajador, es padre de familia y es por ello que se esfuerza mucho para sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que desea que tengan mejores oportunidades para progresar en la vida. Nicomedes es un hombre mil oficios, ha trabajado como panadero y actualmente trabaja como operario de construcción, es responsable por ello sus clientes siempre lo buscan para ofrecerle trabajo.

Nicomedes esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales y herramientas para realizar su trabajo como combas, martillos, cinceles, entre otros, y de esta manera poder mejorar la atención a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos ya que no tendrá que alquilar las herramientas como lo hace actualmente, así seguirá trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:2 Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Nicomedes lives in the Distrct of Santiago. He is a humble and hardworking individual. Nicomedes is a father, so he strives to do his best so that his children can get ahead. He wants them to have better opportunities so that they can make progress in life. Nicomedes is a jack of all trades. He previously worked as a baker, but now he is in the construction business. Since he is responsible, his customers are always looking to him to have work done.

Nicomedes is grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, he will be able to buy materials and tools for his work such as sledgehammers, hammers, chisels, and other items. This will allow him to provide better service to his customers and improve his earnings. Nicomedes will not have to rent equipment since he currently has to do that now. He continues to work and strive toward fulfilling his greatest wish of seeing his children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy materials and tools for his work.

loans.name: Hernán Darío

texts.es:
Hernán es un hombre trabajador y pujante de 30 años de edad, que se gana la vida trabajando como comerciante independiente, tiene una tienda de abarrotes que inició hace varios años, cuenta con el apoyo de su hermano y abre todos los días desde las primeras horas de la mañana.
El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de surtido al por mayor (carnes frías, pastas, chocolate, café, galletería, lácteos), esto le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y así mejorar las ventas y los ingresos.
Hernán manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es posicionar bien su negocio, que le garantice una estabilidad económica para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hernán, age 30, is a hardworking and energetic man. He earns his living by working as an independent merchant. Hernán has a grocery store that he started several years ago with the help of his brother. The business is open every day, beginning in the early morning hours.

The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of inventory in bulk (cold cuts, pasta, chocolates, coffee, cookies, and dairy products). This will enable him to have a wider variety of products that he can offer to his customers. As a result, his sales and earnings will improve.

Hernán says that his greatest wish is to see his business well-positioned. This would guarantee financial stability so that he can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cold cuts, pasta, chocolates, coffee, cookies, and dairy products.

loans.name: Yudy Sugey

texts.es:
Yudy a sus 35 años de edad, es una madre soltera que se gana la vida trabajando como comerciante independiente, y de esta forma logra solventar los gastos básicos de su hija de 13 años.
Su labor consiste en comprar telas y cortes, los envía a confeccionar y luego vende las prendas en diferentes almacenes de la ciudad.
El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de insumos como telas e hilos para elaborar blusas, leggins y otras prendas para luego venderlas y seguir mejorando su margen de utilidades.
Yudy manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es fortalecer y posicionar su negocio y en un futuro convertirlo en una distribuidora de prendas de vestir que sea reconocida por la calidad y el buen precio de venta, así podrá garantizar una mejor calidad de vida para su hijo.
texts.en:
Yudy is 35 years old, a single mother who makes her living working as an independent merchant and in this way is able to meet the basic expenses of her 13 year old daughter. Her work consists of buying fabrics and fabric pieces. She sends them to be sewn and then sells the clothing items in different stores in the city.

The loan she seeks will be used to buy materials such as fabric and thread to make blouses, lettings, and other items to then sell and continue improving her profit margins.

Yudy states that her primary goal is to strengthen and position her business and in the future convert it to be a clothing distributor business that is recognized for its quality and good selling price, and in this way she will be able to guarantee a better quality of life fo rher child.

loans.use: to buy materials such as fabric and thread to make blouses, leggings, and other items of clothing.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en: Marites is a 29-year-old woman from the town of Guindulman, Bohol. She has two children, aged one and five. Her partner works as a technician while Marites is engaged in a sari-sari (general store). Her business started two years ago and earns her 10,000 PHP per month. She is asking for a loan of 4,000 PHP to buy shampoo, coffee, sugar, cooking oil, diapers, canned goods and detergent. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and increase profits so she can send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, coffee, sugar, cooking oil, diapers, canned goods and detergent

loans.name: Hermigilda

texts.en:
Hermigilda is 59 years old, a married woman with four adult children. She and her family live in Guindulman, Bohol. For 23 years now, she has been engaged in a sari-sari (general store) business. She also cooked food to sell for additional income.

From this business, she earns an average income of 8,000 PHP every harvest season. She is asking for a loan 4,000 PHP to buy sacks of flour, rice, soft drinks, brown sugar and white sugar. The income she will generate will provide her family with food and help pay the basic household bills.

In the future, she hopes to be more successful in her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, rice, soft drinks, brown sugar and white sugar

loans.name: Ediltrudes

texts.en:
Ediltrudes is 47 years old and from Guindulman, Bohol. She is married with four children. Her eldest is 22, and the youngest is 14. Her husband drives a habal-habal (a motorcycle to transport passengers to remote places). Ediltrudes also farms vegetables like string beans and sells barbecue during the afternoon to evening. 

She is asking for a loan of 4,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy meat, spices and skewers. In the future, she hopes to have other business options so she can always afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy meat, spices and skewers

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima is a 46-year-old woman from the town of Guindulman, Bohol. She is married with eight children ages 8-25. Her husband works as a carpenter to support their needs. As a way to help her family, she has engaged in a Sari-sari (general) store business for three years now, which earns her an average income of 6,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) per month. Zosima also plants bananas and vegetables for additional income. 

Zosima is asking for a loan of 4,000 PHP to buy coffee, sugar, cooking oil, canned goods, eggs, noodles and chips. In the future, she hopes to improve her inventory as well as her store to attract more customers and increase business.

loans.use: to buy coffee, sugar, cooking oil, canned goods, eggs, noodles and chips

loans.name: Sara Esmeralda

texts.es:
Sara, surtirá el inventario de la tienda por lo que se dispone a solicitar un nuevo préstamo con el que comprara arroz, frijol, aceite, golosinas, jugos, gaseosas, pan, jabón, entre otros productos para cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes.
La Sra.: Sara manifiesta que el crédito anterior le permitió poner a la disposición de sus clientes mercadería nueva con la cual aumentaron sus ventas y su estabilidad económica mejor, pudo cancelar la deuda adquirida, su familia vive en mejores circunstancias.
texts.en:
Sara will restock the inventory of her store. For this reason, she is requesting a new loan in order to buy rice, beans, oil, snack foods, juices, sodas, bread, soap, and other products. This will enable her to fulfill the needs of her customers.

Sra. Sara says that her previous loan allowed her to have new merchandise available for her customers. She was able to increase her sales, improve her financial stability, and repay her debt. Her family lives under better circumstances.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, snack foods, juices, sodas, bread, soap, and other products.

loans.name: Felicinda Teodora

texts.es:
Felicinda tiene 51 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus hermosas playas, la generosidad de sus pobladores y por la rica sazón que tienen para la preparación de los platillos característicos de la zona. Ella es muy entusiasta y trabajadora, con mucho esfuerzo inicio su negocio de venta de comida, raspadilla, refrescos, entre otros; ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene una muy buena sazón para la preparación de los platillos y por ello siempre regresan los clientes.

Felicinda está muy agradecida a los prestamistas Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le dan su confianza y en esta oportunidad podrá construir la parte trasera de su vivienda y de ets amanera podrá dar mayor seguridad para ella y su familia; así seguirá trabajando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener un local para tener un restaurante”.
texts.en:
Felicinda is 51 years old. She lives in the city of Chincha, a city that is known for its beautiful beaches, the generosity of its inhabitants, and the delicious seasonings that they have to prepare the dishes that are characteristic of the area. Felicinda is very enthusiastic and hard-working. With great effort, she began her business of selling food, flavored ices, and soft drinks, among other items. She works about 8 hours a day and can serve up to 20 customers in a day. She believes that her business is going well for her because she uses very good seasonings to prepare her dishes, and for that reason her customers always come back.

Felicinda is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since this is the second time that they have given her their confidence. At this time, she will be able to construct the rear part of her house, and in this way she will be able to provide better security for her and her family. Thus she will continue working to accomplish her great dream: to have a place to have a restaurant.

loans.use: to construct a wall in her home

loans.name: Pilaria

texts.en:
Pilaria is a 59-year-old woman from the town of Jagna, Bohol. She is married with four adult children. Pilaria has been engaged in selling firewood and coconut wine for five years now. This earns her 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) per month. 

She is asking for a loan of 3,000 PHP to buy more firewood and coconut wine to resell as well as grocery items like rice, sugar and baking powder for her family. In the future, she hopes to expand her business to save and buy healthy meals for her family.

loans.use: to more firewood, rice, sugar, baking powder and coconut wine

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and an oversewing machine.

loans.name: Desideria

texts.en:
Desideria is 49 years old and from Jagna, Bohol. She is married with four children ages 14-22. For 10 years now, Desideria has relied on her transportation business using her motorela (motorized carriage). This helps bring in a monthly income of 4,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) per month. Her husband is the one who drives the unit, but she helps to ensure what they need to earn a better income. 

She is asking for a loan of 3,000 PHP to buy tires, paint and galvanized iron. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and have another unit to increase business profitability.

loans.use: to buy tires, paint and galvanized iron

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en: Conchita is 63 years old. She is married and has two adult children. Conchita helps her husband, who is a farmer, by operating a sari-sari (general store). She sells condiments, canned goods, eggs, noodles and toiletries. Her business has been in operation for ten years. She is asking for a loan to buy chips, candies, soft drinks, seasoning, canned goods, shampoo and detergent. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and increase profits so she can further save and live in comfort.

loans.use: to buy chips, candies, soft drinks, seasoning, canned goods, shampoo and detergent

loans.name: Lilian's Group

texts.en:
Lilian is a member of this group in Busia District. She is pictured here in a group of eight One Acre Fund group leader farmers. The group leaders represent a total of 72 individual One Acre Fund farmers who are not pictured here. Lilian  has been selected to act as the Kiva group representative and is standing on the right with her hand raised. She and the other farmers represented in this group are each receiving inputs for ¼ acre of maize and ¼ acre of sorghum or millet. Each farmer is receiving an average input loan of 5,349 shillings for maize, millet and sorghum cultivation.
							
Lilian is married and has six children. She is 35 years old and is known as friendly, hardworking, reliable and trustworthy. She is active in her community in groups such as the women's group, savings group, prayer group and burial committee. Lilian has been a farmer for 16 years. Lilian described her harvest as not with One Acre Fund last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund.  

Lilian first enrolled with One Acre Fund in 2013 and is now preparing to be a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2014 Long Rains season. Lilian joined One Acre Fund in order to get the best seed prices, new farming methods, fertilizer and hybrid seeds and to earn enough to feed family and send her children to school. She also volunteered to be a group leader and Kiva representative because she likes being a leader, is an active community member, wants to help more farmers and wants to spread the story about One Acre Fund farmers. 

Lilian plans to use the money that she earns from her next harvest to send children to school, save for the future and buy a cow. She notes that working with One Acre Fund has led to many benefits for One Acre Fund farmers. Lilian’s own life was improved because she has more profits from harvest, has more farm training, was able to save money, has more farm group support and was able to feed the family.  							

Lilian and her group need a loan to cover the initial costs of purchasing the seeds and fertilizer through One Acre Fund. One Acre Fund will repay the Kiva loan on behalf of the farmers through the profits from the farmers’ harvests. One Acre Fund pre-purchases the seeds and fertilizer when prices are low and passes the cost savings to the farmers. Throughout the planting and harvesting season, One Acre Fund also provides training and support to the farmers as they make payments back to One Acre Fund. With support from One Acre Fund and your loan, these farmers will have a chance at a successful harvest, increased profits and improved lives.							

The field officer is also included in the photo and is standing on the left of the photo.

loans.use: To purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet and sorghum.

loans.name: Keng Sonny

texts.es:
Keng vive en el la ciudad de Tingo Maria, ubicada en la selva peruana, es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que se esfuerza mucho en su negocio de venta de cerveza, con el cual ya lleva trabajando casi 2 años, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante, asimismo, se da tiempo para apoyar a su abuelo, algunos días de la semana.

Keng está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su local y6 también podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio y así mejorar sus ingresos y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Keng lives in the city of Tingo Maria, which is located in the Peruvian forest. He is a young man with a great will to advance. It is for this reason that he exerts himself greatly in his business of selling beer, in which he has been working for almost 2 years, and from which he can have income to be able to advance. It also gives him time to help his grandfather some days of the week.

Keng is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help that they have offered him, he will be able to make improvements in his premises and he will also be able to buy merchandise for his business and thus improve his income. He will continue working to make a reality of his great dream: to study in a university program.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su nieto. Ella posee una tortillería en su residencia, ya tiene 15 años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene un excelente servicio, es muy amable con las personas que la visitan siempre tiene una sonrisa en el rostro para ellos, además tiene gran agilidad para la elaboración de las mismas y atiende a los clientes en poco tiempo. Ángela está solicitando  a ITNEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor para seguir produciendo. Ella  tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará a su familia una seguridad económica en el hogar
texts.en: Angela is 53, she lives in a house she owns with her life partner and her grandson.  She has a tortilla store in her residence, she's had this business for 15 years and has built a large clientele with her excellent service, she is very kind with her customers and always has a smile for them, she is also very skilled in the making of the tortillas and services her clients in a small amount of time.  Angela is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL to buy corn and continue producing.  She hopes that this way she will be able to give her family economic stability at home.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop, generator, printer and chair.

loans.name: Carlos Atilio

texts.es: Carlos de 50 años de edad, el posee un taller mecánico y venta de lubricantes desde hace 7 años su negocio está ubicado en la calle principal de donde el reside, posee mucha clientela por la calidad del trabajo y los buenos precios de los productos, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y ventas logra solventar y darle a su familia lo que necesitan, vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, Carlos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de lubricantes, filtros, aceites, etc. todo por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así seguirle dando a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Carlos is 50, has a mechanical shop and sells lubricants, he started his business 7 years ago. The business is located in the main street where he lives, he has many customers because of the quality of work and the good prices of his products.  With the income from his work and from the business sales he is able to support his family and and provide them with what they need.  He lives in a house he owns with his life partner and their two children. Carlos is requesting a loan to buy lubricants, filters, oil, etc. at wholesale, this way he can continue selling as this business is his only source of income and he wants to continue providing for his family to cover their needs without limitations.

loans.use: to buy lubricants, filters, oil, etc. at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Ronald Orlando

texts.es:
Ronald vive en el distrito de los Aquijes, es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que día a día trabaja como chófer de mototaxi y taxi, ya que con este humilde trabajo puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y poder solventar los gastos de manutención de su pequeño hijo de 1 año 8 meses

Ronald está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar electrodomésticos para su vivienda como cocina, licuadora, entre otros, con lo cual mejorará su calidad de vida y de esta manera podrá seguir esforzándose aun más para darle a su familia una vida mejor, lo cual es su gran sueño.
texts.en:
Ronald lives in the Aquijes district.  He is a young man with many desires to get ahead and works as a taxi and moto-taxi driver daily.  This humble work allows him to have an income with which to get ahead and support his 20 month old son.

Ronald is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their help that will allow him to buy household appliances like a stove, blender, and other things that will improve his quality of life.  He will continue to make an effort to provide his family with a better quality of life, which is his greatest dream.

loans.use: to buy appliances.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor vive en la ciudad de Pisco, es un hombre muy trabajador, sobre todo porque es padre de familia y con su humilde trabajo como operario de construcción puede solventar los gastos d su hogar, victor lleva trabajando en este oficio hace 5 años y cree que le va bien porque realiza un buen trabajo.

Victor está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda  y de esta manera poder tener una mejor calidad de vida, así seguirá esforzándose para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda y comprar un auto”.
texts.en:
Victor lives in the city of Pisco. He is a hard-working man especially as he is the father of a family. With his modest position as a construction worker he is able to pay the household expenses. Victor has been working at this for 5 years and feels that things are going well as he does good work.

Victor is grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to their support he can make improvements to this house and thus have a higher quality of living. He can also continue to strive to achieve his dream which is to finish construction on his home and to buy a car.

loans.use: to make improvements on his house.

loans.name: Ignacio Esteban

texts.es:
Ignacio vive en la ciudad de Ica, es un hombre muy trabajador, sobre todo porque ha sacado adelante a sus 4 hijos con mucho esfuerzo, desde su humilde trabajo como carpintero. Ignacio lleva en su negocio hace 15 años y para el su negocio su vida porque le ha dado muchos logros; Ignacio cree que le va bien porque es amable y sobre todo responsable con sus clientes.

Ignacio está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda y de esta manera seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y seguir esforzándose para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa”.
texts.en:
Ignacio lives in the city of Ica.  He is a hard-working man mostly because he has gotten his four children ahead with great effort.  He has done this through his humble work as a carpenter.  Ignacio has been in his business for 15 years.  To Ignacio his business is his life because it has given him many accomplishments.  Ignacio believes that it is going well for him because he is kind and, most of all, responsible with his customers.

Ignacio is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have provided he will be able to make improvements to his house.  This way he will continue improving his quality of life.  He will continue putting forth great effort in order to be able to make his big dream a reality.  His dream is to finish building his house.

loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Mor

texts.fr: Monsieur Mor habite dans une des communautés villageoises du Sénégal  et s’active dans le secteur du commerce depuis l’an 2000. Il est marié  et supporte les charges de nourriture et de location de l’appartement qu’il occupe avec sa famille. Il gère une alimentation générale ou il commercialise divers produits. Il démarre ses activités journalières a partir de 8 heures jusqu'à 19 heures le soir. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC ou il sollicite un crédit 300 000 prévu pour l’achats de produits alimentaires destinés a renforcer le stock de marchandises de sa boutique. Son objectif est d’accroitre les bénéfices qui seront générés par son activité ce pourra impacter positivement le niveau de son épargne. Son projet dans le futur consiste a, grâce a son épargne acheter un terrain, le construire et s’y installer afin de mettre un terme a ses charges de location et procurer a sa famille un cadre de vie plus épanoui.
texts.en: Mor lives within a village community in Senegal and has worked in the commercial sector since the year 2000. He is a married man who pays for the food his family consumes and the rent for the apartment they live in. He runs a general grocery store where he sells various products. His daily working routine starts at 8 am and finishes at 7 pm. He is a member of UIMCEC and is requesting a loan for 300,000 XOF in order to purchase food products which will result in a wider variety of stock for his store. His goal is to increase the profits from his business, which will then have a positive impact on his savings. With these savings, his project for the future consists of buying a plot of land and building his own home there so he no longer needs to rent a property. By doing this, he will be able to give his family a better life.

loans.use: buy food products intended for resale

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
Adrian es un hombre muy trabajador, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de muebles de madera desde hace 20 años, con su humilde negocio puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Adrian esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales para su negocio como madera, clavos, pegamento, entre otros y de esta manera atender los trabajos de sus clientes, mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando par poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Que su negocio sea mucho más grande”.
texts.en:
Adrian is a hard-working man. He has been making and selling wood furniture for 20 years. With his modest business he generates income so he can get ahead.


Adrian is grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to the support they provide he can buy materials for his business like wood, nails, glue, etc. Then he can take care of his customers' orders, increase his income and continue to strive to achieve his big dream, which is to make his business much bigger.

loans.use: to buy materials to make wood furniture.

loans.name: Ave Fenix Group

texts.es:
Ave Fenix es un grupo que está luchando por salir adelante, además están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza como un medio de conocer la situación de cada una y conforme a ello poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una.
Una mujer que se destaca es la Sra. Maria, quien tiene una despensa bien surtida en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día. Maria comenta que empezó con una pequeña despensa, y que después poco a poco fue abriéndose camino y hoy en día ya tiene una muy buena clientela formada.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras, frutas, panificados, enlatados, y demás, y de esa forma poder surtir su negocio y seguir dando a sus clientes todo a lo que están acostumbrados.
texts.en:
The "Ave Fenix" communal bank is striving to get ahead. It is doing the Poverty Stoplight survey as a way to understand the situation of each member and from the results understand how to improve their living conditions.

One outstanding member is Maria who has a well-stocked store where she works every day from the early hours of the morning. Maria comments that she started out with a very small store and little by little moved ahead and today she has a good clientele.

Maria is requesting this loan to invest in buying supplies like vegetables, fruit, bakery products, canned goods, etc. Doing this she can stock her store and continue to provide her customers what they are used to.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, pastries, canned goods etc. to sell.

loans.name: Fe Y Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo Fe y Esperanza está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para poder conocer la situación de cada una de ellas, y conforme a eso y por medio de las capacitaciones poder mejorar sus vidas.
Carmen es parte de este grupo, ella es vendedora de prendas variadas, y cuenta que tiene buena venta, y gracias a que es muy buena vendedora ya se ha hecho de una clientela bien surtida que siempre compra de ella sus ropas.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de remeras, jeans, pantalones, camisas y demás, y de esa forma seguir con sus ventas y luchando por un futuro mejor para su familia.
texts.en:
The Fe y Esperanza group (Faith and Hope) is starting their fourth loan as a women’s committee, where they all work and help to each other to succeed. They are currently participating in an elimination of poverty survey to determine their status, and based on the results and the training they are receiving, they are looking forward to improving their lives. 
Carmen is part of this group. She sells different garments, and because she is a good sale person, she's been able to keep a diverse pull of customers that purchase her items regularly. 
She is requesting for this loan to invest in the purchase of T-shirts, jeans, pants, shirts and others, to keep up with her sales and continue fighting for a better future for her family.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts, jeans, pants, shirts and others

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
Matilde lucha por salir adelante, es muy sacrificada y emprendedora, que con mucho esfuerzo esta trabajando para ayudar a sus seres queridos. Ella trabaja en su despensa desde tempranas horas del día para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Este es su tercer préstamo y comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en comprar insumos para su despensa, hoy pide de un nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra verduras, frutas, enlatados, cárnicos y demás. agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo de poder crecer.
texts.en:
Matilde struggles to get by. She is hard working and has an entrepreneurial spirit, and she works every day to help her loved ones. She works at her pantry at early hours of the day to improve her living conditions as well as her family's. 
This is her third loan. She used her previous loan to buy supplies for her pantry and today she's asking for a new one to invest in the purchase of vegetables, fruits, canned food, meat and others. She is grateful for this new opportunity to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, canned food, meat and others

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose  es estudiante de la Carrera de Análisis de Sistema, además trabaja para poder seguir estudiando y llegar a cumplir su meta de ser un profesional.
Jose vive con sus padres y hermanos, y cuenta que sus metas futuras son la de trabajar de manera independiente y obtener mejores  ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia. Es una persona muy sacrificada que lucha por mejorar.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de universidad, y también para poder cubrir sus gastos de manutención. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Jose is a student in the Systems Analysis program. He also works in order to be able to continue studying and to meet his goal of being a professional.

Jose lives with his parents and siblings and says that his future goals are to work independently and to be able to obtain a better income in order to be able to help his family. He is a very self-sacrificing person who fights to improve.

He is asking for this loan in order to be able to pay his university fees as well as to be able to cover his living expenses. He is thankful for the opportunity to continue studying that he is receiving.

loans.use: to pay university fees and cover living expenses

loans.name: Miguela

texts.es:
Miguela viene de una familia humilde, su padre es empleado en un supermercado  y su madre tiene un pequeño tambo.
Ella está estudiando la carrera de Enfermería, y por medio de esta carrera quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas. Su aspiración es terminar  su carrera y comenzar a trabajar en algo de la rama de su carrera  y de esa manera ser una buena profesional donde podrá ayudar a muchas personas y también tener un ingreso más seguro para ayudar a su familia.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, que le permitirá  cubrir ese gasto, y de esa manera culminar su carrera. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Miguela comes from a humble family. Her father works in a supermarket and her mother has a small dairy farm.

She is studying nursing, and with this career, she will be able to help other people. Her goal is to finish school and start working at a job in her field. Then she will be a professional and she will be able to help many people and also have a stable income so she can help her family.

Miguela is requesting a loan to invest in tuition costs. This will allow her to cover that cost so she can finish her degree. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 19 años vive con sus padres en el en la ciudad de Paraguarí, está estudiando en la Academia de Policía, tiene como objetivo recibirse y servir a la ciudadanía y a su comunidad en especial. 
Su meta es crecer como persona y como profesional cada día y ayudar a las personas que necesiten de su servicio.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases de la academia, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir luchando por cumplir con su meta de ser un buen policía el día de mañana.
texts.en:
Pedro, 19, lives with his parents in the city of Paraguarí. He is studying at the Police Academy and wants to graduate so he can serve citizens, and especially his community.

His goal is to grow as a person and a professional every day, and to help people who need his service.

He is requesting a loan to pay for his university classes. This will allow him to keep working to complete his goal of being a policeman in the future.

loans.use: to pay for university classes.

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Antonio está en su Sexto ciclo del programa de comité, es un grupo muy trabajador, que además está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, que les permitirá conocer en que situación está cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar y salir adelante.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Lidia quien es empleada doméstica, y además está emprendiendo en la venta de bijouterie, y por medio de estos trabajos está luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Comenta que la vida es muy sacrificada pero que no se deja vencer y lucha por lo que quiere, lo cual es ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para hacer bijouterie, y de esa forma poder seguir con su emprendimiento y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The San Antonio group is requesting for its sixth loan as a women's committee. This is a hard-working group, that is also participating in the elimination of poverty survey, which will allow them to have more information about their situation, and will help them to find work and improve their lives. 
Mrs. Lidia is one of them. She is a maid, and she also sells jewelry. She works hard every day to succeed. Her life can be a struggle, but she never gives up, as all she wants is to help her family. 
She will use this loan to invest in the purchase jewelry making supplies, and continue working in this business, and continue improving her life.

loans.use: to buy jewelry making supplies

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria es una mujer muy trabajadora que habita en un barrio rural de Juigalpa Chontales junto a su esposo e hijos, quienes cursan primaria y secundaria gracias al esfuerzo que realizan sus padres día a día. Desde hace muchos años atrás ella trabaja por cuenta propia, elaborando en un horno casero un delicioso pan llamado cosa de hornos, lo cual lo comercializa en su casa, pulperías, y en la calles de su barrio. Su esposo es albañil y soldador, y a pesar que tiene todo del empeño de trabajar, por las características de esta labor solamente encuentra trabajo de forma temporal  y esto no le ha permitido apoyar como quisiera a su esposa Gloria. Ella manifiesta que su esposo le apoya en las actividades de su trabajo cuando él está en casa y que juntos han mantenido el negocio en pie. Gloria solicita su segundo crédito para la compra de materias primas como maíz, queso y leña, a la misma vez reparar el horno que utiliza para la elaboración de sus productos, comprando materiales de construcción tales como cemento, arena y pagar mano de obra para la reparación.
texts.en: Gloria is a hardworking woman who lives in a rural Juigalpa Chontales neighborhood with her husband and children who attend elementary and middle school, thanks to the parent’s daily effort.  For many years she has worked on her own, making bread called “oven bread” in her home oven.  She sells it out of her home, to stores, and around the neighborhood.  Her husband works as a mason and despite putting forth all his effort, he is only able to find seasonal employment, so he is not able to help Gloria as must as he would like to.  She says that her husband helps with her work when he is at home and that they keep the business on its feet together.  Gloria is asking for a second loan to buy ingredients such as corn, cheese, and firewood, and also repair the oven she uses to make her products.  She will buy building materials such as cement, sand, and pay for repair labor.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and repair her oven.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se formó en la ciudad de Caaguazú, ellas son mujeres muy luchadoras, que gracias a su esfuerzo que están haciendo están mejorando sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cecilia.
Ella en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel  dos, lo que quiere decir que ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la venta ambulante de productos variados, y que por medio de ese trabajo lucha por sacar adelante a su familia.
La Sra. Cecilia solicita de este préstamo para la compra productos en general para vender, como prendas, calzados, jeans y demás,  lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This group was formed in the city of Caaguazú. These women are truly fighters, who thanks to their efforts are improving their living conditions and those of their families. They are currently participating in the elimination of poverty survey. Cecilia is one of their members. 
In the latest survey, she had a poverty level two, which means that through her efforts and continuous hard work she has been able to succeed and dig herself out of poverty. Among her various jobs, she sells items door to door, and uses her earnings to support her family. 
Cecilia is asking for this loan to buy general products to sell, such as clothing, footwear, jeans and others, which will help her fulfill her business plan and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy general products to sell, such as clothing, footwear, jeans and others

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge se dedica a la reparación, venta de cubiertas y llantas nuevas y usadas, es una persona muy trabajadora que con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo esta saliendo adelante.Comenta que por medio de su trabajo y lucha quiere mejorar su vida y también poder ayudar a su familia.Por medio de su préstamo anterior de Kiva compró cubiertas y cámaras  para la venta, y hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de cubiertas, llantas, parches, pegamento, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando y ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en: Jorge works repairing and selling new and used tires and rims. He is very responsible and with a hard work and effort he is trying to get ahead. He says that through this work and efforts he would like to improve his quality of life and help his family. He used his last Kiva loan to buy tires and tubes for sale, and today he want to invest this new loan to buy more tires, rims, patches, glue, to allow him to continue working and providing a great service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy tires, rims, patches and glue.

loans.name: Salome

texts.es: La señora Salome, es una persona trabajadora y humilde, de 49 años de edad de estado civil soltera, anteriormente vivía en concubinato,pero su concubino se fue a trabajar al trópico y no volvió por razones desconocidas, abandonando su hogar hace 12 años dejando a cuatro hijos; actualmente los niños están bajo la dependencia económica de la señora, quien logro estudiar hasta la primaria, vive en su propia casa que es rustica de adobe y se halla situada en la Provincia de Tiraque, su actividad principal es la producción agrícola, por año en promedio produce los siguientes productos: Papa 60 cargas, Haba (verde) 40 Cargas, Cebada 16 @ (en grano). La siembra de estos cultivos los realiza en sus propios terrenos en una superficie  aproximada de 3 Has. que están ubicados al norte de la población de Tiraque, los trabajos agrícolas los desarrolla con la colaboración  de sus hijos, vecinos y de trabajadores eventuales,ahora solicita un crédito para la compra de abono orgánico (Gallinaza), para sembrar más papa e incrementar su producción y así tener más ingresos económicos para brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Salome is a hard-working and humble person. She is 49 years old and single. Previously she lived with a partner, but her partner went to work in the tropics and did not return for unknown reasons, abandoning his household 12 years ago and leaving four children. Currently her children are economically dependent on her. She was able to study through primary school and lives in her own house, which is rustic and made of adobe and is located in Tiraque province. Her main activity is agricultural production. Each year she produces an average of 60 loads of potatoes, 40 loads of broad beans (green), and 16 of whole barley. She plants these crops on her own lands, which are approximately 3 hectares and are located north of the town of Tiraque. She does the farm work with the collaboration of her children, neighbors, and temporary laborers. Now she is asking for a loan to buy organic fertilizer (chicken manure) in order to plant more potatoes and increase her production, and thus have more income to bring her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer (chicken manure)

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: Monsieur Ousmane vit dans l’une des communautés rurales sénégalaises. Il est marié et  évolue dans le secteur des services depuis déjà plusieurs années.par ailleurs il s’active en même temps dans le secteur du commerce  et pratique la vente de charbon de bois depuis 2010.Les revenus que lui procurent ses deux activités lui permettent de supporter les frais de location de chambres et de nourriture pour  sa famille de même que les frais de scolarité de sa famille. Il est membre du guichet de l’UIMCEC de la localité ou il habite. Il sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de charbon de bois qu’il va revendre afin de fructifier d’avantage ses revenus. Son objectif est consolider son épargne car il a l’intention de développer dans le futur son activité de commerce et augmenter son chiffre d’affaire.
texts.en: Mr. Ousmane lives in a rural community in Senegal. He is married and has worked in the service sector for a number of years. He has also been in the business sector selling wood coal since 2010. The revenues from his two businesses allow him to pay for rent, food, and schooling fees for his family. He is a member of his local UIMCEC office. He is asking for a loan of 300,000 fr. so that he can buy wood coal that he will resell in order increase his revenues. His goal is to consolidate his savings, as he would like to develop his business and increase his sales volume in the future.

loans.use: buy wood coal for resale.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
El señor Oscar Tiene 36 años, vive en pareja con la señora Blanca, con quien tiene un hijo, se dedica a la fabricación de vigas y tirantes hace un año, los cuales vende a particulares y empresas constructoras.
El señor Oscar tiene moldes propios para realizar esta actividad y los transporta en un camión que tiene. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de varillas de hierro, arena, piedra triturada y cemento para aumentar su producción y cumplir la demanda de pedidos que tiene, sus ventas las realiza al contado y a crédito.
Comenta que gracias a su trabajo da a su familia todo lo que necesitan y que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de privaciones. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder crecer.
texts.en:
Oscar is 36 years old. He lives with his partner Blanca and their son. He's been working in the manufacturing of beams and braces for a year now, that he sells to individuals and construction companies. 
Oscar uses molds for this activity and transports the finish product on his truck. He is requesting a loan to purchase iron rods, sand, crushed stone and cement to increase production and meet his customer's demands. He makes sales in cash and credit. 
Thanks to his works he is able to provide for his family so they don't have to go through any hardship. He is thankful for the opportunity he is getting to grow.

loans.use: to purchase iron rods, sand, crushed stone and cement

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, compost, and foliar applications, in order to care for her coffee plants.

loans.name: Camilo

texts.es:
