Thus, she serves her community by assisting the elderly who do not have anybody to care for them. To provide for herself, Ruvimbo is currently renting a stall at a local flea market and selling products such as second-hand shirts, t-shirts, trousers, skirts and baby clothes to the community. She has been running this business for 18 months and has managed to provide for her family. Ruvimbo really loves her business and would like to expand it.
She would very much appreciate a Kiva loan in order to increase her stock and improve sales. Her hope is to grow the business and open her own store one day. This will bring stability to her business and will enable her to further her education, as well as provide for her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: To increase her stock of clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more inventory to help increase sales and grow her business.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is young woman currently residing in Mt Darwin, Zimbabwe where she volunteers as a Camfed Learner Guide and actively encourages attendance and retention of children in school through life skills education and home visits. Caroline also rents a stall at the local flea market where she sells clothes, bags and shoes. She started her business in 2013 so as to support herself and her children since she is the breadwinner. She is very pleased with what she has achieved so far in her business and would like to expand it.

The Kiva loan will assist her to stock up on jackets, shoes, shirts, skirts, dresses, bags and shoes to sell. She hopes to raise enough money to continue to support her family.

loans.use: To buy clothing and shoes to sell from her stall.

loans.name: Tarisai

texts.en:
At the age of 21, Tarisai is already an experienced entrepreneur in Mt Darwin District, Zimbabwe. She has four years of experience in the retail industry. Her business is based at a table at the local flea market where she sells products such as handbags, shoes, jeans, skirts, tracksuits and T-shirts. It has enabled her to support her family and send her two children to school. Tarisai volunteers in schools, counseling students and teaching entrepreneurship skills to school graduates.

With the Kiva loan, she will purchase handbags, shoes, jeans, shirts, skirts, tracksuits and T-shirts to increase her stock. This would improve her business considerably and take her one step closer to her dream. This will bring stability to her business that will enable her to secure her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase more stock.

loans.name: Rutendo

texts.en:
Rutendo is a 29-year-old married mother of two children living in Mt Darwin District, Zimbabwe. She is an active member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae organization, which is involved in empowering school graduates to reinvest into the community. She operates a small piggery, which is the only one in the vicinity. She loves her business and feels that if given a chance it could grow big.
The Kiva loan will enable her to expand her business by purchasing a sow. She hopes to create employment in her community and improve her family’s living standards.

loans.use: To buy a sow.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
At the young age of 17, Sandra is a single young woman living in the Guruve District of Zimbabwe. She inspires young women in her community to be entrepreneurs so that they can one day become financially independent. Sandra is already a self-made entrepreneur and she started her poultry business in 2013 after noticing an increase in demand for Rhode Island chickens with lean meat. The local community appreciates her business as they are able to buy the nearly 150 chickens that Sandra is able produce every 6 weeks. While the business has proved to be profitable, Sandra would love to improve it considerably. 
With this Kiva loan, Sandra will be able to buy more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase the production of her business.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks and chick feed

loans.name: Chenai Sylivia

texts.en:
Chenai is a 24-year-old young business woman. She is single and lives in the Mt. Darwin District of Zimbabwe. She volunteers in schools disseminating health information to students. To support herself, Chenai is currently operating a business buying and selling new and secondhand clothes. She sells clothing such as jackets, shirts and shoes at her local flea market. She started the business when she finished secondary school and it has enabled her to assist her family when they encountered financial difficulties.

Chenai plans to use the Kiva loan to purchase a bale of clothes. This will boost her business tremendously and increase her clientele since purchasing a bale means she will have a variety of products to offer. She loves her business and dreams of opening a boutique.

loans.use: to purchase more stock.

loans.name: Yama

texts.fr:
YAMA  est née  en Septembre 1987 à KADIANA, une des sous- préfectures de la 3ème Région administrative du Mali. Mme YAMA est mariée et sans enfant, elle réside à FAKOLA dans une famille nucléaire.
Mme YAMA s’est vite intéressée aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat et vente de poissons. Sa vente se fait à FAKOLA.  
Fort de  ses 2 années d’expérience dans le domaine, elle collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  troisième  prêt.
Mme YAMA compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 20 cartons de poissons. EIle s’approvisionne à FAKOLA. EIle effectue ses ventes au comptant  à une clientèle composée d’hommes.
Mme YAMA espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 120.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en:
Yama was born in September 1987 in Kadiana, a sub-prefecture of the third administrative region of Mali. Ms. Yama is married and childless, and resides in Fakola in a nuclear family.

Ms. Yama soon became interested in income-generating activities including the purchase and sale of fish. Her sales are conducted in Fakola.

With over 2 years' experience in the business, she collaborates with Soro Yiriwaso to increase her working capital, so she can satisfy an increasing number of customers. She is on her third loan.

Ms. Yama intends to use the loan to buy 20 boxes of fish. She resupplies in Fakola, and conducts her sales for cash to a clientele composed of men.

Ms. Yama hopes to attain monthly profits of 120,000 CFA francs, which will serve to support the family and repay the loan, and be reinvested in the business.

loans.use: buy fish

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe   BENKADI   sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  41 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KELEKELE, commune de TOUSSEGUELA une des sous- préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur premier prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.
Mme NANA (3ème sur la photo de la  gauche vers  la droite) compte acheter avec son prêt 1 sac de maïs et 1 sac de mil. Elle vend quotidiennement au marché, à la maison et est très sollicitée surtout le jour de foire.Elle s’approvisionne à  KELEKELE et à KOLONDIEBA. Elle vend au comptant et parfois à crédit à une clientèle mixte.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 10 000FCFA.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkadi group are married women who on average are 41 years old with four children, all living in polygamous families in Kelekele, in the Tousseguela townshp, one of the sub-prefectures in the third administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution so they can carry out their activities at any time. They are on their first loan with the institution and intend to reimburse it in full.

Ms. Nana (third person in the photo from left to right) will use her loan to buy one bag of corn and one bag of millet. She sells daily at the market and from her home, and is quite in demand, especially on market fair days. She resupplies in Kelekele and Kolondieba. She sells for cash and sometimes on credit to a mixed clientele.

She hopes to achieve average monthly profits of 10,000 CFA francs. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also help her husband with daily expenses

loans.use: buy cereal

loans.name: Benkelema Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe   BENKELEMA  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  48 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KELEKELE, commune de TOUSSEGUELA une des sous- préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur premier prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.
Mme  CHATA  (1ère sur la photo de la  droite vers  la gauche) compte acheter avec son prêt 3 colis de friandises. Elle vend quotidiennement au marché, à la maison et est très sollicitée surtout le jour de foire.Elle s’approvisionne à  KELEKELE  et à KOLONDIEBA. Elle vend au comptant et parfois à crédit à une clientèle mixte.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 10.500FCFA.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkelema group are married women who on average are 48 years old with five children, all living in polygamous families in Kelekele, in the Tousseguela townshp, one of the sub-prefectures in the third administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution so they can carry out their activities at any time. They are on their first loan with the institution and intend to reimburse it in full.

Ms. Chata (first person in the photo from right to left) will use her loan to buy three packages of candy. She sells daily at the market and from her home, and is quite in demand, especially on market fair days. She resupplies in Kelekele and Kolondieba. She sells for cash and sometimes on credit to a mixed clientele.

She hopes to achieve average monthly profits of 10,500 CFA francs. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also help her husband with daily expenses

loans.use: buy candy

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen is 36 years old and married with three children, who are in school, Aileen works very hard to provide for them.

Aileen's business was devastated by super typhoon Haiyan that swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Aileen is taking out a bridge loan to restart her general store business.

Aileen has requested PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to restart her general store business.

She is using the new loan to stock up on a variety of goods to resell.

Aileenis committed to rebuild, and in future would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 34 years old, single.

She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Jocelyn has been raising pigs for 3 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Wendsongdo De Koukin Yaar Group

texts.fr:
Mme TENE représente le groupe WENDSONGDO DE KOUKIN YAAR. Célibataire, elle est mère d’un enfant âgé de 10ans. Il va à l’école.
Mme est coiffeuse et vend des mèches et pommades depuis 12ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10. Ses clients sont les femmes et jeunes filles.
Elle veut s’acheter 50paquets de mèches, 20tissages et 30boites de pommade. 
Mme veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Elle ambitionne acquérir une parcelle.
texts.en:
Ms. Tene represents the Wendsongdo de Koukin Yaar group. She  is the single mother of a 10-year-old child, who goes to school.

She is a hairdresser and has been selling hair extensions and ointments for the past 12 years. SHe gets her supplies from the Sector 10 market. Her clients are women and young girls.

She wants to buy 50 packages of hair extensions, 20 hair weaves, and 30 boxes of ointment.

She wants to reinvest her profits in her business, and aims to acquire a plot of land..

loans.use: buy 50 packages of hair extensions, 20 hair weaves and 30 boxes of ointment.

loans.name: Thandiwe

texts.en:
Thandiwe is a young woman aged 25 living in Mt Darwin District, Zimbabwe with her parents.  She is a member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae organization, where she is actively involved in empowering school graduates to reinvest into the community. She operates a small retail shop in her community where she sells a variety of grocery products such as soap, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, juice, salt and mealie meal. The store is conveniently located and it is the only one in the vicinity.

The Kiva loan will enable her to expand her business by increasing her stock and her sales. She hopes to create employment in her community and improve her family’s living standards.

loans.use: To increase her inventory to grow her business.

loans.name: Mellisa

texts.en:
Melisa is a 20-year-old woman living in Mt Darwin District, Zimbabwe.  She is a member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae organization and is actively involved in empowering school graduates to reinvest into the community. She operates a small retail shop in her community where she sells a variety of grocery products such as soap, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, juice, salt and maize meal. The store is conveniently located and it is the only one in the area.

The Kiva loan will enable her to expand her business by increasing her stock and her sales. She hopes to create employment in her community and improve her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her store

loans.name: Zain

texts.en: Zain is 21 years old. She is a single lady living i na sector in Jordan called Irbid with her family consisting of 7 members. She is a university student majoring in Business Administration, and she is in her third year. Zain is planning to work in her study field after graduation in order to support her family financially as they are facing financial crisis which is not helping them in paying her upcoming semester fees. Beacause of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Sanad

texts.en: Sanad is 25 years old. He lives with his family which consists of 8 members. Sanad is a university student majoring in Finance. He is in his second year. Because of his since of responsibility, he is planning to work in his study field after graduation to support his family financially. But he doesn't have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. Because of that, heh as applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is 21 years old. She is a single lady living in a sector in Jordan called Karak with her family that consists of 7 members. She is a university student majoring in Math, and she is in her second year Her since of responsibility made her plan to work in her study field after graduation in order to support her family financially as they are facing financial crisis which is not helping them in paying her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Amani

texts.en: Amani is 18 years old. She is a single lady living in a sector in Jordan called Baqaa with her parents and only brother. She is a university student majoring in Nursing, and she is in her First year which is the beginning of her study journey. Amani is planning to work in her study field after graduation in order to support her family financially as they are facing financial crisis which is not helping them in paying her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Alioune

texts.fr: Monsieur Alioune est un maitre tailleur qui exerce l’activité depuis plus de 6ans. Il est marié et père de famille responsable de la gestion de la nourriture familiale. En même temps c’est lui qui supporte les frais d’eau et d’électricité de son foyer de même que les salaires de ses employés. Il démarre chaque jour sa journée a 9heures le matin pour ne rentrer  chez lui qu’a 22 heures la nuit. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC ou il a déjà remboursé 3 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 400 000 prévu pour l’achat d’une nouvelle machine plus performante et avoir un fonds de roulement afin de mieux développer son activité de couturier. Il a comme ambition d’épargner de l’argent pour acheter un terrain dans le futur qu’il pourra construire petit a petit. Actuellement il vit dans la maison familiale et souhaite dans un avenir proche être plus indépendant.
texts.en:
Mr. Alioune is a master tailor who has been in business for over six years. He is married and responsible for managing the family's nutrition. At the same time he deals with his homes' water and electricity bills, as well as his employees' salaries.

He starts every day at 9 am and returns home at 10 pm. He is a member of one of UIMCEC's branches, where he has already repaid three previous loans.

He is requesting a loan of 400,000 (XOF) to buy a more powerful sewing machine and to have some working capital so he can further develop his tailoring activity.

His ambition is to save money and in the future buy a plot of land, on which he can build little by little. Currently he lives in the family home and would like in the near future to become more independent.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine and fabrics with his working capital

loans.name: Razan

texts.en: Razan is 19 years old. She is a single lady living in a sector in Jordan called Madaba with her three siblings and her parents. She is a university student majoring in finance, and she is in her First year. Razan is planning to work in her study field after graduation in order to support her family financially as they are facing financial crisis which is not helping them in paying her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Heyam

texts.en: Because Heyam is a conservative lady, she asked husband to take her place in the picture. Heyam is 26 years old. She is a married lady and a mother of 3. Her husband works in agriculture. Heyam decided to be a second provider for the family after the financial crisis her husband has been facing. She started selling birds, chicken and their products 1 year ago. Now that her project was profit, she is planning to expand it by purchasing pidgins and other types of birds to attract more customers. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To purchase pidgins and other birds for her business

loans.name: Ivy

texts.en:
Ivy lives in the town of Mt Darwin, Zimbabwe where she volunteers at local schools in her community as a Camfed Learner Guide teaching life education skills. Ivy also rents a stall at the local flea market where she sells clothes, bags and shoes. She started her business in April of last year so as to support her three siblings since she is the family’s primary source of income.

Ivy is very proud of what she has achieved so far in her business and would like to it to expand with the assistance of a Kiva loan. The Kiva loan will assist her to stock up on jackets, shirts, skirts, dresses, bags and shoes to sell. She hopes to raise enough money to provide for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her market stall

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity is a young woman aged 24, married with one child and living in the Mt Darwin District of Zimbabwe. She is a member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae organization, who is actively involved in empowering school graduates to reinvest into the community. To support herself, Purity operates a small retail shop in her community where she sells a variety of grocery products such as soap, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, juice, salt and mealie meal. The store is conveniently located and it is the only one in the vicinity. 
The Kiva loan will enable her to expand her business by increasing her stock and raising her sales. She hopes to create employment in her community and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase more stock.

loans.name: Doreen

texts.en:
Doreen is a 19-year-old married woman who lives with her husband in Mt Darwin, Zimbabwe. She gives back to the community by assisting the elderly who are in need of extra care. Doreen also rents a stall at the local flea market where she sells clothes, bags and shoes. She started her business in April of last year as a way to support her two siblings. 

Doreen is very proud of what she has achieved so far in her business and would like to expand it with the help of a Kiva loan. The Kiva loan will enable Doreen to stock up on jackets, shoes, shirts, skirts, dresses, bags and shoes to sell. She hopes to raise enough money to support her two siblings.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her market stall

loans.name: Mostafa

texts.en:
Mostafa is a 22 years old single young man from Gaza city. He lives with his family in a very humble house. His big brother works as an employee in a local firm where he gets a low income. Mostafa is a student in his last semester where he studies Mathmatics. he is a very clever student. Mostafa would like to finish his study and find a job to help his family. 
Mostafa took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his study. by taking this loan, Mostafa will be able to do his home works and write the reports easily. 
Mostafa appears in the photo with his new laptop

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his study.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 19 years old single young man from Gaza city. He lives with his family in a very humble house. His father works as an employee in a local firm where he gets a low income. Ibrahim is a student in his second year where he studies Business adminstration.  Ibrahim would like to finish his study and find a job to help his family. 
Ibrahim took a Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his study. by taking this loan, Ibrahim will be able to do his home works and write the reports easily. 
Ibrahim appears in the photo with his new laptop

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his study

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz Maria es una clienta de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.

Luz Maria tiene 69 años, esta casada y tiene hijos, pero ya todos son independientes. Desde hace 37 años, tiene un comedor de comida oaxaqueña. En su negocio, cocina todos los días 9 guisados diferentes. Se la pasa todo el día en la cocina trabajando, pero esto le ha servido para construir su casa, pagarle la universidad a sus hijos y tener estabilidad económica. Ella esta pidiendo el préstamo para pintar y hacer algunas mejoras en su casa. Se considera una persona muy responsable y le gusta honrar sus compromisos.
texts.en:
Luz Maria is a client of Kubo Financiero, and this is her story.

She is 69 years old, married, and has children who have now left home. For 37 years she has run a restaurant selling local dishes. Every day she cooks nine different casseroles. She spends the whole day working in the kitchen, and the money she earns has paid for a house, the university education of her children, and provided her with financial stability.

Luz Maria is seeking a loan to paint and make improvements to her house. She is considered to be a very responsible person who likes to keep her promises.

loans.use: Buy paint and make improvements to her house

loans.name: Hedaya

texts.en:
Hedaya is a 22 years old single young lady from Gaza city. She lives with her family in a very humble house. Her father works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. Hedaya is a student  where she studies Dental laboratory.  Hedaya would like to finish her study and find a job to help her family. 
Hedaya took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her study. by taking this loan, Hedaya will be able to do her home works and write the reports easily. 
Hedaya appears in the photo with her new laptop

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her study.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stockings

loans.name: Tariro

texts.en:
Tariro is a 20-year-old business woman who is married and living in Guruve, Zimbabwe. She owns a grocery shop where she sells food items such as cooking oil, sugar, salt, mealie-meal, sugar beans, matemba (sardines), biscuits, sweets and maputi. Tariro inspires young women in her community as both a Camfed Learner Guide working to teach students life skills that can help improve their wellbeing and as an entrepreneur. She has been running her business for the past year and has managed to employ one person during that time. 

Tariro will use this Kiva loan to expand her business by increasing her stock. She hopes to grow the business and increase its profitability to better provide for her family’s needs and provide for other vulnerable children in the community

loans.use: to increase her stock

loans.name: Tsitsi

texts.en: Married with three children, Tsitsi is a Cama member who is running a shop selling of clothes in her local community in Guruve District in Zimbabwe. She sells skirts, blouses, trousers and jeans. Tsitsi is also a Camfed Learner Guide at a local secondary school where she teaches students about their well-being. This load would also assist in reducing costs and increasing sales and profits. She is very passionate about helping the community and loves working with kids through counseling and assisting them whenever she can. When she is not delivering sessions at school, Tsitsi will be busy at her flea market. She will make bulk purchases of the skirts, blouses, trousers and jeans she sells with the requested Kiva loan.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing stock.

loans.name: Tecla

texts.en:
At the young age of 19, Tecla is already an entrepreneur who rents a small shop selling groceries such as  cooking oil, sugar, salt, mealie-meal, sugar beans, matemba (sardines), biscuits, sweets and stationary in Guruve, Zimbabwe, where she lives. She started the business in 2012 as a mobile market and she is very pleased with how far she has come. Tecla actively inspires young women in her community to become economically empowered as an entrepreneurs. 

Tecla will use this Kiva loan to expand her business by increasing her stock. She hopes to grow the business and increase its profitability to better provide for her family’s needs as well as create employment in her community.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery stock

loans.name: Moud

texts.en:
Moud is a 21-year-old single young woman from the Mt Darwin district of Zimbabwe. She is a committed volunteer in her community, actively helping to keep children in school through life skills development because she believes that they have a chance in life when they make informed choices. Moud is currently operating a poultry business which she started in 2013. She wanted to have a stable source of income and found that poultry was a profitable business to start at that moment. 

The Kiva loan will assist her in purchasing chick feed and broiler chicks to increase her production and boost sales. Improving her business will help her to increase profits to pay school fees for her siblings.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks.

loans.name: Winnet

texts.en:
Winnette is a 27-year-old young woman living in Guruve, Zimbabwe. Winnette actively assists the elderly and less privileged as well as volunteers in schools teaching life skills education. To earn an income, she sells jackets, shirts, shorts, skirts, jerseys and trousers in the local market. She has managed to cater for her family’s needs during the time she has been running the business. The Kiva loan will enable her to increase her stock and thus expand her business. 

Winnette would love to create employment opportunities for her community one day if her business can expand. The loan from Kiva will directly benefit Winnette, her family, and the community at large.

loans.use: to increase her stock of clothing items.

loans.name: Llanqac  Illary Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Llanqac Illary” en la ciudad del Cusco. 

Dorotea tiene 45 años de edad y es padre y madre de sus cuatro hijos, (En la fotografía la socia está levantando la mano). 

Dorotea es una persona carismática y amable que sale adelante pues su actividad económica principal es la venta de comida típica de la región como arroz con pollo, arroz tapado, pollo al horno, chicharrón y otras cosas mas, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, verduras, aceite, carne, fideos y otros más.  
  
Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios se dedican a la elaboración de artesanía, tejidos, joyas y otras se dedican a la venta de cosméticos y a brindar servicio de transportes.
   
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends in Cusco joined together to form the "Llanqac Illary" Communal Bank. 

Dorotea (the woman on the right in the photo raising her hand) is 45 and both a mother and father to her four children. 

Dorotea is a kindhearted and charming person who runs a business preparing and selling typical regional foods such as rice with chicken, arroz tapado [rice layered with meat], roasted chicken, fried meat, and other dishes. Dorotea needs a loan to purchase supplies, including bags of rice, vegetables, cooking oil, and noodles.  
   
The Llanqac Illary Communal Bank members are always looking for opportunities to improve their situations and strive each day to ensure a better future for their children. Some members make crafts, textiles, and jewelry while others sell cosmetics and provide transportation.   

All of the Llanqac Illary members are grateful for the opportunities that loans provide them,  and are committed to making payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, including bags of rice, vegetables, cooking oil, and noodles.

loans.name: Alfa

texts.en:
Alfa is a 19-year-old woman who lives in the town of Chikomba West, Zimbabwe. 

Alfa is an aspiring entrepreneur running a home-based hair salon. She started this business when she finished school. She acquired training and experience from working in her friend’s hair salon, but she wanted to be financially independent as a woman and be in a better position to empower other young women like her. She has successfully run the business for 6 months and would love to expand it.  She inspires young women in her community as an entrepreneur and a devoted carer for the elderly. She would like to move the business to the growth point and increase her customer base.

The loan will enable her to open her own hair salon and purchase a hair dryer, rollers, ceramic iron or tongs and hair products needed in her salon. Her hope is to provide for her family and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to open her own hair salon and purchase equipment and hair products.

loans.name: Mirirai

texts.en:
Mirirai is a 26-year-old woman who lives in the town of Chikomba west, Zimbabwe. She is married and a mother of one. 

Mirirai is an aspiring entrepreneur running a home-based hair salon. She started this business when she had her child. She acquired training and experience from working in her friend’s hair salon, but she wanted to be financially independent in order to support herself and her child. 

She volunteers as a Camfed Learner Guide where she teaches life skills education and assists students with their studies. She would like to move the business to the growth point and increase her customer base. 

The loan will enable her to open her own hair salon and purchase a hair dryer, rollers, ceramic iron or tongs and hair products needed in her salon. Her hope is to provide for her family and improve her standard of living and send her son to a better school.

loans.use: to open her own hair salon and purchase equipment and hair products.

loans.name: Clara

texts.en:
Clara is 23 years old and lives in the Nyanga District of Zimbabwe. She volunteers in schools helping students form and maintain study groups to promote cooperative learning. She started a business in 2013 to  sell shirts, dresses, shoes and jackets at the local market. She really loves her business and would like to increase her sales volume in the future. 

Clara seeks a Kiva loan to purchase more shirts, dresses, shoes and jackets for her business. She intends to use the proceeds to improve her standard of living and through the expansion of the business, create employment in her community.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for her stock.

loans.name: Munaishe Nyasha

texts.en:
Munaishe is 20 years old and lives in the Nyanga District of Zimbabwe. She volunteers in schools helping students form and maintain study groups to promote cooperative learning. 

She started a business selling shirts, dresses, shoes and jackets at the local market when she finished school. She has successfully run the business for six months. She really loves her business and would like to increase her sales volume in the future. 

Munaishe seeks a Kiva loan to purchase more shirts, dresses, shoes and jackets. She intends to use the proceeds to improve her standard of living and through the expansion of the business, create employment in her community.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for her stock.

loans.name: Nomatter

texts.en:
Nomatter is a 26-year-old married woman with one child and lives in the Chikomba West District of Zimbabwe.  

She volunteers in schools in her community offering guidance and support to students through life skills education.  She has successfully run a poultry project for 1 year which produced about 200 broiler birds every 6 weeks.  She sells them to the local residents. She started the business when she lost her job.  

Poultry production is a thriving business in her community. Judith would very much like to increase her sales volumes and become a supplier to major super markets such as Food World. Nomatter will use the Kiva loan to purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production. This will enable her to improve her family’s standards of living.

loans.use: to purchase more broiler chicks and feed to increase her poultry production.

loans.name: Talent

texts.en:
Talent is a 24-year-old single young woman living in the Chiredzi District of Zimbabwe who helps young people in her community by conducting life skills education classes. In addition to being a community role model, she started her poultry business in 2012 after noticing an increase in demand for broiler chickens. Talent's business currently produces about 115 chickens every six weeks and are sold to the local customers. 
 
Talent knows that she could sell more chickens each month if she could invest in growing her business. However, all her income is needed to provide for her two children who are dependent upon her. With this Kiva loan, she will be able to grow her business by buying more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production. 

With this investment in her business, her profits will increase and she will be able to care for her two children and keep them in school.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks and chick feed.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 21-year-old single woman  residing in Nyanga. She is a volunteer Camfed Community Health Trainer and Learner Guide who strives to improve the health and well-being of her community. She actively encourages attendance and retention of children in school through home visits. 

Mary also rents a stall at the local flea market where she sells clothes, handbags, and shoes. She started her business in 2013. She realized that this was a lucrative business that can start with any budget.  Mary is very pleased with what she has achieved so far and would like to expand her business. 

The Kiva loan will enable her to restock jackets, shoes, shirts, skirts, dresses, and handbags to sell. She hopes to raise enough money to continue her  education.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her stock.

loans.name: Winnie

texts.en:
Winnie is an 18-year-old young woman living in Guruve Zimbabwe. Winnie actively assists the elderly and less privileged as well as volunteering in schools teaching life skills education.  

She has a retail business where she sells jackets, shirts, shorts, skirts, jerseys and trousers in the local market center.  She also sells plastic products such as water jugs, plates and dishes. She has managed to cater for her family’s needs during the time she has been running the business. 

Expanding her business is Winnie’s dream. However, she does not have enough resources to do so at the moment. A loan from Kiva will enable Winnie to increase the stock she has for sale, which will lead to an increase in profits and the ability to expand her business and create employment opportunities for her local community.

loans.use: to increase her stock.

loans.name: Yvonne

texts.en:
Yvonne is a 25-year-old married businesswoman with 2 children.  They live in Nyanga, Zimbabwe. She runs a mobile business where she sells frozen popsicles and drinks to local residents in her community.  She started the business in 2012 as a hobby and has come to love it. 

Yvonne inspires young women in her community as both a Camfed Learner Guide who teaches students about their well being and as an entrepreneur.  

With this Kiva loan, Yvonne will purchase more inventory of treats and soft drinks. With her profits, she hopes to expand her business to include cosmetics and other items. An increase in income will enable her to support herself and improve her family’s well being.

loans.use: to purchase more refreshments to sell.

loans.name: Tariro

texts.en:
Tariro is a 31-year-old  business woman from Ruwangwe,  Nyanga district. She is married and has two children. 

Tariro volunteers in her community, actively helping to keep children in school through life skills development because she believes that they have a chance in life when they make informed choices. Tariro operates a poultry business which she started when she discovered it to be a lucrative business in her village.

The loan will assist her to purchase chick feed and broiler chicks to increase her production and boost sales. Improving her business will help her to increase profits to pay school fees for her siblings.

loans.use: to purchase chick feed and broiler chicks to increase her poultry production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goods for her stock.

loans.name: Nesta

texts.en:
Nesta is a 32-year-old young woman. She is a mother of 2 and currently resides in Chikomba west Zimbabwe. 

Nesta actively assists the elderly and less privileged in her community as well as volunteering in schools as a Camfed Learner guide, teaching life skills education. To earn an income, she sells jackets, shirts, shorts, skirts, jerseys and pants in the local township. She has managed to cater for her family’s needs during the four months she has run the business. 

A loan from Kiva will enable her to increase her stock of clothing and expand her business. With an increase in profits, Nesta wishes to create employment opportunities in her community.

loans.use: to purchase more stock.s

loans.name: Fredys Obdulio

texts.es:
Fredys tiene 43 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen 4 hijos de los cuales solo dos estudian en la escuela.
Fredys trabaja en el tanque de agua de la comunidad, ya tiene 9 años de dedicarse a este rubro, también es agricultor pues siembra maíz y además tiene  ganado. 
Él solicita este préstamo a CrediCampo, para comprar abono, fertilizantes y también ganado. 
Fredys desea poder darles el estudio a sus hijos para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Fredys is 43 years old. He  studied until the third grade. He is married. His wife is dedicated to household duties. They have four children. Only two of them attend school. 
Fredys works at the community's water tank. He has been dedicated to this work for nine years. He is also a farmer. He grows corn and he also has livestock. 
He is requesting this loan from CrediCampo to purchase fertilizer and livestock.
Fredys wants to be able allow his children to study so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers and livestock.

loans.name: Primrose

texts.en:
Primrose is a 19-year-old single young woman who lives in Chikomba west District.  

As an active member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae network, Primrose empowers school graduates like herself to reinvest into their community. In addition, she operates a small retail shop in her community to sell a variety of grocery products such as soap, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, juice, salt, and mealie meal. The store receives regular customers as it is the only store in the vicinity. 

The Kiva loan will enable her to expand her business by increasing her stock and raise her sales. She hopes to improve her family’s living standards and further her education.

loans.use: to purchase  more stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock.

loans.name: Dúo El Duraznal Group

texts.es:
DUO EL DURAZNAL
Doña Gregoria es originaria de la aldea Xetzac, Tecpan, ella tiene 62 años de edad, ella se dedica a la agricultura ella cultiva tomates, repollos, chiles y otras hortalizas ella cuenta con un pequeño invernadero donde realiza sus actividades y también se dedica a la crianza de animales.
Desde hace años doña Gregoria se dedica a estas actividades ya que es el medio que ella tiene para salir adelante.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposo y al apoyo de sus hijos ella sigue realizando sus actividades, con el crédito que ella recibió lo invirtió en compra de insumos para agricultura.
El sueño de ella es ampliar mas su negocio para mejorar su calidad de vida, obtener mejores ganancias para un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
DUO EL DURAZNAL
Gregoria is originally from the Xetzac village in Tecpan. She is 62 years old. She is dedicated to farming. She grows tomatoes, cabbage, chiles and other vegetables. She has a small greenhouse where she works. She also raises animals.  Gregoria has been dedicated to these activities for many years since this is the way she gets ahead. 
Thanks to the support from her husband and her children, she can continue working. With the loan she received, she invested in the purchase of farming supplies. 
Her dream is to expand her business in order to improve her quality of life and obtain better earnings for a better future.

loans.use: buy animals to raise.

loans.name: Allahverdi

texts.en:
Allahverdi is 49 years old and has been married for 18 years. His family is from the Fuzuli region and they live in a refugee hostel.  Allahverdi’s family has been an IDP (internally displaced peoples) from their native land Agdam, for 20 years. 

Allahverdi’s wife is a tailor. They have two sons and a daughter. The oldest son is in the eleven class, another son attends the ninth class, and their daughter attends the first class of medical college. 

Allahverdi has been  a taxi driver for many years. He wants to support his business and has applied for 800 AZN to buy new wheels for his car. 

He is greatly thankful to Kiva organization for their help.

loans.use: to buy new wheels for his car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a shaving chair and change his shop's glass facade.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
La socia Maria Isabel se dedica al negocio de salon de belleza,la socia realiza cortes de cabello,tintes y ondulaciones,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el salon de belleza.La socia solicita le credito para comprar tintes y tijeras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is in the beauty salon business. She does haircuts, hair dyeing and curling, and works from 8.00am until 4.00pm. She has been in the business for four years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her beauty salon.

Maria Isabel is requesting a loan to buy hair dyes and scissors.

She is very happy about the loan and is committed to repaying it.

loans.use: to buy hair dyes and scissors.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es: La socia Rufina tiene 42 años es doltera y tiene 2 hijos,la socia se dedica al trabajo de limpieza,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años trabajando y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar utiles escolares como cuadernos,libros y lapiceros.
texts.en:
Rufina is 42 years old, single and has two children. She makes a living as a cleaner, working from 8.00am till 7.00pm. She has been working as a cleaner for several years and is doing well. Rufina's dream is to own a grocery store.

Rufina is requesting a loan to buy school supplies, such as notebooks, books and pens.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, such as notebooks, books and pens.

loans.name: Elmer Alberto

texts.es:
Elmer de 34 años de edad estudió hasta bachillerato, está casado y su esposa se dedica  a los oficios domésticos, tienen tres hijos y dos de ellos estudian en la escuela. 


Elmer trabaja como promotor de salud en su comunidad desde hace 13 años, además trabaja también en la agricultura. 


Él necesita muchísimo este préstamo para comprar veneno, abono y fertilizantes para los trabajos agrícolas. S

Su sueño esforzarse muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos y brindarles el estudio.
texts.en:
Elmer is 34 years old. He studied until his bachelor's degree. He is married and his wife is in domestic work for a living. They have three children and two of them study in school.

Elmer has worked as a community health worker for the last 13 years. He also works in agriculture.

He very much needs this loan to buy pesticide, manure, and fertilizer for the agricultural work.

His dream is to get ahead in life and provide his children the opportunity to study.

loans.use: to buy pesticide, manure, and fertilizers for agricultural work.

loans.name: Mallikarjuna- Herkal Group

texts.en:
Parvati is based in Herakall village, Bagalkot, Karnataka. Her name is the name of a goddess and wife of Lord Shiva. A few years back Parvati joined a local NGO called “Future Greens.” Earlier, she was hesitant to take loan from this NGO. After completing the training conducted by them on sheep and goat rearing, her confidence got boosted and she started a dairy farm.

Parvati is seeking a loan to purchase a buffalo for her dairy farm. An additional buffalo will give up to eight liters of milk per day. She sells milk at 18 to 20 Rs per liter every day.  

She and her husband also work in agriculture as laborers. She has three children: two sons are laborers in agriculture fields and a daughter is married. Her family is basically dependent on agriculture.
 
Parvati (the lady who is standing with raised hand) is the president of “Mallikarjuna” Joint Liability Group (JLG), which consists of five members. Agriculture and farming is the main source of income and they all are toilers like Parvathi. They all are seeking additional capital to expand their businesses.

Parvati and her fellow group members are hoping to get good profits and that their children get good educations and jobs in the future.

loans.use: to purchase buffaloes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine, an overlock sewing machine and an iron.

loans.name: Greens Mahalakshmi - Jalageri Group

texts.en:
Vatsala, 45, lives in Jalageri village, Bagalkot, Karnataka.  She and her husband work as day laborers in agriculture fields. Apart from that, she raises lambs and goats. She is a mother of two daughters who are both married. The couple is illiterate and is facing difficulty in day-to-day life. 

Vatsala’s family is dependent on rain to grow crops on their land as it is very is dry.  Since farming doesn't generate a steady income, she started her own animal business, which consists of a lamb, a goat and a ram. She wants to raise and sell them. This business helps her earn extra income. She is requesting a loan to expand her business.
 
She is a very hardworking and confident woman. Vatsala wants to prove her ability in her village. Currently she is staying in a rented house. Vatsala’s dream is to have a home of her own, and she is saving her profits for the same. 

Vatsala (the lady with her hand raised in the picture) is leader of “Greens Mahalakshmi” Joint Liability Group (JLG). The group consists of five members who also have similar problems. So they all got together and are asking for this loan to grow and have a better life.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 3,500 bricks in order to build a room.

loans.name: Anita Daysi

texts.es:
La socia Anita Daysi trabaja como profesora y tambien se dedica al negocio de venta de tarjetas de cumpleaños y matrimonios,la socia trabaja desde las 3:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia por medio de su trabajo y negocio sale adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vende tarjetas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar tarjetas de cumpleaños y matrimonios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Anita Daysi works as a teacher and she also has a business selling cards for weddings and birthdays. She works from 3:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. Through her work and her business she gets ahead. Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell cards. She is asking for the loan to buy cards for birthdays and weddings.

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy cards for birthdays and weddings.

loans.name: Dúo Canaán Group

texts.es:
DUO CANAAN
El señor Luis Jeronimo de 30 años, soltero,  desde hace 2 años posee una Tienda  ubicada en el Tejar, que a base de esfuerzos logro establecer y mejorar su vivienda, a través de su negocio el  ha mantenido y  a sacado adelante a su familia.
El sueño de don Luis es poder mejorar la calidad de su vida y la de su familia a través del microcrédito que está solicitando a FAPE; con el préstamo quiere comprar productos de consumo diario  para seguir creciendo con su tienda.
texts.en:
CANAAN DUO

Luis Jeronimo is 30 and single. For two years, he has had a store located in El Tejar. Through his hard work he was able to open it and improve his housing. Through his business he has supported and gotten his family ahead. 

Luis' dream is to be able to improve his and his family's quality of life through he micro-loan that he is asking FAPE for. With the loan, he wants to buy products for daily consumption to keep growing his store.

loans.use: to buy products for daily consumption to sell.

loans.name: Margarita Lucia

texts.es: Margarita es una señora de 40 años de edad, ella vive en la casa de su madre con su hija de 18 años, su hijo de 21 años, su nieto de 4 años y su madre, el hijo se encuentra asistiendo al sindicato de choferes y su nieto asiste a un centro infantil mientras ella se va a trabajar,  Margarita es una señora muy trabajadora que se dedica 5 años a atender su negocio en el que vende fritada, pollo asado, cuero con mote y tostado entre otros, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos alimenticios para venderlos en su negocio, Margarita es una mujer divorciada y su meta es seguir luchando sola  por sus hijos y su nieto para darles todo lo que necesiten.
texts.en:
Margarita is a 40 year old woman who lives in her mother's house with her 18 year old daughter, 21 year old son, her 4 year old grandson and her mother. Her son is currently attending the Drivers' Union and her grandson attends a nursery school while she is working. Margarita is a very hard working woman who has spent the last five years running a business selling fried foods, roast chicken, meat with hominy corn, among other things.

She is going to invest this loan in buying food products to sell them in her business. 

Margarita is divorced and her goal is to continue getting ahead alone to be able to give her children and grandson everything they need.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Jessica Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia es Jessica Elizabeth se dedica al trabajo como profesora,la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este trabajo y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ser mejor profesora.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un artefacto para su casa un televisor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member's name is  Jessica Elizabeth. She works as a teacher from 7:00 a.m. until 2:00 p.m. She has been doing this work for several years and it is going well for her. Her dream is to be a better teacher. She is asking for the loan to buy a television for her house. 

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy a television for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a vehicle to distribute her local Kurdish bread to supermarkets and groceries.

loans.name: José Bernardino

texts.es:
José tiene 34 años de edad, no tiene ningún grado de estudio, está casado y su esposa trabaja vendiendo verduras en el mercado de la ciudad, tiene un hijo que aún no estudia. 

José trabaja en la agricultura, él siembra maíz, trabaja en las fincas de la comunidad, esta actividad la realiza desde que tenía quince años. 

Él necesita del crédito, para trabajar en la agricultura, comprará abono y fertilizantes.
 Su sueño es trabajar y poder mejorar su casa, pues es de lámina y quiere que su familia tenga una vivienda digna y segura.
texts.en:
Jose is 34 years old and has no school degree. He is married and his wife works selling vegetables in the city market. They have a son who is not yet in school.

Jose works in agriculture; he plants corn and works on the farms in the community. He has been doing this work since he was 15 years old.

He needs the loan for his agricultural work, to buy compost and fertilizers. His dream is to work and be able to improve his house, since it is made of sheet metal and he wants his family to have a dignified and safe house.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer for farming tasks

loans.name: Wilson Xavier

texts.es: Wilson tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero, vive  con su madre, su abuelita, su hermana y su sobrina; es un joven responsable que en el día se dedica a  criar chanchos, pollos y otros animales menores y a trabajar en el campo, para pagar el costo del curso del sindicato de choferes al que asiste en la noche, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos, la aspiración de Wilson es mejorar sus ingresos para obtener la licencia de chofer profesional y luego ingresar a la universidad.
texts.en:
Wilson is 21 years old and single. He lives with his mother, grandmother, sister, and niece. He is a responsible young man who works during the day raising pigs, chickens, and other small livestock, and in the fields, to pay the cost of his night class with the drivers' union.

He will invest the loan in buying pigs. Wilson's goal is to increase his income so he can obtain a license to be a professional driver, and later to enroll in the university.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Gabriela Ixchel

texts.es:
Ella es Gabriela, tiene 18 años, es soltera vive con su madre en casa de sus abuelos. Se dedica a la maquila desde hace 4 años al igual que su mamá, la cual le enseño todo sobre confección, compostura y maquila de ropa. Actualmente ella se ha independizado y tiene sus propios clientes y  taller de costura en casa, también maquila para una importante marca de ropa de mujer.
Solicita el préstamo para comprar una máquina de coser (cinco hilos), puesto que ocupa la de su mamá para su trabajo, de esta manera ella  maquilara más rápido y podrá dar prendas de mayor calidad a sus clientes. Sus logros  son que mediante su trabajo ha podido  obtener  una estabilidad económica y tener su taller de costura. Su reto es entrar a la universidad y costear sus estudios. Realmente  Gabriela  merece la oportunidad de seguir preparándose y ampliar su taller, ayudémosle a lograrlo.
texts.en:
Gabriela is 18 years old. She is single and lives with her mother in her grandparents' house. She has made a living for the past 4 years following in the footsteps of her mother, who taught her everything she knows about cutting, sewing, and dressmaking. She now works independently with her own clients and workshop at home. She also sews for an important women's clothing brand.

She is requesting this loan in order to buy a sewing machine (five thread), as she currently uses her mother's one. In this way she will sew quicker and will be able to provide better quality garments to her clients. Her achievements through her work include having obtained financial stability and having her own sewing workshop. Her goal is to go to university and pay for her own studies. Gabriela really deserves the opportunity to continue bettering herself and to extend her workshop. Let's help her achieve that.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a liquefied petroleum gas package as an efficient cooking energy system.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La socia Edith se dedica al negocio de internet,la socia tiene una cabina de internet,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de internet.La socia solicita el credito para comprar una computadora para su cabina de internet.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Edith makes a living running an internet business. She has an internet booth, and she works from 8 am til 6 pm. She has been in this business for a year now and it is going well. Her dream is to extend her internet business. 

She is requesting this loan in order to buy a computer for her internet booth. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her internet booth

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El es Juan, tiene 55 años y  6 hijos, pero solo una pequeña de 7 años depende económicamente de él, vive en unión libre. Inicio desde hace 28 años en la venta de frutas y verduras, actualmente tiene 2 puestos semifijos,  uno lo atiende él y otro un empleado. Empieza a vender a las 7 de la mañana   y termina a las 5 de la tarde. El préstamo lo ocupará para comprar mercancía y ampliar su venta de frutas y verduras.  Responsable con los suyos, se ocupa de la salud de su madre y le ayuda con sus gastos médicos. Formal con sus compromisos financieros, Juan siempre ha cumplido en tiempo y forma, por lo cual se considera una persona solvente.   Sus logros son tener una casa propia y estabilidad económica para solventar gastos personales y  familiares, su reto poner una bodega de frutas,  ya que su  casa se encuentra frente a un mercado.
texts.en:
Juan is 55 years old. He has 6 children but only one young 7 year old girl who is financially dependant on him. He lives a common law marriage. 28 years ago he started selling fruit and vegetables and he currently runs two semi permanent stalls, one of which he runs and the other is run by an employee. He starts selling at 7 o'clock in the morning and finishes and 5pm.

He will use this loan to buy stock and extend his fruit and vegetables sales. Showing he is responsible, he looks after his mother's health and helps with her medical bills. He is committed to his financial responsibilities and has always come through on time, giving him a reputation for being creditworthy.

His accomplishments include having his own house and financial stability to be able to cover personal and family bills. His goal is to set up a fruit warehouse, as his house is located in front of a market.

loans.use: to buy stock for his business.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
Rosa de 48 años de edad, estudió hasta séptimo grado, actualmente es madre soltera de 3 hijos, de los cuales solo dos de ellos estudian. 
Rosa se dedica a la venta de dulces  de conserva en la ciudad desde hace 10 años, y es el único medio con el cual mantiene a sus hijos. 
Ella necesita este crédito para comprar productos para la elaboración de conservas, como lo es dulces artesanales. 
Rosa desea hacer más grande su negocio, para obtener mayores ingresos y ayudar a sus hijos a que se superen y estudien en la universidad.
texts.en:
Rosa is 48 years old and she studied as far as the seventh grade. She is now a single mother to three children, of which only two are in school. 

Rosa has worked selling preserved sweets in the city for 10 years, and this is her only means of supporting her children. She needs the loan to buy products to make preserves, such as artisanal sweets. 

Rosa wants to grow her business, to make a better income and help her children to get ahead and study in the university.

loans.use: to buy artisanal sweets to make preserves

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing, such as pants, shirts, blouses, sweaters, jackets, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, and grit to build a sink with a bath.

loans.name: María Rosaura

texts.es:
María tiene 51 años d edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado de educación básica, está casada y tiene dos hijos que están estudiando en la escuela de la comunidad. 
María tiene un negocio de ropa usada que traen de EEUU, decidió dedicarse a esta actividad ya que considera que le da ganancia negociar con ropa americana usada. 
Ella necesita este crédito para comprar material de trabajo, ropa e invertir más en el negocio. 

Le gustaría muchísimo ampliar el negocio ya que puede llegar a ser la fuente de ingresos de sus hijos en un futuro.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old. She has a basic fourth-grade education, she is married, and she has two children who go to their community school.

María has a business selling used clothing brought from the United States. She decided to work in this business because she thinks that selling trading in used American clothing is profitable.

She needs this loan to buy supplies and clothing and to invest more in her business.

She would very much like to expand her business so that she can become the source of income for her children in the future.

loans.use: to buy supplies and clothing and to invest more in her business.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es: María tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 17 años, 15 años y 12 años de edad. María trabaja atendiendo una cafetería en una empresa cercana a su localidad y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. María desea  mejorar la seguridad de su vivienda dado que no cuenta con puertas y balcones en las ventanas de su vivienda. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una puerta y balcones para proteger sus pocas pertenencias y dar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 40 years old and lives in her own house together with her three children aged 17, 15 and 12. Maria works as a waitress in a coffee shop in a local business and this is how she makes a living and sustains her household. 

Maria wants to improve the security of her house as at the moment it does not have doors or balconies in the windows. Maria is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying a door and balconies to protect the few belongings she has and to provide her family with increased safety.

loans.use: to buy a door and balconies for her house.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad con clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre que `pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza de porcinos en la parte posterior de su domicilio para luego comercializarlo en el mercado de su distrito, también se dedica a la venta de guauyaquil, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de guayalquil para comercializarlo por cortes para arreglos de restaurant y centro de esparcimiento que lo utilizan como arreglos rústicos para un mayor atractivo.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 30 years old. He lives with his wife and children in Morropon district, located in the Province of the same name in Piura Region on the North Coast of Peru. The climate is varied here and the people work in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Wilmer raise pigs at the back of his house which he later sells in the district market. He also sells guayaquil (a bamboo). He has requested a loan of 1500 PEN to purchase a large quantity of guayalquil to sell as cuttings for decorations to restaurants and recreation centers which use them as rustic decorations.

loans.use: to buy  guayaquil (a bamboo) to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es: Con 69 años de edad Rosa es una señora casada, vive con su esposo y una nieta de 15 años ya que la madre de esta chica falleció y los  5 hijos de Rosa  todos ya son casados, esta señora luchadora se dedica a la ganadería desde hace 40 años atrás, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca, la aspiración de Rosa es incrementar su negocio y obtener los recursos necesarios para darle la educación a su nieta.
texts.en:
Rosa, 69 years old, is a married woman. She lives with her husband and a 15-year-old granddaughter, since the girl's mother died and all Rosa's children are already married. This warrior of a woman has been raising livestock for the past 40 years. Her husband works in agriculture.

She will invest the loan in the purchase of a cow. Rosa's goal is to grow her business and obtain the necessary resources to give her niece an education.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: José Martir

texts.es:
José tiene 58 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está casado y su pareja tiene un negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, tienen dos hijos y estudian en la escuela que está cerca de la casa. 

José tiene quince años de trabajar como vigilante de un hotel en la ciudad, trabaja de 4 de la tarde hasta las 6 de la mañana del siguiente día, él fue militar y por eso le gusta y se interesa por su trabajo. 
Él necesita de este crédito para comprar frutas y verduras y ampliar el negocio de su esposa. 
Él sueña con hacer con seguir trabajando muy duro para poder darles a sus hijos el estudio adecuado.
texts.en:
Jose is 58 years old, he studied up to 9th grade. He is married and his partner runs a business selling fruit and vegetables. They have two children who study at a school which is close to their house.

Jose has worked for the past 15 years as a security guard at a hotel in the city. He works from 4 pm until 6 am the next day. He used to be a soldier, so her likes and is interested in his job.

He needs this loan to buy fruit and vegetables and to extend his wife's business.

He dreams of working hard to be able to give his children an adequate education.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables and extend his wife's business.

loans.name: Dúo Amanecer De Santo Tomas Group

texts.es:
Dúo Amanecer de Santo Tomas
Este dúo está conformado por doña María Francisca, ella tiene 33 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa, de dama, caballero y ropa de bebe, en su domicilio donde tiene su negocio, ubicado en Santo Tomas Milpas Altas, desde ya hace 7 años sirve a sus clientes, con diversidad de ropa para el gusto de cada cliente, ella está solicitando el crédito, con el deseo de invertir y sobre todo surtir su negocio, y que con el crédito  piensa comprar, ropa de bebe, y ropa para dama, con el deseo  de incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
'Amanecer de Santo Tomas' Duo

One member of this duo is Maria Francisca, who is 33 years old and makes a living selling women's, men's and babies clothing from her home where she runs her business, in Santo Toman Milpas Altas. She has made a living this way for the past 7 years, providing customers with a great variety of clothing to suit each customer's tastes.

She is requesting this loan in the hope of investing and above all stocking her business. With this loan she wants to buy babies and women's clothing in the hope of increasing her sales.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Dúo Guadalupe De San Pedro Group

texts.es:
DUO GUADALUPE DE SAN PEDRO
A cargo de este grupo está la señora Honoria , quien tiene una pequeña librería en su casa situada en la colonia de la aldea.  Tiene este negocio desde hace 10 años y está muy agradecida con Dios por su negocio. Cuenta incondicionalmente  con el apoyo sentimental y económico de sus hijos mayores las cuales ya trabajan y la apoyan en sacar adelante a sus dos hermanitos.  Doña Honoria tiene la necesidad de hacer un préstamo porque le hacen falta muchas cosas en la librería, como cuadernos de diferentes cantidades de hojas, nylon para forrar cuadernos, sacapuntas, lapiceros, crayones y más.  Es la única librería en el lugar y como está sola en el negocio al lado de sus hijos el dinero que tiene no le alcanza.  Su sueño es tener una librería grande y vender de todo como libros para todos los grados,  espirales y, libros para estudiantes de carrera.
texts.en:
Honoria is part of the group Duo Guadalupe de San Pedro. She has a small bookstore in her house, located in a neighborhood in the village. She has had this business for 10 years and she is very grateful to God for her business. She has unconditional emotional and financial support from her older children, who work and help her to provide for their two younger siblings.

Honoria must take out a loan because she needs a lot of items in the bookstore, such as notebooks with different numbers of pages, nylon to cover notebooks, pencil sharpeners, pencils, crayons, and other items. It is the only bookstore in the area, and as she is alone in the business and has her children, the money that she has isn't enough. Her dream is to have a large bookstore and sell all kinds of things, like books for all levels, spiral binding and books for university students.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell in her bookstore

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Paula tiene 63 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado, está soltera y tiene 3 hijos que ya son mayores de edad. 

Paula tiene 20 años dedicándose a la venta de verduras en el mercado de la ciudad, es una actividad que ella realiza con mucho gusto pues le deja bastante ganancia, además de que son productos que todo mundo necesita. 
Ella necesita el crédito para comprar más frutas y verduras al por mayor. 
Ella sueña con ampliar su negocio para que su familia tenga un medio para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Paula is 63 years old. She studied through second grade. She is single and has 3 children who are already grown.

Paula has been selling vegetables in the city market for 20 years. She does this work with pleasure, since it gives her sufficient earnings, and they are also products that everyone needs.

She needs the loan in order to buy more wholesale fruit and vegetables.

She dreams of expanding her business so that her family has a way to continue working.

loans.use: to buy more wholesale fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Grupo Los Saqras Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “GRUPO LOS SAQRAS” en la ciudad del Cusco. 
Yosi Melani nació en la ciudad del Cusco y tiene 23 años de edad. Su actividad económica de Yosi Melani es la venta de telas y elaboración de textiles, ella es una persona carismática y amable que sale adelante y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar telas y lana. 

Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios se dedican al alquiler de carros, venta de refrescos y  venta de cosméticos. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
This group of neighbors and friends has formed a communal bank "The Sagras Group" in the city of Cusco. Yosi Melani was born in Cusco and is 23 years old. Yosi Melani's occupation is selling and making of textile fabrics.

She is a charismatic and friendly person who gets ahead and this time needs a loan to buy fabric and yarn.

The community bank is formed by several people seeking opportunities all the time to get ahead and with their daily efforts to bring about a better future for their children. The partners occupations are renting cars, selling soft drinks and selling cosmetics.

The partners all appreciate the opportunity offered and have promised to make the payment of their portions according to the deadlines established.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and wool.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa, necesita el capital para invertirlo en la compra de maíz, gas propano y leña por mayor para adquirir la materia prima  a un mejor precio, espera aumentar la producción, tener mayores ventas y mejorar sus ganancias.
Con el crédito anterior se ha mantenido trabajando, ya que la materia prima para el negocio la ha tenido a su disposición, las circunstancias familiares son mejores, su familia se encuentra saludable.
texts.en:
Rosa needs the capital to buy corn, propane gas, and firewood wholesale in order to obtain the raw materials at a better price. She hopes to increase production, have greater sales, and improve her earnings.

With the previous loan she has kept working, since she has had the raw materials for the business available to her. Her family circumstances are better, and her family is healthy.

loans.use: to buy corn, propane gas, and firewood

loans.name: Mariela Yasmin

texts.es:
Mariela de 27 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y su pareja es agricultor, tiene 1 hijo que estudia en la escuela de la comunidad.
Ella se dedica  a la crianza de cerdos  y pollos, el trabajo lo realiza en su casa, ya tiene 5 años de dedicarse a esta actividad. 
Mariela necesita este crédito para comprar pollos, engordarlos y luego venderlos, y así obtener más ingresos para su familia.
Ella sueña con ampliar su negocio y así también aumentaran sus ingresos y su familia estará más segura económicamente.
texts.en: Mariela is 27 years old. She studied until the ninth grade, and has a partner who is a farmer. She has one son studying in a community school.  She works raising pigs and chickens. The work is done at home, and she has more than five years of doing this activity.  Mariela needs this loan to buy chickens to fatten and later sell to get more income for her family.  She dreams of expanding her business and also increasing her income so her family will be more financially secure.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten and then sell

loans.name: Vilma Del Carmen

texts.es:
Vilma tiene 55 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casada y su esposo es agricultor y tiene 1 hijo que estudia en la escuela del cantón. 
Vilma se dedica  a la venta de verduras en la ciudad, ya cuenta con 15 años realizando este trabajo, actividad que decidió desempeñar porque la mayoría de su familia se dedica a lo mismo. 
Ella necesita el crédito para ampliar el negocio, comprará más verduras y podrá abastecerse con la venta.
Vilma sueña con hacer su negocio más grande, poder darle el estudio a su hijo para que llegue a ser profesional.
texts.en:
Vilma is 55 years old. She has a sixth-grade education. She is married, and her husband is a farmer. She has one child who goes to the community school.

Vilma works selling vegetables in the city. She has already been doing this work for 15 years. She decided to get started in this business because the majority of her family earns their livings the same way. 

She needs the loan to expand her business; she will buy more vegetables and be able to meet her needs with the sales.

Vilma dreams of making her business larger and being able to give her son an education so that he can become a professional.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her business and to buy more goods to sell.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel, vive con su compañera de vida, sus hijos ya son independientes, tiene 23 años con su negocio que consiste en vender leña, quesos y bebidas, actividad que le da los recursos económicos para solventar los gastos familiares y le colabora su compañera de vida, por el momento no representa dificultades.
El crédito le servirá para comprar quesos y leña por mayor, con esto fortalecerá su negocio y las ganancias le servirán para cancelar la deuda adquirida y mejorar el estilo de vida, espera ganar más clientes.
Su sueño es mantenerse trabajando e incorporar la venta de gas propano, para mejorar la rentabilidad de su negocio.
texts.en: Miguel lives with his life partner, as his children have now left home. He has run his business selling firewood, cheese and drinks, for 23 years and receives help from his partner.  The business provides the financial resources they need to cover the family's expenses and, at the moment, all is going well. Miguel will use the loan to buy cheese and firewood in bulk so that he can bolster his business and use the income to clear his debt, improve his lifestyle and, hopefully, attract more customers. His dream is to continue working and to start selling propane gas, which will improve the profitability of his business.

loans.use: to buy cheese and firewood in bulk

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
Ana, emprendió hace tres años  por su cuenta la venta de ropa de manera ambulante en las localidades cercanas, posteriormente instalo una tienda en su casa la cual atiende una empleada mientras ella se dedica a vender ropa, trabaja todos los días. Vive con su compañero de vida y tres hijos de 14, 13 y 12 años de edad.
