Utilizara el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de variedad de ropa, detergentes, jabón, bebidas, boquitas, dulces, pan, etc. para tener nueva mercadería a la disposición de sus clientes, espera mejorar sus ventas así mismo también sus ganancias.
Su anhelo es tener un negocio más productivo que le de la estabilidad económica que necesita para cancelar sus deudas y cambiar las circunstancias familiares.
texts.en:
Ana started a mobile clothing-sales business on her own three years ago, selling in nearby areas. Later, she set up a shop in her house, where an employee tends to customers while Ana sells clothing. She works every day. She lives with her life partner and three children, who are 14, 13, and 12 years old. 

She will use the loan to invest in the purchase of a variety of clothing, detergents, soap, drinks, snacks, sweets, bread, etc., in order to have new merchandise available to her customers. She hopes to improve her sales as well as her profits.

Her desire is to have a more productive business that gives her the financial stability that she needs to pay off her debts and change her family's circumstances.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing, detergents, soap, drinks, snacks, sweets, bread, etc.

loans.name: Dúo San Jose El Placer Group

texts.es:
Dúo San Jose el Placer
este dúo esta conformado por la señora Elvira de 55 años de edad, es casada, tiene un hijo que esta estudiando en el colejio de la comunidad donde vive,ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en general,y venta de trastos esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para la venta en ropa.
texts.en:
San Jose el Placer Duo

This duo is made up of Elvira, 55 years old, who is married and has one son who is studying at the school in the community where she lives. She sells general clothing and cooking utensils. She is asking for this loan to buy more merchandise for the clothing sales.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Duo Peniel De Peronia Group

texts.es:
DUO PENIEL DE PERONIA  
Conformado por la señorita Meylin yoleni de 24 años quien es soltera pero una persona quien ha demostrado ser un ejemplo muy leal ella es la segunda  hija de los cuatro que son sus hermanos su mama falleció hace aproximadamente  5 años ella juntamente con su hermana mayor se dedicaron a cuidar a sus dos hermanos pequeños y ella se dedico a estudiar un oficio el cual es cultora de belleza en el cual se desempeña hace aproximadamente 3 años le ha costado salir adelante menciona meilyn pero hasta el día de hoy le da gracias a DIOS porque aunque ha sido lenta la superación y aclientar personas para su negocio cada día da un paso adelante pero ella esta consiente que aun le faltan algunas herramientas para su negocio y es por ello que la señorita meilyn acude a FAPE  para que se le pueda otorgar un crédito para comprar implementos que aun necesita en sus negocio de salon de belleza y de esa manera ella podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes amigos y vecinos y agradece que se le tome en cuenta dicha solicitud
texts.en: DUO PENIEL DE PERONIA was founded by 24-year-old Meylin Yoleni, a single woman who has proved herself very loyal. She is the second of 4 sisters whose mother died approximately 5 years ago. Along with her elder sister, she looked after her two younger sisters.  She also studied beauty therapy and has been working in this trade for about 3 years. She says that it has been difficult for her to get by but she always gives thanks to GOD because, although it has taken time for her to achieve success and build up a clientele for her business, she takes a step forward every day.  She is aware, however, that she still needs some equipment for her business and that is why Meylin has approached FAPE for a loan to buy the equipment she needs for her beauty salon. This will enable her to serve her customers, friends and neighbours better and she thanks them for taking her application into consideration.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for a beauty salon

loans.name: José Dvid

texts.es:
José tiene 26 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos, y con su hijo, además su esposa está embarazada del segundo hijo que ya está a punto de nacer. José solo alcanzó a estudiar hasta 8° grado, ya que su situación económica no era la adecuada para seguir con sus estudios.


 Actualmente se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol y maicillo, esta actividad la realiza desde que tenía 15 años de edad, cuando iba al trabajo con su papá.

El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar los insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, herbicidas e insecticidas, que mejorará los rendimientos en sus cultivos.


Su sueño es tener más ganado lechero, y así poder darles una mejor alimentación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 26 years old. He lives with his life partner who is dedicated to the household duties and his son. His wife is  pregnant with their second child and she is about to give birth. José only reached eight grade since his economic situation was not adequate enough for him to continue his studies.

Currently, he grows corn, beans and sorghum. He has done this work since he was 15 years old when he worked with his father.

He needs the requested loan to purchase farming supplies like fertilizers, herbicides and insecticides since they will improve the crop yield.

His dream is to have more dairy cattle so that he can give his children a better diet.

loans.use: buy farming supplies like fertilizers, herbicides and insecticides.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is a 35-year-old woman from the town of Guindulman, Bohol. She is married and has four children, ages one to eight. Her husband works as a carpenter to support their family. Jocelyn, on the other hand, has been engaged in farming vegetables like string beans and eggplant. She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and groceries for her family, such as one sack of rice, detergent, canned sardines, shampoo and coffee. In the future, Jocelyn hopes to improve her farming so she can continue to support the needs of her children like education and food.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and groceries for her family, such as rice, detergent, canned sardines, shampoo and coffee

loans.name: Sahara Leonor

texts.es: Sahara tiene 23 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su madre. Sahara es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y responsable quien con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado adecuar una pequeña tienda en la cual comercializa variedad de medicinas como: pastillas para el dolor de cabeza, pastillas para el dolor de estomago, jarabe para la tos, algodón, vitaminas y alcohol. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos  por lo que desea mantenerlo activo por mucho tiempo. Con el deseo de abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio para incrementar el inventario y así poder llegar a más clientes. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de medicamentos y lociones para caballeros y damas.
texts.en: 23-year-old Sahara lives with her mother in their own home.  She is an enterprising, hard-working and responsible woman who, as a result of much hard work, has managed to setup a small shop where she sells a range of medicinal products such as: head-ache tablets, stomach-ache tablets, cough medicine, cotton-wool, vitamins and alcohol. The business is her main source of income and so she wants to keep it up and running for some time to come. Because she wants to capture a bigger slice of the market, she has decided to invest in her business by increasing her stock so as to attract more customers. Therefore, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of medicinal products and creams for men and women.

loans.use: to buy medicinal products and creams for men and women.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es:
Ana, por medio de su familia aprendió a elaborar tamales, enredos, yuca frita, tostadas y otros, ya tiene 20 años realizando esta actividad, es madre soltera y tiene la responsabilidad de cubrir los gastos de su hija de 9 años. Por el momento no representa dificultades en el negocio.
Ella utilizara el crédito para comprar una cocina de leña, maíz, pollo, yuca, condimentos, aceite y plátanos, podrá mejorar la rapidez del proceso para elaborar tamales así como también contara con los materiales necesarios que le ayuden a continuar trabajando y mejorando los ingresos para cancelar las cuotas de su deuda adquirida.
Ana aspira a mejorar las utilidades de su negocio para ofrecer a su hija una mejor salud, alimentación, vestuario y apoyarla para que se supere académicamente.
texts.en:
Through her family, Ana learned to make tamales, yucca fried in threads, fried yucca, tostadas, and other items. She has been doing this work for 20 years. She is a single mother and has the responsibility of covering her 9-year-old daughter's expenses. At the moment she does not note any difficulties in the business.

She will use the loan to buy a wood stove, corn, chicken, yucca, condiments, oil, and bananas. She will be able to improve the speed of the tamale-making process and will also have the necessary materials, which will help her to continue working and improving her income in order to make the payments on her acquired debt.

Ana aspires to improve her business' profits in order to offer her daughter better health, nutrition, and clothing, and to help her so that she will excel academically.

loans.use: to buy a wood stove, corn, chicken, yucca, condiments, oil, and bananas

loans.name: José Efraín

texts.es:
José tiene 39 años de edad, está acompañado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y la venta de pescado, y tiene solamente un hijo.


José se dedica a la pesca artesanal, en la bocana la zona, tiene 3 años de realizar esta actividad, la cual es una fuente de ingreso que tiene la familia, el trabajo lo realiza con mucha facilidad porque con el tiempo ha aprendido a mejorar la forma de pescar y gracias a eso tiene una experiencia en esta actividad. Antes de someterse a trabajar en la pesca, estuvo un tiempo fuera del país en donde pudo trabajar y así logró hacer una casa para su familia.



Este crédito lo solicita, para la reparación del motor de su lancha, ya que necesita de un ajuste donde le hará cambio de pistón y otras piezas para dejarlo en buenas condiciones, y continuar trabajando en la pesca que hoy en día es de donde obtiene ingresos

En un futuro él sueña con comprar otro motor para poder ir mas adentro del mar y obtener una mejor pesca, también espera poder ayudar a su hijo con sus estudios y de esa forma pueda salir a delante y superarse en la vida.
texts.en:
Jose is 39 years old, has a wife who takes care of domestic chores and sells fish, and has only one child.

Jose's occupation is small-scale fishing in the estuary area.  He has been working at this for 3 years and it is the source of income for his family.  He is able to do this work very easily because he eventually learned to improve his way of fishing thanks to his experience in this activity. Before becoming a fisherman, he spent time abroad where he could work and thus managed to support his family.

The loan he is requesting, to repair the engine of his boat, is needed to allow him to change the piston and other parts so that they will be in good condition, and he can continue fishing where he currently gets his income.

In the future, he dreams of buying another engine to go further out to sea and get a better catch.  He also hopes to be able to help his child with his studies so he can get ahead and succeed in life.

loans.use: to repair the engine of his boat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Bismarck Benito

texts.es:
Bismarck Benito  vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja como  guarda de seguridad de una empresa del estado.
Don Bismarck está solicitando un crédito a kiva para gastos funerales de su suegra.
Debido a estas circunstancias adquirió deudas en la funeraria y necesita este financiamiento para  pagarle a la funeraria.
A la vez agradece mucho a ceprodel y kiva  el apoyo al facilitarle el financiamiento,  en estos  momento tan difícil  para él y  su familia.
texts.en: Bismarck Benito lives in the city of Managua.  He works as a security guard for a state company.  Bismarck is requesting this loan from Kiva to pay for his mother-in-law's funeral.  Due to these circumstances he is in debt to the funeral home, and he needs this loan to pay the funeral home.  Also, he is very thankful to CEPRODEL and Kiva for their support in providing the loan during this difficult time for him and his family.

loans.use: to cover funeral expenses

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy daily consumption products.

loans.name: Elijah

texts.en:
Elijah lives in Kakamega. Kakamega is located in western Kenya, and is famous for the Kakamega Forest, the only tropical rain forest in Kenya. It is a very good location for beekeeping due to the old growth trees in the forest and concentration of farms in the area, which provides bees with a variety of forage.

Elijah is married and has two children. He is a retired security person, and he now undertakes farming with his wife. They have been farming for 21 years now, and they are currently growing maize, bananas, and cassava, and rearing dairy cattle. Elijah is excited about beekeeping as it will earn him some income, and provide him with honey for medicine.

This is Elijah’s first loan with Honey Care, and he plans to use the proceeds from his beehives to provide for his upkeep. 

Elijah’s hope for the future is to start his own business.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Roger Antonio

texts.es:
Roger Antonio vive en la zona norte de la capital trabaja como  agente de seguridad.
Padre de familia  de tres pequeños hijos en edad escolar.
Don Rogerestá solicitando un crédito a ceprodel para  los gastos de útiles escolares y pagos de colegiatura para que sus hijos puedan asistir  al centro de estudio ya que él es el único sustento de su familia porque su esposa se dedica al cuido de sus hijos. 
Roger agradece la oportunidad  que kiva le brinda a través de ceprodel.
texts.en:
Roger Antonio lives in the area north of the capital.  He works as a security officer.  He has three small, school age children.

Roger is requesting a loan from CEPRODEL for school supply expenses and tuition fees.  This is so that his children will be able to attend the study center.  He is the only support for his family.  His wife devotes herself to caring for their children.

Roger is grateful for the opportunity that Kiva is giving him through CEPRODEL.

loans.use: to pay for school expenses.

loans.name: Dúo El Pedregal Group

texts.es:
Dúo el Pedregal
este grupo esta conformado por la señora Elvia de 59 años de edad, ella se dedica a la Confeccion de ropa para vestir en su casa tiene un taller de de confeccion el cual inicio hace 35 años, cuando tuvo su primer hijo le gusta mucho el trabajo que realiza y le es de gran ayuda para obtener ingresos para apoyar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de telas e hilos para confeccionar ropa de vestir.
texts.en:
Dúo el Pedregal

This group is comprised of Elvia, 59. She works manufacturing clothing. She has her manufacturing workshop in her house which she began 35 years ago. When she had her first child she really liked the work she did and it was a big help to obtain an income to help her husband with household expenses. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase fabric and thread to make clothing.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and thread to make clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase plantains, yucca, oil, propane gas, and bags.

loans.name: Maria Marleny

texts.es:
María, invirtió el crédito anterior en variedad de ropa para caballeros, damas y niños, con lo que cubrió las demandas de los clientes que ya poseía y de los nuevos, sus nuevas ventas le proporcionan la capacidad de cumplir con sus compromisos económicos sin ningún atraso.
Actualmente está solicitando capital para renovar el inventario de su negocio, comprara blusas, vestidos, camisetas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc., para mantenerse en el mercado y seguir apoyando a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria, invested her previous loan in a variety of clothing for men, women and children with which she met the demands of her clients both old and new. Her new sales will allow her to fulfill her financial commitments without delay.

Now she is requesting capital to restock her business inventory. She will buy tops, dresses, t-shirts, skirts, pants, undergarments etc…, to have in the market and continue supporting her family.

loans.use: to purchase tops, dresses, t-shirts, skirts, pants, undergarments etc...

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice lives in Kakamega. Kakamega county is located in western Kenya, and is famous for having the only tropical rain forest in the country. Most farmers in Kakamega grow maize, but sugarcane, papaya, bananas and tea are also popular crops. The variety of crops grown in the region, as well as the abundance of vegetation in the old growth forest, make Kakamega particularly attractive for beekeeping.

Alice is married and has six children. She runs a grocery shop. Both she and her husband practice farming, where they grow sugarcane and vegetables; they also keep dairy cattle. Alice is excited about beekeeping, as it does not require hard labor and it will earn her some income.

This is Alice’s first loan with Honey Care, and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to pay school fees for her children.

Alice’s hope for the future is to buy more dairy cows.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Maria Maribel

texts.es:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado un Cantón muy hermoso, su clima es cálido húmedo su gente es muy amable y trabajadora este Cantón es el punto de llegada de muchos turistas ya que a los alrededores del mismo tenemos muchas hosterías en las que se puede descansar y ser tratados con mucha amabilidad.
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio la señora María una mujer luchadora de 39 años ella es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos que son el motivo por los que cada día se supera, el primero de sus hijos tiene 16 años y el otro 11 años viene de una familia humilde de bajos recursos económicos lo que le impidió estudiar, 
Se dedica a la producción de pollos aprendió de este negocio desde niña con sus padres hoy en día son el sustento de su hogar, trabaja un promedio de 10 horas diarias entre el negocio y el empleo durante este tiempo recibe la ayuda de sus hijos cuando llegan de la escuela, solicita este préstamo para utilizarlo en el negocio construirá más galpones para incrementar la producción, con esta inversión desea mejorar los ingresos económicos y poder darles un buen futuro a sus hijos, la señora María agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado is a very beautiful canton. Its climate is warm and humid, its people friendly and hardworking. This canton is the starting point for many tourists, as its surrounding areas have many inns where one can relax and be treated with great courtesy.

It is in this canton that Señora María lives and has her business. She is a determined 39-year-old woman who is a single mother of two children; they are the reason for which she overcomes obstacles every day. The first of her children is 16 years old, and the other is 11 years old. She comes from a humble family with few financial resources, which prevented her from getting an education.

She works as a chicken producer. She learned this business as a child with her parents; now chickens sustain her household. She works an  average of ten hours a day between this business and her job. During this time, her children help her when they get home from school.

She is requesting this loan to use in her business; she will build more sheds to increase her production. With this investment, she hopes to improve her income and be able to give her children a good future. Señora María is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and to Kiva for the support and the opportunity provided.

loans.use: to build more sheds to increase production.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es: Natividad es viuda desde hace 8 años y tiene 4 hijos Natividad vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Natividad es una mujer jubilada y necesita credito para hacerse unos examenes medicos pues sufre de cataratas Natividad es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Natividad has been widowed for eight years and has four children. She lives in La Paz in a brick and cement house that she owns. 

Natividad is a retired woman and needs a loan to have some medical tests done because she suffers from cataracts. Natividad is the only source of income in her household, which is why she needs help.

loans.use: to get medical tests for her cataract problem.

loans.name: Daysi Carolina

texts.es: Daysi tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 7 años y 6 meses de edad. Ella es una mujer con espíritu emprendedor quien desde hace tres años se dedica a la venta de variedad de frutas como: manzanas, sandías, naranjas, melones y de mas frutas de temporada demandadas por lo clientes. Daysi y sus hijos sobreviven de los ingresos que obtienen de este negocio el cual es muy importante para su economía. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el negocio en la compra de variedad de frutas como: manzanas, sandías, uvas, peras, melones, etc. Dado que desea abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado y así lograr aumentar las ventas e ingresos que le permitan dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Daysi is 25 years old. She lives in her own house with her two children, a 7 year old and a 6 month old baby. She is a woman with an entrepreneurial spirit who for the past 3 years has being selling a variety of fruit like apples, watermelon, oranges, melons, and other seasonal fruit wanted by her customers. Daysi and her children live from the income she makes from this business so it is very important for her finances.

For this reason Daysi has decided to request a loan from FUSAI to invest in her business purchasing a variety of fruits like apples, watermelon, grapes, pears, melons, etc. She wants to corner a larger percentage of the market and thus increase her sales and income which would permit her to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy apples, watermelon, grapes, pears, melons, etc for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for making snacks

loans.name: Juana Margarita

texts.es: Juana Margarita es una joven mujer que habita en un barrio de la zona rural de Juigalpa Chontales, es ahí donde hace varios años produce sus variados y deliciosos panecillos, en especial las riquísimas cosas de hornos que son su especialidad, todos ellos son elaborados en un horno casero de forma artesanal, el cual hace esta labor más cansada. Juana es madre soltera y es gracias a este pequeño negocio que ha podido cubrir las necesidades básicas de sus hijos que están en edad escolar. Todos los días Juana recorre las calles de su ciudad ofreciendo sus productos, que además entrega en algunos comercios de forma permanente. Ella solicita su primer crédito para la  compra de materia prima para elaboración de productos tales como: maíz, queso, azúcar, leña, dulce, clavo de olor y manteca de cerdo entre otros.
texts.en: Juana Margarita is a young woman who lives in a district of the rural zone of Juigalpa, Chontales.  This is where she has been producing a variety of delicious baked goods for several years.  Her specialty is her delicious cosas de hornos [corn cakes].  She makes all of them in a home oven and in the traditional manner, which makes the work more tiring.  Juana is a single mother and it is thanks to this small business that she has been able to afford basic necessities for her school-age children.  Every day Juana goes around the streets of her city selling her products, which she also delivers to a few shops on an established basis.  She requests her first loan to buy inputs, such as corn, cheese, sugar, firewood, sweets, cloves, lard, etc., for making her products.

loans.use: to buy inputs such as corn, cheese, sugar, firewood, sweets, cloves, lard, etc. to make her products

loans.name: Zipporah

texts.en:
Zipporah lives in Kitale, which is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. It is located close to Uganda, and Mount Elgon, an extinct volcano that straddles the two nations and even has a peak at the Kenya-Uganda border. Founded by European settlers in the early 1900s, Kitale originally grew due to its proximity to the Ugandan railway. The area around Kitale is filled with natural forests, and maintenance of tree cover by the area’s residents has helped both preserve the region’s soil and ensured that the area remains good for beekeeping. Kitale is the headquarters of the Kenya Seed Company, whose massive sunflower plantations provide nearby bees with a veritable buffet of high-quality forage.

Zipporah is married and has four children. She runs a boutique. Both she and her husband practice farming. They have been farming for sixteen years now and they are currently growing maize, vegetables, bananas, beans and rearing livestock on their farm. Zipporah is excited about beekeeping as it will provide her with honey for medicine and the bees will help in pollinating their crops.

This is Zipporah’s first loan with Honey Care and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to educate her children and invest in her boutique. Zipporah’s hope for the future is to live a better life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Muidin

texts.ru:
Муйдин молодой семьянин. Ему  26 лет. Имеет одного ребенка.У  него среднее образование. Он живет в далеком от города селе.   Родители Муйдина  содержали семью занимаясь земледелием и  продажей сельскохозяйственной продукции  выращенной на земельном участке принадлежащем их семье. Муйдин вырос   помогая родителям в земледелии.  Хотя у него были способности  к науке но в связи с недостатком финансов он не смог получить высшее образование.  В помощь молодой семье в селе выделили небольшой участок  земли. Так как участок ранее не был обработан Муйдин очистил его от камней  и   теперь собирается приобрести минеральные удобрения и  зерно для того чтобы засеять свой участок и получить хороший урожай. 

Муйдин работает с уверенностью в том, что сможет воплотить свою мечту и даст своему ребенку достойное образование.  По совету знакомых он обратился в «Арванд», чтобы взять кредит для воплощения своих планов. Он планирует купить минеральные удобрения и семена. Муйдин приложит все усилия и опыт накопившийся  с детства по уходу за землей. И уже осенью он ожидает получить хороший урожай , который поможет его молодой семье приобрести уверенность в завтрашнем дне.
texts.en:
Muidin is a young family man. He is 26 years old. He has one child. He has a secondary education. He lives far away from the village town. Muidin's parents supported their family by practicing crop farming and selling the crop they grew on their family's plot of land. Muidin grew up helping his parents with their farming. Although her had a propensity towards science, he was unable to receive a higher education due to financial difficulties. To help his young family, his parents divided off a small plot of land for him. As this plot was previously not cultivated, Muidin cleared all the rocks out of it and now is planning to buy mineral fertilizers and seeds to sow his plot of land and receive a good harvest.

Muidin works with the confidence that he will be able to fulfill his dream and give his child a good education. On the advice of his acquaintances, he requested a loan from "Arvand" to fulfill his plans. He plans to buy mineral fertilizers and seeds. Muidin exerts all of his strength and experience accumulated since childhood in working the land. In the fall, he expects to receive a good harvest which will help his young family gain confidence in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: MARTHA  es divorciada, tiene dos hijos y vive en La Paz en una casa de acabado fino que le pertenece a sus suegros Martha es Comunicadora Social  y corre riesgos porque su fuente de trabajo esta muy alejada de su domicilio por lo que debe tomar varias movilidades  Martha necesita credito para comprar ropa para adultos y dedicarse a la venta de prendas puesto que quiere ganar mejores ingresos Martha es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita ayuda
texts.en:
Martha is divorced. She has two children and lives in La Paz in a nice house that belongs to her parents-in-law. 

Martha is a journalist, which is risky because her workplace is very far from her house and she has to take various forms of transportation. Martha needs a loan so she can buy clothing for adults and work selling garments because she wants to earn a better income. 

Martha is the only source of income for her household, which is why she needs help.

loans.use: to buy clothing for adults and work selling garments.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José tiene 44 años de edad,  está acompañado y su familia está formada por su esposa que se dedica a los oficios domésticos y sus 3 hijos y dos de ellos estudian en la escuela.


José es una persona muy trabajadora, que se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 10 años y es de donde tiene una fuente de ingresos para su familia. Esta actividad la aprendió cuando tenía 15 años, a él le gustaba salir con su padre a pescar porque en ese momento era una diversión, pero sabía que más a delante sería una fuente de ingresos para él  y su familia, años después salía él solo a pescar en un bote, y a medida pasaba el tiempo fue mejorando la actividad.

El crédito que él solicita será destinado para la compra de unas simbra, esto se utiliza para la pesca en aguas tranquilas es decir en bocanas porque está formada por una red y anzuelos. El cliente invertirá en 2 de estas herramientas de trabajo, y en la compra de una lancha que le venden a muy buen precio.

José desea apoyar a sus hijos con el estudio, que salgan adelante y que tengan mejores oportunidades de trabajo. También como muchos clientes de la zona piensa un día tener su propio terreno y su vivienda.
texts.en:
José is 44 years old. He is in a relationship and his family consists of his wife who is dedicated to the household expenses and their three school-age children.

José is a very hard working person. He has been dedicated to artisan fishing for ten years. This serves as a source of income for his family. He learned this skill when he was 15 years old. He liked to go fishing with this father because at that time it was fun. However, he knew that in the future, it would be a source of income for himself and his family. Years later, he went fishing alone in a boat and as time passed, he improved his skills. 

The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase some nets. They are used for fish in calm waters like estuaries since the nets are made from a net and hooks. He will invest in two of these tools for work and buy a boat to sell at a good price.

José wants to help his children with their studies so they can get ahead and have better work opportunities. Also, like many other clients in the area, he thinks about the day when he can have his own land and home.

loans.use: buy a fishing net.

loans.name: Noah

texts.en:
Noah lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya, and at over 6,300 feet above sea level, is one of Africa’s most elevated towns. The rich soil of the area makes it one of the nation's biggest maize producing regions, lending it the nickname of “the breadbasket of Kenya.” Many farmers in the region have started projects planting bluegum trees on their land, which complement the region’s natural forests and provide bees with a variety of food sources. The people around Kitale have been beekeeping for centuries, and the area is dense with strong bee colonies.

Noah is married and has four children. Both he and his wife are farmers. They have been farming for twenty years now and they are currently growing maize and vegetables and practicing dairy farming. Noah is excited about beekeeping as it will earn him some income and provide him with honey for medicine.

This is Noah's first loan with Honey Care and he plans to use the proceeds from his beehives to improve his standard of living. Noah's hope for the future is to live a more fulfilling life.

loans.use: to buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. Originally dominated by English settlers in the early 20th century, the region’s farmland was redistributed after independence. This left Trans-Nzoia one of Kenya’s most cosmopolitan areas, with individuals from a variety of linguistic and ethnic groups living in close proximity. The lush soil of the region ensures that farmers can grow a variety of crops, including maize, sunflowers, sugar cane, millet and beans. Kitale is located near Mount Elgon, East Africa's oldest and largest solitary extinct volcano, whose substantial forest cover makes Kitale a high-potential beekeeping region.

Joseph is married and has ten children. He is a teacher. Both he and his wife are farmers. They have been farming for twenty years now, and they are currently growing maize, beans and horticultural crops as well as rearing livestock on their farm. Joseph is excited about beekeeping, as it will earn him some income, and the bees will help in pollinating his crops.

This is Joseph's first loan with Honey Care, and he plans to use the proceeds from his beehives to develop his farm. Joseph's hope for the future is to live a better life.

loans.use: to buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru:
Гулнора  молодая энергичная  мама у которой двое прекрасных сыновей . Она замужем. Для того чтобы  содержать семью её муж Аюбжон уехал на заработки в Россию.  Несмотря на малый возраст детей Гулнора не сидит сложа руки  и как может помогает мужу. Она занимается надомным трудом, шьет национальные платья . В селе  где живет Гулнора  нет цехов по пошиву одежды и женщины в основном обучается этому ремеслу.  Вот и Гулноре по  жизни помогло то , что она  рано  увлеклась пошивом одежды.  Так как, на селе нет  учреждений и  предприятий  и сложно найти рабочее место приходится  зарабатывать на жизнь оказывая услуги населению. 
 Гулнора хочет взять кредит и приобрести дополнительно швейное оборудование. Она уже сотрудничала с «Арванд» и благодарна, что продукты которые предоставляет это  организация доступны и оказывают содействие в решении проблем. У нее хорошая кредитная история. Она очень надеется, что полученный кредит ей поможет в реализации её плана. Гулнора очень ждет поддержки.
texts.en:
Gulnora is a young, energetic mother to two wonderful sons. She is married. In order to provide for their family, her husband Ayubjon left to work abroad in Russia. Despite the young age of her children, Gulnora does not sit idly and helps her husband as much as she can. She works from home sewing ethnic Tajik dresses. In the village where Gulnora lives, there are no dressmaking shops so women primarily perform this trade. As there are no offices or industries in her village, it is difficult to find employment to make a living from, so she offers her services to the population.

Gulnora wants to take out a loan to buy additional sewing equipment. She has already worked with "Arvand" and is thankful that the products this organization offers are accessible and provide assistance in resolving problems. She has a good credit history. She really hopes that the received loan will help her accomplish her plans. Gulnora anxiously awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy sewing equipment.

loans.name: Elijah

texts.en:
Elijah lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya, and at over 6,300 feet above sea level, is one of Africa’s most elevated towns. The rich soil of the area makes it one of the nation's biggest maize producing regions, lending it the nickname “the breadbasket of Kenya.” Many farmers in the region have started projects planting bluegum trees on their land, which complement the region’s natural forests and provide bees with a variety of food sources. The people around Kitale have been beekeeping for centuries, and the area is dense with strong bee colonies.

Elijah is married and has twenty children. Both he and his wife are farmers. They have been farming for seventy years now and they are currently growing maize, vegetables and bananas and rearing cattle on their farm. Elijah is excited about beekeeping as the bees will help in pollinating his crops.

This is Elijah's first loan with Honey Care and he plans to use the proceeds from his beehives to sustain him in his old age. Elijah's hope for the future is to live to be a hundred years old.

loans.use: to buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Akmal

texts.ru:
Акмал добрый, отзывчивый, умный и целеустремленный мужчина в возрасте 42 лет, женат имеет 2 детей. Он живет в сельской местности. Акмал с юных лет занимается скотоводством. Стаж в этой сфере состовляет 30 лет. У Акмала средне техническое образование и по профессии он плотник. Дополнительным  источником дохода Акмала является плотничество.
 В данный момент Акмал хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить сферу этого бизнеса. Он любит заниматься скотоводством. Жена Акмала работает в дехканском хозяйстве по сезону. В свободное время активно помогает  мужу в разведении скота. Акмал на полученную сумму хочет приобрести скот  для расширения данного бизнеса. Акмал заранее благодарен Арванду за предоставленную финансовую помощь и желает организации и его сотрудникам успеха.
texts.en:
Akmal is a kind, understanding, intelligent and goal-oriented 42-year-old man. He is married and has two children. He lives in the countryside. From a young age, Akmal has practiced cattle breeding. He has 30 years of experience in this field. Akmal has a secondary technical education and is a carpenter by profession. Akmal does carpentry as an additional source of income.

Currently, Akmal wants to increase the size of his herd and expand his business. He loves cattle breeding. Akmal's wife works seasonally on a communal farm. In her free time, she actively helps her husband with cattle breeding. With the received funds, Akmal wants to buy cattle to expand his business. Akmal thanks Arvand in advance for the offered financial support and wishes the organization and its employees all the best.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Invasión Norteña Group

texts.es: Cinco son los integrantes de Invasión Norteña, grupo de préstamos conformado por María del Rocío que lleva varios meses con su tienda de abarrotes y ahora con su crédito ella podrá comprar lo básico para sus clientes como refresos; Anastasia quien se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama y caballero; Cesar quien anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de dulces sin embargo por problemas económicos tuvo que abandonar su pequeño negocio ahora con el crédito que solicitó reiniciará su negocio que le aporta una ganancia en su hogar; Esthela, al igual que María del Rocío tienen una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en la cual ocupará su crédito para comprar productos como refrescos, jugos, verdura, etc. Finalmente Auxiliadora, quien es la representante de Invasión Norteña  en VisionFund, lleva 4 años haciéndose cargo de una tienda escolar. Comenta que recibió una invitación por parte del director de la institución ya que es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora. Auxiliadora ha pensado en ocasiones en dejar esta actividad, pero gracias al trabajo que ha desempeñado en la institución los padres de familia, maestros y alumnos no la han dejado salir ya que cuenta con todas las medidas de higiene requeridas para brindar un buen servicio. Es tanto el trabajo de atender la tienda escolar que recurre a la ayuda de su hija y 3 personas más que le ayudan a atender a sus clientes. Ahora con el crédito comprará dulces, galletas, botanas, jugos, refrescos, agua y  los ingredientes necesarios como jitomates, chiles, carne, zanahorias, papas, entre otras cosas para que sus guisos sigan enamorando el paladar de sus clientes. Auxiliadora explica que le agrada trabajar con los niños ya que aparte de obtener ganancias los alumnos la distraen un rato de los problemas que pudiera tener en algún momento, mientras que con sus ganancias ella puede aportar en los gastos de su hogar y sobre todo puede dar los pagos puntuales a VisionFund. Auxiliadora es una mujer muy trabajadora y también se dedica a la crianza de pollos que de igual manera le dan un ingreso extra en su hogar y le sirven como consumo personal. Muy contenta explica que ella tiene que salir adelante ya sus 3 hijos siempre la están impulsando a seguir hacia delante: Juan Carlos de 11 años, Jesús de 10 años y Citlali de 7 años a quienes quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
The “Invasión Norteña” communal bank is composed of 5 members, one of which is María del Rocío. She has had a grocery store for a number of months and with the loan she can buy basic goods for her customers like soft drinks. Anastasia sells clothing for men and women. Cesar used to sell sweets but had to quit his small business because of financial problems and now with this loan will restart the business to support his household. Esthela has a small grocery store and will use the loan to buy products like soft drinks, juices, vegetables etc.

Auxiliadora who is the representative of the “Invasión Norteña” group for VisionFund has been operating a store in a school. She comments that she was invited to do this by the Director of the institution as she is a responsible and hard-working person. Auxiliadora has considered quitting this work but thanks to the work she has done in the institution the parents, teachers and students won't let her leave as she follows all the required health rules and provides a good service. There is so much work that she has the help of her daughter and 3 other people to help her attend to her customers.

With the loan Auxiliadora will buy sweets, biscuits, snacks, juices, soft drinks, water and the necessary ingredients like jitomates, chilies, meat, carrots, potatoes, etc so that she can provide the dishes that her customers enjoy so much. Auxiliadora explains that she enjoys working with the children and besides making money the students take her away from the problems that she might have at the moment. With her income she can support her family and moreover pay her instalments on time to VisionFund.

Auxiliadora is a hard-working woman who also raises chickens which bring in extra money for her household and provide them with food. She is very content that she has to get her 3 children (Juan Carlos is 11 years old, Jesús is 10 and Citlali is 7.) ahead as she is always striving to progress. She wants to provide them with a higher standard of living and a better future.

loans.use: to buy sweets, biscuits, snacks, juice, soft drinks, water, etc.

location.town: Concepción chico, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro es soltero, vive con sus padres en La Paz en una casa de acabado fino que le pertenece a sus padres que cuenta con todos los servicios, incluso gas domiciliario. Genaro es comunicador social y trabaja hasta tarde Necesita credito para pagar un postgrado en Ciencias de la Comunicación Genaro es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Genaro is single. He lives with his parents in La Paz in a house that belongs to his parents with all the utilities including a gas line. Genaro is a social communicator and he works late. He needs a loan to pay for a postgraduate degree in the science of communication. Genaro is the only source of income in his household so he needs your help.

loans.use: pay for a postgraduate degree in communication science.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Mark

texts.en:
Mark is married and has seven children. He runs a retail business and both he and his wife are farmers. They have been farming for twelve years now and are currently growing maize, beans, bananas, and vegetables. Mark and his wife also rear livestock. 

Mark lives in Kitale, which is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. Originally dominated by English settlers in the early 20th century, the region’s farmland was redistributed after independence. This left Trans-Nzoia one of Kenya’s most cosmopolitan areas with individuals from a variety of linguistic and ethnic groups living in close proximity. The lush soil of the region ensures that farmers can grow a variety of crops, including maize, sunflower, sugar cane, millet, and beans. Kitale is located near Mount Elgon, East Africa's oldest and largest solitary extinct volcano, whose substantial forest cover makes Kitale a high-potential beekeeping region.

Mark is requesting a loan to buy beehives and apiary materials to start beekeeping. He is excited about this as it will earn him some income and provide him with honey for medicine and beeswax. This will be Mark's first loan with Honey Care and he plans to use the proceeds from his loan to expand his beekeeping project. His hope for the future is to successfully earn more income from his farm to sustain his family.

loans.use: to buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Hamid

texts.ru:
Хамид  51 летний энергичный мужчина.  Он женат имеет 3 детей. Занимается Хамид земледелием и садоводством .  У него среднее специальное образование.  Хотя земледелие и садоводство  является основным источником дохода семьи   Хамид  очень любит это занятие, которое дает ему положительную энергию.   Его жена и дети тоже помогают  в обработке земли и всячески  способствуют тому, чтобы  получить хороший доход и тем самым обеспечить достойное существование семьи. 
Хамид вырастил детей и уже имеет внуков но младший сын студент и для того чтобы получить образование необходимы большие финансы.   Чтобы получать  дополнительные средства на образование сына он хочет обработать  новый участок земли и посадить сад, чтобы в будущем  эта земля приносила пользу и радость окружающим. Хамид хочет взять кредит для приобретения саженцев и минеральных удобрений.  Он уже брал кредиты в «Арванде» и у него положительная кредитная история. Хамид  доволен сотрудничеством с Арванд. Очередной кредит  поможет ему воплотить мечту в реальность.
texts.en:
Hamid is an energetic 51-year-old man. He is married and has three children. Hamid practices crop farming and gardening. He has a secondary specialized education. Although crop farming and gardening are the main sources of income for his family, Hamid really loves this work which gives him positive energy. His wife and children also help him cultivate the land and assist in every possible way so that they receive good earnings and thereby provide the family with a life worth living.

Hamid's children are all grown-up and he already has grandchildren. However, his youngest son is still a student and needs more funds to receive an education. In order to receive additional funds for his son's education, Hamid wants to cultivate a new plot of land and plant a garden so that this land can generate value and joy for those around it in the future. Hamid wants to take out a loan to buy seedlings and mineral fertilizers. He has already taken out loans from Arvand and has a positive credit history. Hamid is pleased with his partnership with Arvand. This latest loan will help him brings his dreams to reality.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizers.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. It is located close to Uganda and Mount Elgon, an extinct volcano which straddles the two nations and even has a peak at the Kenya-Uganda border. Founded by European settlers in the early 1900s, Kitale originally grew due to its proximity to the Ugandan railway. The area around Kitale is filled with natural forests, and maintenance of tree cover by the area’s residents has helped both preserve the region’s soil and ensured that the area remains good for beekeeping. Kitale is the headquarters of the Kenya Seed Company, whose massive sunflower plantations provide nearby bees with a veritable buffet of high-quality forage.

Philip is married and has five children. He is a driver. Both he and his wife practice farming, where they keep livestock and bees and they also grow maize. Philip is excited about beekeeping as it will earn him some income and provide him with honey for medicine. He also believes that beekeeping will help in improving the environment.

This is Philip's first loan with Honey Care and he plans to use the proceeds from his beehives to educate his children and invest in his farm. Philip's hope for the future is to be an established farmer and see his children attain high levels of education.

loans.use: to buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El Joven Luis Alberto trabaja en un Instituto   desempeñando el cargo de Docente desde hace trece años  inicia su labores  a las 6.40 am finalizando a las 2 pm de lunes a sábado en  este mismo horario, realiza esta labor para llevar el sustento a su hogar. 

El Joven solicito a Ceprodel un  crédito para mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda como es la construcción de  un baño con sus accesorios  y así tener una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto had been working as a teacher for thirteen years.  He begins working at 6:40 am and finishes at 2:00 pm, Monday through Saturday.  He does this to support his household.

He approached CEPRODEL to request a loan to make improvements to his home’s infrastructure, such as building a bathroom with accessories so he can have a dignified home.

loans.use: to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel es casado y tiene 4 hijos Daniel vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un alquiler Daniel es transportista y necesita credito para reparacion y mantenimiento de vehiculo Daniel es la unica fuente de ingreso en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Daniel is married and has four children. Daniel lives in El Alto in a cement and brick house for which he pays rent. 

Daniel is a taxi driver and he needs a loan to repair and maintain his vehicle. Daniel is the only source of income for his household, which is why he needs help.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his vehicle

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia es casada tiene dos hijos y vive con sus suegros en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de propiedad de sus suegros Claudia vive en La Paz y  trabaja como cajera en una heladeria y necesita credito para refacción de vivienda para darles a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida Claudia recibe apoyo de su marido que es taxista pero son tantos los gastos familiares que el presupuesto no alcanza por eso pide ayuda
texts.en: Claudia is married, has two children, and lives with her in-laws in a brick and cement house that is owned by her in-laws. Claudia lives in La Paz and works as a cashier in an ice cream parlor and needs a loan to remodel the home to give her children better living conditions. Claudia receives help from her husband, who drives a taxi, but the family expenses are so much that their budget can't accommodate the remodel so she is asking for help.

loans.use: to do some home remodeling to provide a more comfortable home for her children.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan vive en La Paz y tiene dos trabajos, Juan esta en una imprenta como prensista y trabaja como conductor de taxi por las noches, Juan es casado y vive con su mujer en una casa que esta en modalidad de renta -anticretico Necesita un credito para mantenimiento de vehiculo, si bien su esposa tambien trabaja, ellos tienen muchos gastos ya que tienen dos hijos por lo que necesitan ayuda para mejorar el negocio del transporte
texts.en: Juan lives in La Paz and has two jobs. Juan works in a print shop, and also as a taxi driver at night. Juan is married and lives with his wife in a rented home. He needs the loan for vehicle maintenance, as his wife works also, they have many expenses as they have two children so they need help to improve his transportation business.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Jose Reynaldo

texts.es:
José, se está satisfechos con los resultados que ha tenido de la inversión del crédito anterior pues conto con los recursos económicos necesarios para ofrecer productos frescos y así mantener a sus clientes satisfechos, sus ventas aumentaros, con los nuevas ganancias ha cancelado sus deudas y mejorado es el estilo de vida familiar.
El nuevo crédito que está solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de conchas, de esta manera tendrá la posibilidad de ir adquiriendo el producto fresco y según sea la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
José is satisfied with the results he has had with his previous loans as it provided him the necessary economic resources to offer fresh products and in this way keep his customers satisfied. His sales increased, and with the new earnings he repaid his debts and improved his family's lifestyle.

The new loan that he seeks will be invested in buying shellfish, and in this way he will have the possibility of continuing to acquire the fresh product according to his customer demand.

loans.use: to buy shellfish.

loans.name: Corina Isabel

texts.es:
Corina, aprendió desde muy joven a trabajar en la crianza de aves de corral, cerdos y la agricultura, actualmente lo hace como una forma de tener ingresos para colaborar en los gastos familiares, para realizar dichas actividades recibe el apoyo de su familia. Vive con su esposo y tres hijas.
Está solicitando un crédito para fortalecer su negocio, invertirá en la compra de cerdos, pollos de engorde y concentrados para alimentarlos, con lo a que aumentará sus ventas así mimo también sus ganancias serán mejores y las utilizara para cancelar las cuotas de la deuda adquirida y mejorar las circunstancias familiares.
Aspira a tener mejores instalaciones para su granja para aumentar el número de cerdos y pollos lo que le dará mejores ventas.
texts.en:
Corina learned from a young age to work raising farm poultry, pigs, and crops. Today she does this for income to help with the family expenses, and she has her family's support in this work. She lives with her husband and three daughters.

She is seeking a loan to strengthen her business, investing in the purchase of pigs, chickens, and animal feed, which will increase her sales and so her earnings will be better. She can then pay her debts and improve her living conditions.

She aspires to have better facilities on her farm to increase the number of pigs and chickens so that she will have greater sales.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens, and animal feed.

loans.name: Luis Armando

texts.es:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado un Cantón muy hermoso, su clima es cálido húmedo su gente es muy amable y trabajadora este Cantón es el punto de llegada de muchos turistas ya que a los alrededores del mismo tenemos muchas hosterías en las que se puede descansar y ser tratados con mucha amabilidad.
En este Cantón vive el señor Luis un hombre luchador de 26 años actualmente es soltero por una mala relación se separó de su conviviente con la que tuvieron un hijo, él tiene 6 años está estudiando en la escuela del recinto la Celica, el  señor Luis trabaja en una hacienda del sector como cortador de palmito siempre le ha gustado el negocio de los pollos por lo que solicita este crédito para emprender en este negocio, el viene de una familia humilde de bajos recursos económicos lo que le impidió continuar con sus estudios, actualmente está por terminar el colegio gracias al esfuerzo y dedicación que ha tenido ya que tiene que trabajar y estudiar, con este crédito espera que mejoren sus ingresos y poder seguir creciendo y mejorando económicamente El señor Luis agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado is a very beautiful zone. Its climate is hot and humid, its people very friendly and hardworking. This zone is at the tip of where many tourists arrive as it is on the outskirts of many hotels where tourists relax and are treated with friendly service.

In this zone lives Luis, a hard-working 26 year old single man, who due to a poor relationship separated from his partner with whom he has a 6 year old son who is studying in school in the town of Celica. Luis works on a farm in the area as a palm cutter. He has always liked the chicken business so he is seeking this loan to start this business. He comes from a humble family of few economic resources, which has impeded his continuing education. Today he is finishing high school thanks to the effort and dedication he has had as he has had to work and study.

With this loan he hopes to improve his income and be able to continue growing and improving economically. Luis is thankful to the Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the provided support and opportunity.

loans.use: to start a business raising chickens.

loans.name: Jose Adan

texts.es:
José, aprendió de su padre a realizar la venta de diferentes especias y medicina natural, hoy en día lo realiza de manera independiente y como fuente de ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su familia, su horario de atención es de 6:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m., José es acompañado y padre de tres hijos.
El crédito que solicita será utilizado para comprar laxantes, reconstituyentes, pastillas para el estómago, tés, entre otros medicamentos de origen natural, así ofrecerá variedad de productos a sus clientes, espera mejorar sus ventas y tener ingresos extras para cumplir debidamente con sus compromisos económicos.
La visión de José es tener un chalet en donde pueda aumentar sus productos también almacenarlo de manera adecuadapara evitar su deterioro y ofrecer una mayor calidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
José learned from his father about selling different types of natural medicines and remedies. Today he is an independent merchant, and this is his source of income to support his family's expenses. He works from 6:00 AM to 3:00 PM. José is married and has three children.

The loan he seeks will be used to buy laxatives, tonics, tablets for the stomach, teas, and other natural medicines. This way he can offer a variety of products to his customers. He hopes to improve his sales and have additional income in order to meet his economic responsibilities.

José's vision is to have a home where he can increase his products and sell them in a proper way to avoid their deterioration over time and offer a better quality to his customers.

loans.use: to buy laxatives, tonics, tablets for the stomach, teas, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to aid in the cultivation of coffee.

loans.name: Vasiliy

texts.ru:
Василий — из Виноградово. Он выращивает картошку, помидоры, огурцы и разные ягоды, которыми потом торгует рямо со своего микроавтобуса в разных точках города и области. Василий работает сам, наемных рабочих нет. У Василия есть 1.5 гектара посаженных ягод, с которых он собирает около 3 тонн урожая за сезон. В бизнесе Василию помогает вся семья — жена и трое детей. 
Сумма в 15 000 гривен нужна Василию для того, чтобы приобрести системы капельного орошения и агроволокно для поля, на котором он выращивает ягоды.  Со временем Василий хотел бы приобрести еще землю, чтобы засеять ее пшеницей.
texts.en:
Vasiliy is from Vinogradovo. He grows potatoes, tomatoes, cucumbers and different berries, which he thereafter sells directly from his van at different sales points in the city and area. Vasiliy works alone, he does not have hired workers. 

Vasiliy has 1.5 hectares with berries, from which he harvests around 3 tons every season. The whole family - Vasiliy's wife and three children - helps him with the business. 

Vasiliy needs 15,000 hryvnia in order to purchase a drip irrigation system and lightweight fabric for covering the field, on which he grows berries. Vasiliy would like to purchase additional land in the future, in order to sow wheat.

loans.use: to purchase irrigation equipment and lightweight fabric for covering his field

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es: Ana tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 13 años de edad. Ella tiene una pequeña tienda en la cual vende variedad de productos como: golosinas, pan dulce, bebidas, recargas telefónicas, cremas, desodorantes y ropa. Este negocio le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y da a sus hijos lo necesario. Ana solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la el negocio en la compra de variedad de ropa, desodorantes y cremas para dama. Con esta inversión espera aumenta sus ventas y mejorar así sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 33 years old and lives in her own home with her 13 year old child. She has a small store where she sells a variety of products such as: candy, pastries, beverages, phone cards, creams, deodorants,  and clothing. This business allows her to support her home and provide for her family's needs. Ana seeks a loan from FUSAI to invest in her business by buying women's clothing, deodorants, and creams. With this investment she hopes to increase her sales and improve her income which will allow her to improve her living condition and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing, deodorants and creams.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, insecticide, and pest-control substances, as well as to pay for labor and land rental.

loans.name: Julia Mabel

texts.es:
Julia, tiene 41  años de edad, vive con su esposo, tres hijos y un nieto, desde hace quince años inicio la venta de tortillas, posteriormente incluyo la venta de productos de primera necesidad y una pupusería, a la fecha no representa ningún problema.
El crédito le servirá para surtir el inventario de su tienda y ofrecer variedad de mercadería a buen precio a sus clientes comprará granos básicos, detergentes, dulces, galletas, aceite, jugos, gaseosas, entre otros productos que sus clientes necesiten.
Para Julia su sueño continuar administrando bien su negocio para tener utilidades que necesita para mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Julia is 41 years old. She lives with her husband, three children, and a grandson. Fifteen years ago, she started selling tortillas, and then later added convenience items and pupusas (stuffed tortillas). To date, she hasn't had any problems. 

The loan will help her stock up on her shop's inventory, and offer a variety of goods at reasonable prices to her customers. She plans to buy basic grains, detergents, sweets, cookies, oil, juices, and soft drinks, among other goods that her customers might want. Julia's dream is to continue running her business well in order to get the money that she needs to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergents, sweets, cookies, oil, juices, and soft drinks, among other goods.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar latas y moldes para elaborar el pan pues las demandas son mayores.
El crédito anterior le fue de mucha ayuda para Rosa tuvo a su disposición los insumos necesarios para la panadería, su la producción aumento, sus ventas son mejores, la cartera de clientes a aumentado así como también su satisfacción. Las condiciones familiares han mejorado un poco.
texts.en: Rosa needs a new loan to buy pans and moulds to make bread as her demands are great. The previous loan was much help to Rosa, as she then had at her disposal the ingredients necessary for her bakery. Her production increased, her sales are better, the number of customers increased as did their satisfaction. Her family living conditions have improved a little also.

loans.use: to buy pans and moulds to make bread

loans.name: Blanca Johana

texts.es: Blanca Johana es una joven mamá de 27 años de edad que habita en la comarca Las Praderas del departamento de Chontales. Desde hace muchos años apoya a su esposo quien trabaja como encargado de un finca ganadera en la misma comarca, juntos han procreados cuatro hijos, de los cuales tres de ellos ya están en etapa escolar. Blanca tiene la visión de convertir su pequeño negocio familiar en un mercadito más surtido y variado, ya que la demanda por sus productos ha subido en los últimos meses y su oferta no compite con otras pulperías. Por tal razón Blanca solicita su primer crédito para la compra de pan, huevo, arroz, jabón de lavar ropa y de baño, caramelos, Galletas, pasta de diente, café, entre otros productos para su incrementar su negocio y obtener más ganancias.
texts.en: Blanca Johana is a 27 year old young mother who lives in the Las Praderas area of Chontales. For many years she has supported her husband, being in charge of the farm, and together raising four children, three of whom are in school. Blanca has a vision to convert her small family business into a well-stocked store with a variety of products, as the demand for her products has increased over the past few months and she can't quite compete with other small convenience stores. Therefore Blanca seeks her first loan to buy bread, eggs, rice, laundry soap, bath soap, candy, cookies, toothpaste, coffee and other products to increase her variety and inventory, thus increasing business and obtaining greater income.

loans.use: to buy bread, eggs, rice, laundry soap, bath soap, candy, cookies, toothpaste, coffee and other products

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos, vive junto a su familia en casa propia, es casado, tiene cuatro hijos de 20, 18, 11 años y uno bebe de 9 meses, en se familia aprendió a comercializar pescado, desde hace 4 años lo desempeña de forma independiente, sale a vender de manera ambulante en su bicicleta por los alrededores de su localidad.
El capital lo invertirá en compra de pescado seco y fresco para aprovechar la temporada de semana santa que las ventas de este producto aumentan, espera tener mayores utilidades y clientes más satisfechos.
Su anhelo es contar con más capital de trabajo para aumentar la mercadería y tener mejores ingresos con los que cubrirá sus compromisos económicos.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his family in his own home. He is married, and has four children aged 20, 18, 11 and 9 months. He learned to sell fish in his family, and he has made a living in this independently for four years. He goes out on his bicycle to sell the fish in his community.

He will invest the capital in buying dry and fresh fish to make the most of holy week, when sales of this product increase. He hopes to boost his earnings and have more satisfied customers.

His dream is to have more working capital to increase his merchandise and make more profits in order to cover his financial commitments.

loans.use: to buy dry and fresh fish.

loans.name: Doris Noemi

texts.es:
Doris, es casada, vive con dos hijos los cuales le colaboran en las actividades con las que obtiene los recursos económicos para cubrir gastos familiares, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, ganado y aves de corral, ella está poniendo en práctica los conocimientos que adquirió de su familia.
Para fortalecer el negocio y también en un futuro comercializar productos derivados de la leche, comprara una vaca, así podrá mejorar la alimentación de su familia y tener ingresos para cumplir con sus compromisos económicos.
Su visión es ir mejorando la rentabilidad de su negocio para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Doris is married and lives with two children who contribute to the businesses from which they obtain income to cover household expenses. She works raising pigs, cattle, and poultry. She is putting into practice the knowledge that she acquired from her family. 

To strengthen the business and, in the future, sell products derived from milk, she will buy a cow. This way, she will be able to improve her family's diet and have income to fulfill her financial commitments.

Her vision is to continue improving the profitability of her business in order to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Arlin José

texts.es:
El Joven Arlin José, es padre un hijo y  trabaja en un Instituto   desempeñando el cargo de Director  desde hace cuatro años  inicia su labores  a las 6.30 am finalizando a las 2 pm de lunes a sábado en  este mismo horario, realiza esta labor para llevar el sustento a su familia.

El Joven  solicito a  Ceprodel  un crédito el que utilizo para mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda como es la compra de puerta y ventana,  dándole  mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Arlin José has a son and has been working as a manager, starting work at 6:30am, and working until 2:00 pm Monday through Saturday.  He does this to support his family.

This young man approached CEPRODEL for a loan to make improvements to his home, such as buying a door and window so he can provide better security for his family.

loans.use: to buy a door and window.

loans.name: Bismark Antonio

texts.es:
Bismark Antonio  vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja  en una empresa de vigilancia.
Casado con una familia compuesta  con sus tres hijos y su esposa  la única fuente de ingreso para su familia es su salario.
Bismark está solicitando un crédito a kiva y ceprodel  para invertirlo en un negocio de venta de comida en su casa por las noches que popularmente  en Nicaragua le llámanos venta de fritanga.
Este proyecto lo quiere llevar a cabo para mejorar los ingreso de su familia ya que su esposa lo va administrar y confiando en DIOS que su negocio va ser prosperados, ya que  los ingreso obtenido solo de su salario  le permite cubrir algunos gastos no los necesario para darle comodidades a su familia .
texts.en:
Bismark Antonio lives in the city of Managua and works in a supervisory company. He is married and has three children. His income is the family's only source of income. 

Bismark is requesting a loan from Kiva and Ceprodel to invest in a business selling food in his home at night. In Nicaragua, this is known as "venta de fritanga".

He wants to carry out this project to improve his family income, and his wife is going to manage the business. He trusts in God that his business will be prosperous, because the income from his salary alone allows him to cover some expenses, but is not enough to make his family comfortable.

loans.use: to sell food.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es:
Joel  de 34 años de edad, estudio un técnico en computación y esta casado, su esposa  es empleada; hasta el momento no tiene hijos y sus padres viven con ellos.


Joel actualmente trabaja  en un taller de reparación de motos, lo hace desde hace 8 años y aprendió este oficio desde niño y luego la carrera que estudio le sirvió como un impulso,  para  tener su propio taller, pero por circunstancias de la vida no pudo seguir costeando su taller; es por eso que hoy en día esta como empleado, se traslada cerca de 6 kilómetros para llegar a su trabajo y entra a las 8:00  am. Y sale a las 5:00 pm. Cuando no hay mucho trabajo, luego tiene que trasladarse a recoger a su esposa y así poder llegar a la misma hora.

Joel utilizara el dinero del préstamo, para terminar de construir su casa ya que en estos momentos la esta construyendo  y el dinero que tiene no le alcanza para terminarla, ademas tiene pensado comprar una motocicleta usada para trasladarse.

Joel sueña con tener un taller propio, tener una vivienda digna , comprar un vehículo para el uso de su familia, él sabe que lo puede lograr, pero necesita la ayuda de Dios y de los créditos.
texts.en:
Joel, who is 34 years old, earned a technical degree in computers and is married. His wife is a domestic employee. So far, they don't have children and his parents live with them.

Joel currently works in an motorcycle repair shop. He has done that for eight years; he learned the trade starting in childhood. Later the degree program he was in served as the impetus for him to have his own shop, but due to life circumstances, he was not able to continue paying for his shop. That's why he is now an employee. He travels close to six kilometers to arrive at his workplace. He arrives at 8:00 a.m. and leaves at 5:00 p.m. When there isn't too much work, he travels to pick up his wife so that they can get home at the same time.

Joel will use the money from the loan to finish the construction of his house; he has been building it recently, but the money that he has is not enough to finish it. In addition, he plans to buy a motorcycle for transportation.

Joel dreams of having his own repair shop, having a decent house, and buying a vehicle for his family to use. He knows that he can achieve this, but he needs help from God and from these loans.

loans.use: to finish building his house.

loans.name: Daihanna

texts.es:
Daihanna es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, es una persona que está luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
Está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad, ya que quiere poder ser útil a las demás personas de la sociedad. Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en las cuotas de su universidad, ya que quiere poder cubrir ese gasto y seguir estudiando de esa manera.
texts.en: Daihanna is from the city of Paraguarí and is one who strives for a better quality of life for her family.  She is studying for a career in accounting because she wants to be more useful to others in society.  She is asking for this loan to pay university tuition so she can continue her education.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro, se siente satisfecho con la facilidad de pago y la buena atención que le brinda la institución, sumado a  eso comenta que el crédito anterior le dio la oportunidad de continuar trabajando y generando los ingresos que necesita para cubrir los pagos de las cuotas así como también ha mejorado el estilo de vida familiar.
Se decidió a solicitar un nuevo crédito para invertirlo en el pago de alquiler del terreno y compra de herbicidas, abono, plaguicidas, tendrá a su disposición la tierra en donde cultivara y los insumos que le ayuden a mejorar la producción.
texts.en: Pedro is very happy with the repayment process and the good customer service of the field partner. He also says that the previous loan enabled him to keep working and earning enough to repay the loan and to improve his family's living conditions. He resolved to ask for a new loan in order to pay rent for the land he uses as well as to buy herbicide, fertiliser, and insecticide. This way, he will have land to work on as well as the necessary supplies to improve his crops.

loans.use: to pay rent for the land he uses and to buy herbicide, fertiliser, and insecticide.

loans.name: Ayuda Mutua Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Ayuda Mutua, se encuentra en el 5º ciclo, todas ellas están trabajando por medio de la ayuda mutua y quieren ayudar a sus familias por medio de ese trabajo unido. Cada una está poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
La Sra. Noelia es la presidenta del grupo, ella es empleada domestica y también realiza manualidades desde su domicilio. Es una mujer muy trabajadora que lucha por salir adelante y dar a sus seres queridos todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
La Sra. Noelia solicita  este préstamo para invertir en sus manualidades, y en la compra de telas, pinturas, hilos, etc., para crear nuevas ideas y variedades. Ella agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de crecer y mejorar.
texts.en: This group is called Ayuda Mutua and is in its fifth cycle.  All of these ladies are working through mutual assistance and want to help their families through this united work.  Each one is putting forth her best effort to improve her quality of life.  Noelia is the group’s president and is a domestic employee.  She also does crafts from her home.  She is a very hardworking woman who strives to get ahead and provide her loved ones with all the things she was not able to have.  Noelia is asking for this loan to buy craft supplies such as fabric, paints, thread, etc. so she can créate new ideas and varieties.  She is grateful for this opportunity to grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Nuevos Horizontes De Jutacaj Group

texts.es:
La señora Marta Alicia es madre soltera. Tiene 30 años de edad. Curso 3 años de educación primaria. Tiene 3 hijos y 1 de ellos va a la escuela. Se dedica a la crianza de gallinas. Inició este negocio por la necesidad de mantener a sus hijos y compro dos gallinas, a la fecha lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de 5 docenas de gallinas y para alimentación de las mismas. En el fururo desea tener una grnaja con gallinas ponedoras.

Las demás integrntes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales domésticos.
texts.en:
Señora Marta Alicia is a single mother, she is 33 years old, and she attended primary school for three years.  She has three children, one of whom attends school.

She raises hens. She started this business because she needed to support her children, purchasing two hens, and to date she has four years’ experience. She organizes a group, and she is requesting a loan that she will use for the purchase of five dozen hens, and feed for them.  In the future she wants to have a farm with laying hens.

The other members of the group raise domestic animals.

loans.use: to purchase chickens.

loans.name: Rene David

texts.es:
René, en esta ocasión el crédito que solicita lo invertirá en comprar abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, una achicadora, semilla, pago de mano de obra y alquilar de terreno, tendrá los insumos que necesita para preparar el terreno y cuidar su cultivo, espera mejorar aumentar la producción de sus cultivos para luego distribuirlos a sus clientes.
Con el préstamo anterior René conto con los insumos agrícolas necesarios para mejorar el cultivo de maíz y pipían, su cosecha fue mucho más abundante y las ventas aumentaron.
texts.en: René will use this loan to to buy fertiliser, herbicide, insecticide, a baler, and seeds, to hire farm hands, and to pay rent on the land he uses. This way, he will have the supplies he needs to prepare the land and to tend to his crops. He expects to see an increase in production so as to have more produce to sell to his customers. Thanks to the previous loan, René bought what he needed to improve his sweetcorn and pipián crops. The harvest was much more bountiful and his sales increased in turn.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser, herbicide, insecticide, a baler, and seeds, to hire farm hands, and to pay rent on the land.

loans.name: David Luis

texts.es:
