David vive en la ciudad de Nazca es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante y es por ello que con mucho esfuerzo trabaja como agricultor desde hace 3 años, el ha sembrado en sus parcelas cebolla y también tuna; él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque le gusta mucho.

David está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar abono, fertilizantes, dar mantenimiento al cultivo, y solventar los gastos de regadío; de esta manera el podrá tener una mejor cosecha y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un terreno propio”.
texts.en: David lives in the city of Nazca. He is a young man who dearly wants to improve his lot in life. This is why he has been sparing no effort in his work as a farmer these past three years. He grows onions and prickly pears. He attributes his success to how much he likes his job. He is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy manure and fertilisers, to care for his crops, and to face watering costs. This will improve the harvest and enable him to keep fighting to make his greatest dream of owning a plot of land come true.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilisers, to care for his crops, and to water them.

loans.name: Carmen Juana

texts.es:
Carmen vive en la ciudad de Huaraz, es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que cada día se esfuerza mucho en su negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, desde hace 4 años; con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y poder sacar adelante a su familia ya que es madre de 3 hijos.

Carmen esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio, especialmente limones ya que es temporada, de esta manera podrá seguir trabajando y mejorando sus ingresos, asi ella seguirá luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Carmen lives in the city of Huaraz. She is a woman who has the drive to succeed. For this reason, she puts forth her best effort each day into her business of selling fruits and vegetables. Carmen has been in this line of work for four years and it has allowed her to generate the income she needs to move forward and to help her family get ahead. She is the mother of three children.

Carmen is grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business, especially limes since it is already the season for them. This loan will enable her to continue working and improving her income. Carmen continues to strive toward fulfilling her greatest wish of having a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business of selling fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Leonardo De Jesús

texts.es:
Leonardo de 55 años de edad, por sus escasos recursos economicos no tubo nungun grado de estudio.  Él era uno de los hermanos mayores de 12 hernanos y tenia que ayudarle a su madre a trabajar; ya que no tuvo el apoyo de su padre. Esta acompañado y su esposa se dedica a trabajar en los queahecer del hogar, sus tres hijos ya estan casados.



Leonardo actualmente se dedica a sembrar maíz y lo ha  realizado desde que eera niño, aprendio este oficio por parte de su patron, le ayuda uno de sus hijos a cultivar.

Leonardo tiene que trasladarce cerca de 5 km en bicicleta, se levanta a las 4:30 am hora de salilda no tiene, debido a que hasta que termina de hacer lo programado regresa a su casa.


Leonardo utilizara el dinero del prestamo,  para pagar el alquiler de las tierras donde ve a trabajar este año, ya que si no lo hace con tiempo otras personas alquilan dichas tierras.
 

Leonardo en un futuro sueña com tener un terreno grande y poder tener empleados a su dispocicion, tener ganado para que en su vejes no tenga que trabajar, quiere comprar un vehiculo para transportar la cosecha, sabe que sera duro, pero con la ayuda de Dios y los creditos lo podra hacer posible, un mayor esfuerzo pero a la vez mejores condicio0nes economicas.
texts.en:
Leonardo is 55 years old, and because of his scarce economic resources he never finished education. He was one of the oldest of 12 siblings and he had to help his mother work, as she wasn't supported by his father. He has a wife, who works in the home, and their three children are already married.

Nowadays, Leonardo makes a living growing corn, which he has done since he was a boy. He learned how to do this from his employer, and he helps one of his children to farm. Leonardo has to travel almost 5km by bicycle. He gets up at 4:30am and doesn't have a set finishing time, as works until he has finished what he needs to do and then returns home.

Leonardo will use the money from the loan to pay the rent for the land he is going to work this year, as if he doesn't pay in time, other people will rent this land. 

In the future, Leonardo dreams of having a large plot of land and employing workers to help him, and buying livestock so that he doesn't have to work in his old age. He wants to buy a vehicle to transport the harvest. He knows that it will be hard, but with the help of God and the loans he can make it happen. This will involve more effort, but at the same time, better economic conditions.

loans.use: to pay the rent for the land he is going to work this year, as if he doesn't pay in time, other people will rent this land.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es: Catarina tiene 30 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 1 año de edad, ella y su familia viven en el municipio de Nahualá, departamento de Sololá, ella obtiene sus ingreso tejiendo telas típicas a mano y lo vende en el mercado, desde hace 16 años se dedica a esta actividad, también cultiva frijol,  Catarina necesita un crédito por la cantidad de Q. 2,000.00 para mejorar su casa, dentro de los planes de Catarina está la de ir mejorando su casa poco a poco y poner un local para vender ropa típica
texts.en: Catarina is 30 years old, and has a 1-year old son. Her and her family live in the town of Nahualá, Sololá department. She makes a living weaving traditional cloths by hand to sell in the market. She has been doing this for 16 years, as well as growing beans. Catarina needs a loan of Q.2,000.00 to make home improvements. Catarina's plans include making improvements to her home little by little, and setting up a a store to sell traditional clothing.

loans.use: make home improvements.

loans.name: María Roxana

texts.es:
María es una señora soltera de 22 años de edad, actualmente vive junto a su hija de dos años de edad, quienes viven en el Departamento de Suchitepequez.
Ella comenta que se dedica a la compraventa de abarrotes en una pequeña tienda que se encuentra ubicada en su vivienda. Desde hace tres años viene desempeñando esta actividad que le ayuda a cubrir los gastos de su familia, ya que las ganancias que obtiene son aceptables. Comenta que este tipo de actividad es bastante rentable porque existe una fuerte demanda en su comunidad.
Ahora ve la necesidad de mejorar su vivienda, así que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 10,000.00 para la compra de materiales de construcción. El préstamo lo pagara con el negocio que tiene actualmente. 
Doña Maria cuenta que uno de sus sueños es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia a través de la labor que realiza.
texts.en: María is a single mother. She is 22 and lives with her daughter, who is 2 years old, in the region of Suchitepequez. She has a small grocery shop at her house. She has been in business for three years and earns enough thanks to the shop that she can pay for household expenses. She explains that the shop is profitable because of the high demand for these products in her neighbourhood. Her house needs repairs, so she asks for a loan of 10,000 quetzals in order to buy construction materials. She will repay the loan thanks to the profits from the shop. María says that one of her dreams is to improve her family's standard of living thanks to her hard work.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy foodstuffs wholesale.

loans.name: Estrellas De Chocanuleu Group

texts.es:
El señor César Agusto es de estado civi casado. De 38 años de edad. Curso 3 años de educación primaria. Tiene 6 hijos y 4 de ellos están estudiando. Se dedica al comercio, a la venta de ropa para bebes y niños. Inició este negocio con un pequeño capital y a la fecha lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utlizará para ampliar su capital de trabajo comprando mercadería como pañales de tela, calcetas, calcetines, camisitas, gorras, frasadas, etc. Desea en el futuro que su negocio prospere y tener un negocio más grande para poder obtener mejores ganancias.

Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio y crianza de animales domésticos.
texts.en:
Sr. César Agusto is 38 years old, married, and has a third grade education. He has six children, four of whom are in school. César Agusto is a merchant who sells clothes for babies and children. He started this business with a small amount of capital and now he has five years of experience.

César Agusto organized a group so that he could request a loan. He will use the money to increase his operating capital for buying merchandise such as cloth diapers, baby booties, socks, caps, blankets, and other items. In the future, he wants his business to prosper and become larger so that he can generate more income.

The other group members engage in trade and raising domesticated animals.

loans.use: to buy various merchandise for his children's clothing business.

loans.name: Wilmer Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Wilmer tiene 26 años de edad, vive en una comunidad en el Oriente de Honduras, vive con su compañera de hogar es padre de 1 hijos y su actividad es la venta de granos básicos como ser maíz y Frijoles. 
Don Wilmer cuenta con más de 5 años de dedicarse  a este tipo de actividad tiene una buena clientela ya que su negocio está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico de alto comercio, nos está solicitando el crédito para la compra de una planta solar porque en su hogar no tienen el servicio de energía eléctrica y espera que esta inversión le sea de mucha ayuda y beneficio para su hogar.
Don Wilmer su sueños es mejorar las condiciones de vida y tener una estabilidad económica en el futuro de el y toda su familia, con el apoyo que reciba del préstamo le contribuirá a lograr sus sueños.

                                                                            
 Trojes, Honduras -Febrero 2014
texts.en:
Señor Wilmer is 26 years old, and lives in a town in the west of Honduras. He lives with his partner and has one child. He makes a living selling basic grains such as corn and beans. He has been working in this business for over five years. He has a good customer base because his business is located in a strategic high trade area.

He is requesting a loan from us to buy a solar power plant because there is no electric power in his home. He hopes that this investment will be very helpful and benefit his home.

Wilmer's dreams are to improve living conditions and create economic stability for him and his family in the future. The support he receives from thie loan will help him to achieve his dreams.

                                                                            
Trojes, Honduras - February 2014

loans.use: to buy a solar power plant for his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase popsicles, ice, and sorbet wholesale.

loans.name: Santiago Enrique

texts.es:
Santiago enrique  vive en la cuidad de Managuacasado con una familia que  esta compuesta por su tres hijos y esposa.
Trabaja en una empresa de vigilancia  desde hace cuatro años donde se caracteriza por ser una persona colaboradora en su centro de trabajo.
Santiago está solicitando un crédito para invertirlo el compra de materiales de construcción como arena cemento, piedrapara hacer la aplicación de un cuarto para bridarle mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en: Santiago Enrique lives in Managua.  He is married and his family is comprised of his wife and three children.  For four years, he has worked in a security company, where he is known as collaborator in his workplace.  Santiago is requesting a loan to purchase building materials such as sand, cement, and stone to construct a room and provide his family with better comfort.

loans.use: to purchase building materials.

loans.name: Bladimiro

texts.es: BLADIMIRO vive en la comunidad de Mojopata y se dedica a crianza de animales menores como cuyes, pollos y gallinas, él pertenece al banco comunal “Sol Naciente de Mojopata” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para los animales como vitaminas. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La comunidad Mojopata está ubicado en distrito de la Challabamba de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú)
texts.en: Bladimiro lives in the community of Mojopata and works rearing small animals like guinea pigs, chickens, and hens. He belongs to the community bank "Sol Naciente de Mojopata" and this opportunity requires a loan to purchase nourishment for the animals, like vitamins. He is thankful for and values the loan, and is committed to making the monthly payments with much responsibility. The Mojopata community is located in the District of Challabamba in the province of Paucartambo, Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy nourishment for the animals, like vitamins.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos, es casada, vive junto a su esposo y sus cinco hijos de 28, 26, 24, 20 y 15 años, desde hace diez años desempeña junto a su familia la siembra de granos básicos y la crianza de ganado, son conocimientos que heredo se sus padres, su ventaja es que siembra en tierras propias y no paga mano de obra por que le colaboran su esposo e hijos.
Con el crédito comprara concentrados y sácate para alimentar el ganado en esta época de verano, será de mucha utilidad para mantener en óptimas condiciones el ganado y mantener la producción de lácteos tanto para consumo familiar como para comercializarlos.
Su sueño es tener un negocio con bases sólidas que le permitan generar los ingresos económicos necesarios para darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y oportunidades de superación académica a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Santos is married and lives with her husband and her five children, who are 28, 26, 24, 20, and 15 years old.  For ten years, she and her family have been growing staple grains and raising livestock for a living.  She inherited this knowledge from her parents.  Her advantage is that she plants on her own land and she does not pay for labor because her husband and children help her.  

With this loan she will buy concentrated feed and grass to feed her cattle for the summer season.  It will be very helpful in keeping her cattle in optimum condition and in keeping up her dairy production for both her family's consumption and for sales.  

Her dream is to have a business with a solid foundation that will allow her to generate the financial income she needs to give her family better living conditions and to give her children the opportunity to better themselves academically.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and grass to feed her cattle

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es: Luz tiene 19 años de edad, ella es madre soltera, vive con sus padres y con su hijo de 2 años, Luz es una chica activa que se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, conejos, chanchos y gallinas; el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes para criarlos y luego comercializarlos, la aspiración de Luz es, ampliar y adecuar las cuyeras para mejorar su negocio y también sus ingresos y así poder darle a su hijo todo lo que le haga falta porque comenta todo lo que hace es para darle bienestar a su hijo.
texts.en:
Luz is 19 years old and she is a single mother. She lives with her parents and her two-year-old son.

Luz is an energetic young woman, who raises small animals such as guinea pigs, rabbits, pigs, and hens. She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of guinea pigs, in order to raise them and sell them later.

Luz’s goal is to expand and adapt the guinea pig houses in order to improve her business, and also her income. Thus, she will be able to give her son anything that he might need, because as she explains, everything that she does is for the well-being of her son.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs.

loans.name: Omayra Jackeline

texts.es: Omayra, es una mujer de 24 años de edad, soltera, tiene dos hijos, una niña de 6 años y un niño de 2 años de edad, Alegre, amable y sobre todo responsable, vive en Maldonado, parroquia de Tulcán. Ella se dedica a la compra venta y crianza de chanchos, esta actividad la viene desarrollando desde hace un año atrás. Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar chanchos, criarlos y luego venderlos. Su sueño es tener su propia casa para darles una buena vida, y además una buena educación a sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Omayra is a 24-year-old woman. She is single and has two children, a six-year-old daughter and a two-year-old son. Omayra is cheerful, friendly, and most of all, responsible. She lives in Maldonado, a parish of Tulcán.

Omayra buys and raises pigs that she can sell. She has developed her business over the past year. Omayra needs a loan so that she can buy pigs that she can raise and eventually sell. Her dream is to have a house of her own so that she can provide a good life for her two children. She also wants them to have a good education.

loans.use: to buy pigs that she can raise for resale.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra es madre soltera, tiene 30 años de edad, ella vive con su madre y sus 3 hijos de 10, 8 y 2 años, los mayores se encuentran asistiendo a la escuela, Sandra se dedica desde hace 10  años a la crianza de animales menores  como conejos, cuyes, chanchos y pollos, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos para criarlos en una chanchera y luego comercializarlos, la aspiración de Sandra es seguir luchando por mejorar su negocio y sus ingresos para que sus hijos sigan estudiando.
texts.en: Sandra is a single mother.  She is 30-years old and lives with her three children, who are 10, 8 and 2-years old respectively, and her mother.  The older children go to school.  For the last ten years Sandra has made her living raising small animals like rabbits, guinea pigs, pigs and chickens.  She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of pigs to raise in a pen and later sell.  Sandra's hope is to keep working to improve her business and her income so that her children can keep going to school.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Dúo Cañadas Group

texts.es:
Dúo Cañadas
este duo esta integrado por la señora Carol Yaquelin de 31 años de edad ella se ha dedica a la venta de pan y venta de granos basicos se ha dedicado a esta actividad desde hace barios años,en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas productos comestibles y asi tener una mayor venta, ya que por medio de las ganancias ayuda a su familia.
texts.en:
“Cañadas” Group

This group includes Sra. Carol Yaquelin. She is 31 years old and has been selling bread and basic staples for several years. Carol is taking this opportunity to request a loan in order to buy more food products. This will enable her to generate more sales, which will provide her with the money she needs to help her family.

loans.use: to buy bread and other food products to sell.

loans.name: Izamar Angelina

texts.es: Izamar Angelina es una joven profesional de 22 años de edad, habita en el barrio Pedro Joaquín Chamorro de Juigalpa Chontales, y con el esfuerzo de su familia y esposo ha logrado culminar la etapa más difícil de su profesión, pero le es muy importante e indispensable recibir su curso de titulación Promoción Social y Humano, el cual le permitirá obtener su título de graduación. De esta manera ella podrá ejercer su profesión y seguir trabajando en la comercialización de productos de higiene personal como una segunda alternativa, con la cual apoyará a su esposo con la educación de su pequeña hija. Izamar solicita su primer crédito para pagar su curso de titulación Promoción Social y Humano en la universidad.
texts.en: Izamar Angelina is a young, 22-year-old professional.  She lives in the Pedro Joaquín Chamorro neighborhood of Juigalpa Chontales and through her family's and her husband's efforts, she was able to complete the most difficult stage of her degree.  However, it is very important and even essential for her to complete her qualifying course in human and social advancement, which will allow her to received her graduating degree.  This will allow her to practice her profession and keep working in personal hygiene sales as a second alternative so she can help her husband with their young daughter's education.  Izamar is requesting her first loan to pay for the qualifying course in human and social advancement at her university.

loans.use: to pay for the qualifying course in human and social advancement at her university

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, se dispone a mejorar el inventario de su negocio, por lo que está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar variedad de ropa y sandalias, con los nuevos productos continuara contando con la satisfacción de sus clientes y mejorando sus ganancias.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a ofrecer nuevos estilos, colores y tallas tanto de ropa como de calzado, sus clientes han aumentado, ha cancelado sus deudas, su familia goza de un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
María is ready to improve her business's inventory, which is why she is requesting a new loan to buy a variety of clothing and sandals.  With these new products, she will keep her customers satisfied and improve her profits. 

She used her previous loan to offer new styles, colors, and sizes of clothing as well as shoes.  Her clientele has expanded; she has repaid her debts; and her family is enjoying a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing and sandals.

loans.name: Willian Alexander

texts.es:
Willian de 30 años de edad,  estudio hasta 9º grado por que sus padres eran pobres y no podían darle un nivel de estudio superior, a parte de eso él tenia que trabajar ya que su familia era muy pobre y no contaba con los recursos necesarios, esta casado y su esposa se dedica alas labores de la casa.

Wilian actualmente se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, él siembra 14,000 metros cuadrados  de maíz y lo aprendió de su padre, ya que desde niño andaba con él, ademas de la agricultura trabaja como albañil y aprendió este oficio debido a que donde él vive solo siembran en el invierno y el resto de meses tienen que trabajar en algo para  sobrevivir; se levanta a las 5:00 am y se traslada a su parcela, luego se va donde trabaja como albañil, hora de salida no tiene debido a que él es el responsable de la obra

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para sembrar maíz y pagar el alquier de la tierra, ya que en estos días donde empiezan a movilizarse por las tierras que alquilan, ya que hay muchas personas interesadas en dichas tierras y quien llega de primero  es quien las consigue para la temporada 
 

Wilian en el futuro sueña con tener una vivienda propia, donde vive es de su padre, ademas sembrar mas y de mejor calidad, tener un vehículo para transportar la cosecha y para movilizar a su familia, sabe que es un mayor esfuerzo pero con la ayuda de Dios y los créditos lo podrá hacer posible
texts.en:
Willian is 30 years old.  He studied until ninth grade because his parents were poor and couldn’t provide him with a higher level of education and besides, he had to work because his family was very poor and didn’t have the money they needed.  He is married and his wife takes care of the household chores.

Currently, Wilian works in farming.  He cultivates 14,000 square meters of corn and learned this labor from his father, whom he accompanied as a child.  In addition to farming, he is a construction worker. He learned this trade because in the area where he lives, he can only plant in the winter, and during the rest of the months, they have to work in something to survive.   He arises at 5:00 a.m. and travels to his parcel of land, then he goes to the construction site.  He doesn’t have a departure time because he is the one responsible for the work.

He is requesting the loan to plant corn and pay the rent on his land. These days they are beginning to mobilize themselves for the lands that they rent, because there are many people interested in these lands and whoever gets there first, is the one who obtains it for the season.

Wilian dreams of having his own home in the future as where he lives belongs to his father.  In addition, he wishes to plant more crops of better quality.  He has a vehicle to transport the harvest and his family.  He knows that it will take more effort, but with God’s help and the loans, he will be able to make it possible.

loans.use: to plant corn and pay rent on the land.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio vive en el distrito de la venta, es un joven humilde y trabajador, se dedica a su labor como obrero agrícola desde hace 1 año,  el realiza la labor de cosecha de espárragos así de esta manera julio puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Julio está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar algunos artefactos para la vivienda donde habita como una cocina, licuadora, entre otros, ya que actualmente no cuenta con ellos y de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y poco a poco poder implementar la vivienda donde habita; así el seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una casa propia, ya que actualmente vive en una vivienda alquilada”.
texts.en:
Julio lives in the District of La Venta. He is a humble and hardworking young man. Julio has been devoted to his job as a farm laborer for the past year. He is responsible for harvesting asparagus. This is the means by which Julio is able to generate the income that he needs to move forward.

Julio is grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, Julio will be able to buy a few appliances for the house where he resides. He plans to buy a stove, a blender, and other items. He currently does not have these appliances, so they will be a great improvement to his quality of life. Over time, he will be able to turn his house into a home. Julio continues to work toward fulfilling his greatest wish of having a house of his own since he currently lives in a rented house.

loans.use: to buy household appliances.

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yanira de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, es acompañada, es domestica, su esposo es agricultor y tienen 4 hijos de los cuales 3 están estudiando. 

Los padres de Yanira eran agricultores y ella les ayudaba a sembrar maíz, ahora junto con su esposo siembre 10,500 metros cuadrados  de maíz tambien se encarga de cuidar a sus hijos y a realizar las tareas del hogar.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar dos novillas y venderlas dentro de un año a un mayor precio. El sueño de Yanira es tener mas animales y que sus hijos estudien y se preparen academicamente.
texts.en: Yanira is 33 years old.  She studied until ninth grade and she is a common-law wife and housekeeper.  Her husband is a farmer and they have four children, three of whom are attending school.  Yanira’s parents were farmers and she used to help them plant corn.  Now, she and her husband plant 10,500 square meters of corn.  She is also in charge of caring for her children and doing the household chores.  She will use the loan to purchase two heifers and sell them within a year at a better price.  Yanira dreams of having more animals and that her children may study and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: purchase two heifers and sell them within a year at a better price.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Emprendedoras está en su ciclo número 4to. del programa de comité de mujeres, donde ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde cada una de ellas está luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Blanca, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, es decir que ella ha ido mejorando a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de sus ventas en la despensa que ella tiene. Comenta que se ha hecho de una clientela bien formada que con mucho sacrificio creció y ha mejorado bastante.
La Sra. Blanca solicita de este crédito para la compra de  insumos y productos variados para la venta  para surtir su negocio , lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Mujeres Emprendedoras is in its 4th cycle of the Committee for Women program.  The members are participating in the elimination of poverty survey, where each of them are working toward improving their families’ quality of life.

Blanca is one of the members who demonstrated level three poverty in the last survey, that is to say that she has been improving through her efforts and continuous work and her sales.  She says that she has become a good client and has grown and improved significantly. 

Blanca is asking for this loan to buy supplies and various products for sale and to stock her business.  This will help her have a solid business plan which will help her increase her income.

loans.use: to stock her business.

loans.name: Koeju Group

texts.es:
Koeju está integrado por 18 mujeres que se encuentran en el 3er. Ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres. Cada una está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder dar un mejor estilo de vida a sus familias.
Mariela es una de las integrantes de este grupo, quien con mucho sacrificio está saliendo adelante. Comenta que por medio de la venta de carbón está luchando por sus seres queridos, y teniendo los ingresos para el día a día. Mariela también comenta que le está yendo muy bien, ya que la venta de carbón cada vez es más querida porque es más económica.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de carbón, ya que por medio de ello podrá seguir con sus ventas, luchando por un futuro mejor. Agradecen todas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
Koeju is made up of 18 ladies in their third cycle of the committee for women.  Each member is putting forth her best effort to provide a better quality of life for their families.

Mariela is one of the group’s members who has been getting ahead with lots of effort.  She says that she is providing for her loved ones and earning a daily income through the sale of charcoal.  Mariela also says that things are going well for her because she is sought after more and more because her costs are lower.

She is asking for this loan to buy charcoal so she can continue making sales and striving for a better future.  She is grateful for all the opportunities she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado La Esperanza está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo que tiene las mejores expectativas para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de su trabajo. Ellas también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, con el cual pretenden conocer la situación de cada una y conforme a ello poder mejorar sus vidas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Susana, quien es una mujer muy sacrificada, que día a día trabaja, en busca de clientes a quien pueda vender sus lencerías. Es muy luchadora y por sobre todo emprendedora. 
La Sra. Susana solicita de este crédito para la compra de artículos de lencería, lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This group is called La Esperanza and is in its first cycle of the committee for women.  It’s a new group with the best expectations to be able to help their loved ones through their work.  They are also part of the elimination of poverty program so as to learn about each of their situations and help improve their lives.

Susana is one of the members and is a hardworking woman who looks for customers every day to sell linens to.  She is very hardworking and above all enterprising.  She is asking for this loan to buy linens so she can solidify her business plan, which will help her increase her income.

loans.use: to buy linens.

loans.name: Lenin Amilcar

texts.es: Lenin tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su esposa,  su hijo de 8 años y su hija de 10 años los cuales se encuentran asistiendo a la escuela, él se dedica a la fabricación de bloque y ladrillo desde hace 15 años y su esposa le ayuda en este trabajo, comenta que les va bien ya que brindan un buen producto y excelente servicio a sus clientes, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y tablones para la fabricación de los bloques, con este negocio Lenin aspira mejorar sus ingresos para comprar una máquina que hace bloque y así su producción sea más eficiente y eficaz y lo  más preciado para él es poder darle a sus hijos todo lo que necesiten.
texts.en:
Lenin is 34 years old and lives with his wife and their children.  He has an 8-year-old son and a 10-year-old daughter, both of whom are in school.  For 15 years he has produced blocks and bricks, and his wife helps him in this work.  It has gone well because he provides a great product and excellent service to his customers.

He is seeking a loan so that he can buy cement, sand, and boards in order to produce the blocks. Lenin aspires to increase his income so that he can buy a machine that produces the blocks, which will increase his production and will be more efficient and effective. The most important thing to him is to be able to provide for his children's needs.

loans.use: to buy cement.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase 5 hectares of land so that they can start a new poultry farm.

loans.name: Yeraldin

texts.es:
Yeraldin  vive en la capital de Nicaragua desde hace 25 años.Su ciudad natal es san juan de Limay  que está ubicado al norte  del país  de donde se vino buscando mejores  condiciones de vida.
Trabaja como agente de seguridad casado en su vivienda los únicos ingreso son los generados por él.
El señor  está solicitando un crédito para invertirlo en  la compra de materiales de construcción  como bloque, arena, cemento, para llevar a cabo la construcción  de un cuarto de habitación para sus hijos  para darles mayor comodidad a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Yeraldin has lived in the capital of Nicaragua for 25 years. His birth city is San Juan de Limay, which is located in the northern part of the country.  He came to the capital in search of better living conditions.

He works as a security guard, he is a married, and he generates the only income for the household.

He is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of construction materials such as bricks, sand, and cement, so that he can build a room onto his house for his children.  He wants to provide a comfortable living space for his kids.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Jose Ilario

texts.es: José Ilario mayor de edad, casado con 6 hijos de los cuales dos están a un bajo su responsabilidad, los otros son independiente económicamente. originario de unos de los municipios de Chinandega ubicado al norte del occidente del país, zona que es muy productiva donde predomina varios tipos de negocios como la ganadería, agricultura, minas de oro, comercios, entre otros, se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable,desde muy temprana edad tuvo que trabajar para aportar con los fastos del hogar, por lo que no logro estudiar una carrera tan solo termina la primaria, Por tanto ha luchado día a día para brindarle un futuro mejor a sus hijos y que logren lo que el no pudo, Jose Ilario es un microempresario propietario de una hermoso taller de ebanistería donde elaboran todo tipo de muebles como:roperos, camas, cómodas, percheros, puertas, sillas, mesas, cunas entre otros mas. sus compras son al contado en comarcas aledañas a su comarca, sus ventas son al contado y al crédito los cuales recupera quincenal lo invertido, hoy en día tiene mas demanda de sus clientes gracias a la calidad de trabajo que el entrega y al buen servicio a sus clientes. El objetivo de este financiamiento es para compra de materia prima para su taller en este caso madera(pochote y caoba), pega, clavos, zener, lacas entre otros, uno de sus sueños es poder realizar mejoras en su negocio para tener mejores condiciones para su trabajo. Jose Ilario agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.-
texts.en: José Llario, an adult, is married with six children, and he is responsible for two of them as the others are financially independent.  He is from one of the Chinandega municipalities, located to the northwest of the country.  The area is very productive and the predominant businesses are cattle raising, agriculture, gold mines, trade, and others.   José Llario is known as a hardworking, responsible man.  From a very early age, he had to work to contribute to the household expenses.  So, he only completed primary school and was unable to study for a degree.  For this reason, he has strived daily to provide a better future for his children so that they may achieve what he could not.  José Ilario is a small businessman, owner of a beautiful cabinetmaker’s workshop where he builds all types of furniture such as wardrobes, beds, bureaus, clothes racks, doors, chairs, tables, cradles, and many others.  His purchases are in cash in the regions surrounding his region.  His sales are in cash and credit, which he collects every fifteen days.  Today, he has more demand from his customers thanks to the quality of the work that he delivers and the good services to his customers.  The purpose of this loan is to purchase raw material for his workshop.  At this time, he will purchase wood (kapok and mahogany), glue, nails, veneer, lacquer, and other materials.  One of his dreams is to make improvements in his business and have better working conditions.  José Ilario is very grateful for the support that the Kiva investors offer to people of limited financial resources.

loans.use: to purchase wood (kapok and mahogany), glue, nails, veneer, lacquer, and other materials.

loans.name: Libia

texts.es: Libia tiene un restaurante en su domicilio donde continua preparando desayunos, almuerzos y cenas y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo verduras y carnes. (Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Libia has a restaurant in her home where she prepares breakfasts, lunches, and dinners. She is seeking a loan so that she can buy ingredients, such as vegetables and meats.

This loan is part of one of the credit lines for the Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa," which enables the members that have a good credit history to receive a special loan - a small loan in addition to their regular loan.

She is thankful for the loan and promises to responsibly comply with the monthly re-payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as vegetables and meats.

loans.name: Adama Diagne

texts.fr: Madame Adama Diagne est une femme mariée qui habite au Sénégal et évolue dans le secteur des services. Elle pratique depuis plus de 20 ans l’activité de couturière. C’est une mère de famille qui grâce aux revenus que lui procure son activité soutient son marie et supporte les frais de transport de ses enfants écoliers. C’est à partir de 10 heures le matin qu’elle démarre sa journée jusqu'à 20heures le soir. Elle est membre du guichet de l’UIMCEC de la localité ou elle évolue. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs  qu’elle souhaite utiliser pour l’achat d’une nouvelle machine plus performante  et de  tissus pour confectionner des draps qu’elle pourra vendre a sa clientèle. Son objectif est d’accroitre ses  revenus afin de continuer a supporter les frais scolaires de ses enfants mais aussi de  parvenir a épargner de l’argent. Son rêve dans le futur consiste a acheter un terrain et ensuite la construire car la maison qu’elle occupe avec sa famille est inondable.
texts.en:
Ms. Adama Diagne is a married woman who lives in Senegal. She works in the services sector. For over twenty years, she has been operating in the sewing business. She is a mother of a family, and thanks to the revenues her business brings in, she is supporting her husband and covering the transportation costs for her children in school. Her day starts at 10 AM and finishes at 8 PM. 

Ms. Adama Diagne is member of the U-IMCEC branch office in her town where she works. She is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs that she would like to  use to purchase a new, more efficient sewing machine and some fabrics to make bed sheets she can sell to her customer. Her goal is to increase her revenues and to continue to support her children's schooling costs but also to be able to save some money. 

For the future, her dream consists of purchasing a plot of land and then building on it, since the house she occupies with her family is subject to floods.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine and some fabrics to make bed sheets to sell

loans.name: Mariothi

texts.es:
Mariothi vive en la ciudad de Nazca, es una mujer muy trabajadora, sobre todo porque es madre de una pequeña a la cual quiere mucho, ya que es su mayor motivación para poder salir adelante; Mariothi trabaja desde hace 2 años en una botica de la ciudad, como técnica, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y poder solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Mariothi está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá solventar algunos gastos personales y mejoras en la vivienda donde habita, de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad e vida y seguir trabajando y luchando por su hija ya que ella desea hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia y darle una profesión a su hija”.
texts.en:
Mariothi lives in the city of Nazca.  She is a very hard-working woman, especially because she has a little one that she loves very much.  Her child is her greatest motivator in order to be able to get ahead.

Mariothi has worked as a technician in a pharmacy in the city for two years.  By doing so she is able to have income in order to be able to get ahead and to be able to pay for the household expenses.

Mariothi is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have provided she will be able to cover some personal expenses and improve the house where she lives.  This way she will be able to improve her quality of life.  She will be able to continue working and struggling for her daughter.  She wishes to make her big dream a reality.  Her dream is to have her own house and to give her daughter a profession.

loans.use: to cover some personal expenses and improve the house where she lives.

loans.name: Katty Mariela

texts.es: Katty tiene 35 años de edad, ella vive con su esposo, una hija de 9 años que asiste a la escuela y un hijo de 14 años el cual está  asistiendo al colegio, Katty se dedica a criar chanchos y trabaja de vendedora en una tienda y su esposo trabaja de chofer, el crédito lo va a invertir comprado chanchos, ya que esta es otra fuente de ingresos para su familia, la aspiración de Katty es tener el dinero suficiente para darle a sus  hijos la alimentación y el estudio.
texts.en: Katty is 35 years old. She lives with her husband and a 9 year old son who attends school and a 14 year old son who goes to Secondary School. Katty raises pigs and works as a salesperson in a store. Her husband works as a driver. She will invest the loan in buying pigs as this is one of the family's sources of income. Her goal is to have enough money to feed her children and provide them with education.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Ruth Noymi

texts.es:
Noymi es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora  que se dedica  a la compra y venta de madera y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. 
(Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Noymi is an enterprising and hard-working woman.  She buys and sells wood.  This time she needs the loan to buy wood.  (This loan is part of the “CrediYapa” line of loans with the Arariwa Association.  It allows the borrowers with good credit history to receive a special loan:  a small loan in addition to their regular loan.)  She is grateful for and values the loan.  She pledges to make her monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a  la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, trigo, verduras y otras cosas más y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas. (Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Juana is an entrepreneurial and hard-working woman that works in agriculture. She has various parcels of land on which she grows potatoes, wheat, vegetables, and other items like these.

She is seeking a loan in order to buy seeds.  

This loan is part of a line of credit for the Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa," which enables the members with good credit histories to receive a special loan - a small loan in addition to their regular loan.

She is thankful for the loan and promises to responsibly comply with the monthly re-payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Rosaura Angelica

texts.es:
Rosaura vive en el departamento de Lambayeque, es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde hace 10 años ha trabajado con mucho esfuerzo y empeño en su negocio de venta de ropa, con el cual ha podido salir adelante y poder solventar los gastos propios de una familia, ya que es madre de 3 hijos a quienes ha sacado adelante sola.

Rosaura esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como polos, faldas, entre otros y de esta manera poder ofrecer mayor variedad de productos y mejorar sus ingresos y de esta manera poder luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Formalizar su negocio y poder darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Rosaura lives in Lambayeque Department. She is a woman with a lot of desire to get ahead. For the past 10 years she has been working with a lot of effort and determination in her business of selling clothing. It has helped her get ahead and pay the family expenses as she is a mother of three children who she has brought up alone.

Rosaura is grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to their support she can buy merchandise for her business like polo shirts, skirts, etc. In this way can strive to achieve her main dream which is to strengthen her business and provide her children with a profession.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: María Alicia

texts.es:
María de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, esta acompañada y tiene 3 hijos, con edades de 9, 11 y 14 años, todos estudian en primaria, su compañero de vida trabaja como jornal en una cooperativa.  

María, tiene una pequeña tienda desde hace un año, la cual viene incrementando de a poquito. Ella se dedico a esta actividad debido a la falta de empleo, y su negocio le va dando buenos resultados, ademas le ayuda a las personas de la comunidad, ya que no tienen que viajar lejos a comprar a otras tiendas. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para incrementar su tienda y tener una variedad de productos que sus clientes necesitan, así sus ingresos se verán incrementados y las condiciones de su familia serán mejores

María, esta pensando trabajar y ahorrar para darle estudio a sus hijos y que se gradúen como profesionales.
texts.en:
Maria is 33 years old, she studied until the 5th grade, she is married, and she has three children that are 9, 11, and 14 years old. All of her kids attend school.  Her husband works as a day laborer in a cooperative.

For the past year, Maria has had a small store that has been growing. She started this business due to the lack of jobs in the area, and her business has been producing good results.  She helps the people in the community because now they don't need to travel far in order to buy things in other stores.

This loan from CREDICAMP is so that she can expand her store and stock a variety of products that her clients need. By doing this, her income will increase and she can improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to expand her store so that she has a variety of products that her customers need.

loans.name: Edwin Patricio

texts.es: Edwin es un joven soltero de 28 años de edad, él vive con su abuelito, su madre  que se trabaja de empleada doméstica y  sus  5 hermanos de los cuales 2 asisten a la universidad y 3 asisten al colegio, Edwin es un joven trabajador que se dedica desde hace 3 años a la crianza de chanchos y trabaja en cabinas telefónicas, con el crédito va a comprar chanchos, ya que con este negocio él puede ayudarle a su madre con los gastos diarios, Edwin aspira ampliar su negocio y salir adelante juntamente con su familia.
texts.en: Edwin is 28 years old and single. He lives with his grandfather, his mother who is a domestic worker and his 5 siblings. Two of them attend university and three go to Secondary school. Edwin is a young worker who raises pigs and works in a pay telephone business. Edwin will buy pigs with the loan as he can help his mother with the daily expenses. Edwin wants to expand his business and get ahead along with his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Adjowa

texts.fr:
Adjowa est une togolaise âgée de 32 ans. Elle a commencé son petit commerce de restauration en 2012 après avoir abandonné la vente ambulante de chaussure pour mieux s’occuper de son nouveau bébé. Actuellement elle a 2 enfants et vie avec son mari dans le quartier Cassablanca à lomé où elle vend des boules d’akassan (fabriqué à base du maïs) et du riz devant la devanture de la maison.  
Toute son activité est basée sur l’achat des produits à crédit ce qui diminue considérablement ses gains. Elle sollicite donc se prêt pour acheter 1 sac de riz et maïs et 1 bidon d’huile végétale ainsi elle fera des remboursements échelonnés sur une durée de 6 mois au lieu des dettes fournisseurs.
texts.en: Adjowa is a Togolese woman who is 32 years old. She started her small-scale restaurant in 2012 after abandoning the selling of shoes door to door to take better care of her new baby. She currently has two children and lives with her husband in the Cassablanca district in Lomé, where she sells "boules d'akassan" (made from corn) and rice in front of her house. Her whole business is based on purchasing products on credit, which reduces her gains considerably. So she is requesting this loan to purchase a sack of rice and corn and a container of vegetable oil. Thus, she will repay [the microfinance institution] in installments over six months instead of repaying debts to suppliers.

loans.use: to purchase corn, rice, and vegetables oil for her catering business

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 35 years old, married and a resident of St. Maria, Tangub City, Philippines. Her husband is a tricycle driver. They have 2 children who are both in school.  Starting with the capital of 5,000 PHP, she opened a sari-sari (general store) and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefits of the co-op. She became a member last July and has taken out three loans. 

Now she is applying for 14,000 PHP to buy additional stock for her sari-sari store, particularly basic commodities.  In the future, she wants to own a mini-mart and will be fully satisfied if she sees her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy some items for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Makou

texts.fr:
Makou a 45 ans et vit à Attiégougan avec sa famille.  Depuis 2000, elle a débuté la vente des trousseaux bébé et de vêtements pour enfants. Faute de la mévente, elle a reviré en 2008 son commerce en vendant des pagnes au grand marché de Lomé.
Mais en 2013, suite à l’incendie du grand marché, Makou a tout perdu.
Courageuse et pour contribuer au besoin de sa famille, grâce aux conseils et appui de l’équipe Assilassimé, Makou a débuté un nouveau commerce de vente des habits fripés à la criée au marché et dans les quartiers proches.
Makou sollicite un prêt pour se procurer de trois tas d’habits fripés pour augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en: Makou is 45 years old and lives in Attiégougan with her family. In 2000, she started selling baby accessories and children's clothing. Due to a drop in sales, she switched to the business of selling 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) in 2008, at the big market of Lomé. But in 2013, following the blaze at the big market, Makou lost everything. A courageous woman, she started a new business selling secondhand clothing by auction at the market and in nearby districts in order to help meet family needs, thanks to the advice and support of the Assilassimé team. Makou is requesting a loan to procure three loads of secondhand clothing to increase her revenues.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing to resell

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is 47 years old and lives in Kolambugan, Lanao Del Norte. She is married with three school age children. Evelyn has a business of a mini-grocery store. She has had this business for one year. She requested a loan to purchase stock for her mini-grocery store.  Evelyn has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future Evelyn hopes to improve her living conditions and to sustain their financial needs.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her mini-grocery store

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en:
Sheila is married with 2 children. She is 30 years old and lives in Buenavista, Philippines. Sheila is a farmer and grows corn crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. She has requested a loan to buy sacks of fertilizers and insecticides.

Sheila has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Sheila hopes to start up another business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
Melinda is married with 3 children. She is 43 years old and lives in Silongon, Tudela, Philippines. Melinda is a farmer and grows fruit and vegetable crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan to buy additional fertilizers.

Melinda has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Melinda hopes to earn more income to support their basic needs.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizers

loans.name: Chineth

texts.en:
Chineth is married with 4 children. She is 37 years old and lives in Silongon, Tudela, Philippines. 

Chineth sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 14,900 to restock her store with basic commodities. Chineth has been a member of PMPC for 3 years.  In the future, Chineth hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is 46 years old, married and a resident of Cangmangki, Enrique Villanueva, Philippines. She earns a living through direct selling.

She has been a member of PMPC for almost 1 year and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying for a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase additional wood, cement and gravel for renovating her house.

Lina deeply wishes to maintain her member in good standing status with PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase additional wood, cement and gravel.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria se dedica a la elaboración de textiles con diferentes tipos de lanas y elabora como por ejemplo chullos, mantas, chalinas y otras cosas más y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo lana de alpaca y oveja.(Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Victoria's occupation is the production of textiles with different types of wool and produces for example caps, blankets, scarves and other things.  This time she needs a loan to buy materials for her work such as wool from alpaca and sheep.

(This loan is part of a line of credit of Arariwa "Credi Yapa" Association, which allows borrowers with good credit get a special loan, a small loan in addition to their regular loan).

She appreciates and values ​​the loan and agrees to fulfill the payment of her monthly installments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to purchase work materials such as wool.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Agapita

texts.en: Agapita has been working in her sari sari store for more than four years. She was able to sustain the business and with her generated income was able to repay her previous loan used for the business successfully. She find ways to increase her income to support her children's education. Recently, she took a new to purchase additional grocery goods to sell in order to increase sales. In the future, Agapita hopes to expand her business and to live with her family with a better living and comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre soltero de 36 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en el Departamento de Suchitepequez.
Manuel es un joven emprendedor con ganas de salir adelante. Comenta que es maestro, decidió obtar por esta labor porque le gusta y además puede contribuir al desarrollo de su país a través de la enseñanza. Con la actividad que realiza puede aportar a la economía de su familia y así mejorar las condiciones de vida en que viven.
A raíz de su profesión ha adquirido bastante experiencia,  por lo que ahora ha decidido solicitar un préstamo de Q 6,000.00 para la compra de una computadora y un televisor. El préstamo lo pagara con el trabajo que actualmente tiene. 
Manuel sueña con construir su casa, para que en un futuro su familia pueda vivir en condiciones óptimas.
texts.en:
Manuel is a 36 year old single man who lives with his parents and siblings in the department of Suchitepequez.

Manuel is a young enterprising man who is striving to get ahead. He notes that he is a teacher. He decided to choose this work because he enjoys it and it also enables him to contribute to his country’s development through education. With his job, he can contribute to his family’s expenses and therefore improve living conditions. 

Based on his profession, he has acquired enough experience so that now he has decided to request a loan for Q6,000 in order to purchase a computer and a television. He will repay the loan from his current job’s salary.

Manuel dreams of building his house so that in the future his family can live in optimal conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a comupter and a television.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan, has been selling her delicious ice cream for many years. She was able to sustain their living with her income and had successfully repay her previous loan used in buying ingredient. Her children were still studying and she wants to give them a better education. Recently, she took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase additional raw ingredients to make ice cream. To offer better taste with maximum quality of her product is her priority in order to gain more costumers and with, her sales will improve too. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw ingredients to make ice cream

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es: Celestino se dedica a la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde cosecha manzana, duranzo, menbrillo y otros productos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas. (Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Celestino works in agriculture because he has various plots of land for crops where he harvests apples, peaches, quince and other produce. He has worked on this business for many years and it is going very well thanks to the persistence with which he pursues his work. For this opportunity he needs a loan to purchase seeds. (This loan is part of one of the lines of credit from the Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa" that allows borrowers with a good credit history to receive a special loan: a microloan in addition to their regular loan.) He is thankful for and values this loan and he promises to comply with the payment of his monthly installments in a responsible manner.

loans.use: to purchase seeds.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 37 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene 3 hijos de 11, 13 y 15 años, los cuales estudian quinto, séptimo y noveno grado. Él solo estudio quinto grado, ya que sus padres no le pudieron dar mas estudio, debido a la pobreza en que vivían., Don Carlos y su compañera de vida venden mariscos en varias comunidades vecinas, desde hace 2 años, aprendió el negocio ya que se le hace muy difícil encontrar un empleo formal, antes salia a vender a pie, y poco a poco se compro 2 motocicletas usadas, en una sale a vender él y en la otra sale su esposa, así recorren muchas comunidades cercanas, durante todo el día.. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar camarón, pescado y otros mariscos, para  atender con su producto a sus clientes, esto ayudara a mantener permanentes sus ingresos, para darle una mejor vida a su familia.

Carlos, sueña que sus hijos se gradúen como profesionales, para ello piensa trabajar muy duro, para ayudarlos.
texts.en:
Carlos is 37 years old. He has a partner and three children, who are 11, 13 and 15 years of age and who are in the fifth, seventh and ninth grades. He, himself, only studied until the fifth grade because his parents could not afford to pay for more education due to the poverty in which they lived. 

Don Carlos and his life companion have been selling seafood in various neighboring communities for two years. He learned the business because it has been very difficult for him to find a formal job. Formerly he sold on foot, but little by little, he bought two used motorcycles: he uses one for sales and his wife uses the other. Consequently they are able to cover many neighboring communities during the day.

The loan he is requesting from CREDICAMPO is to purchase shrimp, fish and other seafood so he can meet his customers’ needs. This will help to keep his earnings stable and provide his family with a better life.

Carlos dreams that his children will graduate as professionals and that is why he intends to work very hard, so that he can help them. .

loans.use: to purchase shrimp, fish and other seafood to provide products for his customers.

loans.name: Edwin Rene

texts.es:
Edwin René  vive en una comarca llamada san isidro  situada en la parte sur de Managua.
Trabaja en una empresa  como agente de seguridad  desde hace 4 años.
Casado con dos pequeños hijos que están en edad escolar, su esposa  se dedica la cuido de sus hijos  los únicos ingreso para el gasto  de su familia son los generados por él.
Edwin solicita a kiva un crédito para la compra de zinc y perlinez para hacerle el cambio de techo a su vivienda  ya que el zinc que tiene en este momento su casa está bien deteriorado  y considera necesario el cambio y la única manera  es haciendo una solicitud de préstamo a ceprodel para llevar a Cabo este proyecto que muy importante para bridar mejor condiciones de vida a su familia   .
texts.en:
Edwin René lives in a region called San Isidro located in the southern part of Managua.  He has been working in a company as a security officer for four years.

He is married with two small children who are of school age.  His wife takes care of their children so the only income for supporting the family is  generated by Edwin.

Edwin is asking for a Kiva loan for the purchase of galvanized sheet metal and purlins (beams) to replace the roof of his home as the sheet metal now on his home is deteriorated.  In order to make this necessary replacement, the only way is by making a request to Ceprodel for a loan to carry out this very important project thus offering better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal.

loans.name: Kevin Alexis

texts.es:
Kevin es un joven de 19 años de edad,  vive con sus padres por quienes lucha  por salir adelante y darle una mejor calidad de vida, estudia instalaciones eléctricas e edificaciones, se encuentra en el tercer ciclo de su carrera, actualmente no trabaja por que todo su tiempo se dedica a sus estudios. El préstamo  que solicito lo utiliza para los gastos de movilidad y materiales como cables, instrumentos eléctricos que le piden en la universidad. Kevin se siente contento de haber logrado el préstamo que le permite seguir con sus estudios  porque está logrando las metas que se ha trazado y agradece a EDAPROSPO y a KIVA  por la oportunidad brindada.
Kevin dice “Gracias KIVA  por la oportunidad que me das sin conocerme”
texts.en:
Kevin is a 19 year old young man who lives with his parents for whom he struggles to get ahead so that he can give them a better quality of life. He is studying electrical installations in buildings and is in his third year of course work. Currently he is not working because he is dedicating all of his time to his studies.

The loan he is requesting will be used for mobile and equipment expenses, such as cables and electrical devices that the university requires him to have. Kevin is pleased to have obtained the loan that will enable him to continue with his studies because he is achieving his goals. He is grateful to EDAPROSPO and KIVA for the opportunity they have provided.

Kevin says, “Thanks KIVA for the opportunity you are giving me without knowing me”

loans.use: to pay for equipment, such as cables and electrical devices for the university.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina se dedica  a la venta de comida en la ciudad de challambamba en uno de los mercados de la ciudad antes mencionada desde muy temprano y todos los días y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo verduras y carne. (Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Marcelina sells food in the city of Challambamba in one of the town's markets very early in the morning every day.  This time she needs a loan to purchase ingredients such as vegetables and meat.

(This loan is part of a line of credit of Arariwa "Credi Yapa" Association, which allows borrowers with good credit get a special loan, a small loan and in addition to their regular loan).

She appreciates and values the loan and agrees to fulfill the payment of her monthly installments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as vegetables and meat.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
This is Josefa, 48, resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Elpidio, a driver, and a mother to their children. Josefa, together with her husband manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Josefa operates a house rental business. It is rented in a monthly basis. She also has a taxi for additional income. She earns a minimum of 2,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) daily.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 50,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan for the repair and maintenance of her apartment.

Josefa hopes to continue expanding and dreams to give her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for the repair and maintenance of her apartment.

loans.name: Bolormaa

texts.en: Mrs. Bolormaa, 32 years old, lives with her parents and two children in Darkhan, second largest city of Mongolia. She has been working as seamstress since 2011 and accumulated lot of working experience. Using her previous loan, she has renovated her house. But last year, due to heavy snowfall and storm the roof of house damaged. So she is requesting a loan of 2000 USD to buy shingles as well as vacuum insulated windows. As spring came to Mongolia, dust and debris are prevalent in rural area so installing vacuum insulated windows shall protect against them. The borrower is very hardworking individual who strives for better future.

loans.use: to buy shingles and vacuum insulated windows

loans.name: Savina

texts.es: Savina se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para fumigar sus campos agrícolas.(Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Savina works in agriculture and raising small animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens and this time she needs a loan to fumigate her farmland. (This loan is part of a series of loans from Arariwa association “Credi Yapa”, which allows lenders with a good credit history to get a special loan: a small loan in addition to a regular loan).  She is grateful for the loan and commits to repay the monthly amounts with much responsibility.

loans.use: to fumigate her farmland.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía de tipo textiles diferentes tipos de lanas y elabora como por ejemplo chullos, mantas, chalinas y otras cosas más y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo lana de alpaca y oveja.

(Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Elena works making textile handicrafts from different types of wool, for example, woolen caps, blankets, scarves and other items. At this time she requests a loan to buy work materials like alpaca and sheep's wool. 

(This loan is part of a series of loans from Arariwa association “Credi Yapa”, which allows lenders with a good credit history to get a special loan: a small loan in addition to a regular loan).  She values and is grateful for the loan and commits to repay the monthly amounts with much responsibility.

loans.use: to buy work materials like alpaca and sheep's wool.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
This is Helen, 52, resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Juanito and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Helen operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a Php25,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Helen dreams to expand her business and hopes to give her family a good future.  She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan de 40 años de edad,  estudio solo tercer grado debido a la pobreza y que donde él vivía estuvo fuerte el conflicto de la guerra. Está casado y su esposa se dedica al cuido del hogar y le ayuda en la agricultura a él, tiene una niña y nadie más vive con ellos.

Juan es agricultor por naturaleza pues se dedica a este trabajo desde la edad de10, su papá le enseño a trabajar y está muy agradecido con su padre ya que le enseño como ganarse la vida y así, sacar a su familia adelante, además de la agricultura se dedica al cuido de unas vacas que tiene, su día comienza a las 4:00 AM ya que a esa hora se levanta a ordeñar sus vacas;  luego toma su café, para luego salir a dejar las vacas al potrero y para aprovechar mejor el tiempo se queda trabajando en la milpa regresando a su hogar a las 12:00 PM y por la tarde va a traer su ganado al  corral.

El crédito será invertido en la compra de una vaca lechera. Desea poseer  10 vacas dando leche, que su niña salga adelante y se prepare con una profesión, pagar el crédito y dejar las puertas abiertas a futuros créditos.
texts.en:
Juan is 40 years old.  He only studied through the third grade due to poverty and because he lived in a high-conflict area during the war.  He is married, and his wife works as a homemaker.  She also helps him with the farm work.  They have a daughter, and nobody else lives with their family.

Juan is a natural farmer; he has made a living in this work since he was 10 years old.  His father taught him to be a farmer.  He is very grateful to his father for this, as well as for teaching him how to take control of his life and to move his family ahead.  In addition to farming, he also makes a living raising and caring for the few cows that he owns.  

His work day begins at 4:00AM; he gets up at this hour in order to get his cows in order.  He then has his coffee and goes out to leave his cows with the caretaker.  He then takes advantage of his time and stays working in the corn fields until he returns to home around noon.  In the afternoon, he brings his livestock out to the farmyard.

The loan will be invested in the purchase of a dairy cow.  His wish is to have ten dairy cows, and for his daughter to move forward in life and have a career.  He hopes to pay back his loan and to thereby leave the door open to receive future loans.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Greco Joselito

texts.es: Joselito es un señor de 40 años de edad, él vive en la casa de sus suegros con su esposa y su hijo  de 15 años que asisten al colegio y su hijo de 17 años que asiste a la universidad, Joselito es chofer y  también cría chanchos, su esposa le ayuda en esta actividad, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos, la meta de Joselito es mejorar sus ingresos para comprar una casa propia para que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Joselito is a 40 year old man who lives in his in-laws' house with his wife and his 15 year old son who's attending high school and his 17 year old son who's attending college. Joselito is a driver and also breeds pigs. His wife helps him with that activity, and he''s going to invest the loan in purchasing pigs. Joselito's goal is to increase his income to buy a house of his own so that his children can have a higher quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase pigs.

loans.name: Tuya

texts.en: Mrs. Tuya, 42 years old, lives with her husband, son, daughter and granddaughter in Kherlen, easternmost town of Mongolia. She has been working as cook at restaurant since 2008. Her husband has disability and gets state pension. Their son studies welding at college. Also their daughter is learning Chinese and seized the opportunity to take interim in Chinese university. For this cause, she is requesting a loan of 2000000 MNT to pay the travel and accommodation costs. Interim duration is three months and after completing her daughter's knowledge will greatly increase and it will benefit in the future such as securing job.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's travel and accommodation costs

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario se dedica a la agricultura, a la ganadería y a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para fumigar sus terrenos agrícolas.
