(Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Mario is engaged in agriculture, livestock and raising small animals such as guinea pigs. At this time, he needs a loan to spray his agricultural land. 

(This loan is part of a line of credit of Arariwa "Credi Yapa" Association, which allows borrowers with good credit get a special loan, a small loan in addition to their regular loan). 

He appreciates and values the loan and agrees to comply with the payment of his monthly installments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to fumigate

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer, which will allow her to conduct research and to complete both personal and professional projects.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
FRANCISCO es una persona trabajdora y luchadora  que se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar dos ganados. 

Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La comunidad Mojopata está ubicado en distrito de la Challabamba de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: Francisco is a hard-working, striving person who works in agriculture and cattle raising and this time requires a loan to purchase two cattle. He's grateful and appreciative of the loan and pledges to make his monthly payments diligently, (The Mojopata community is located in the Challabamba district of the Paucartambo province in Cusco, Peru.)

loans.use: To purchase two cattle.

loans.name: Jose Rene

texts.es:
José, es soltero, vive con su madre y una hermana, su negocio consiste en ofrecer el servicio de moto taxi en su zona de residencia, también con esfuerzos a adquirido un vehículo para realizar viajes mucho más lejos, por el momento a no representa ningún riesgo.
El préstamo le servirá como complemento para comprar un nuevo vehículo que le permita fortalecer el negocio y hacer viajes de sus clientes en zonas que no son accesibles para la moto taxi, espera mejorar el servicio, aumentar la clientela y tener mejores ingresos.
Sueña con mantenerse trabajando para apoyar en los gastos familiares y también poder independizarse.
texts.en:
José is single. He lives with his mother and his sister. His business consists of offering moto-taxi service in his residential area. Also with some effort, he has acquired a vehicle to make longer trips. At the moment, it doesn't cause any risks
The loan will serve as a complement to the purchase of a new vehicle which will allow him to strengthen the business and take his customers to areas that are not accessible by moto-taxi. He hopes to improve his service, expand his customer base and have better earnings.
He dreams about continuing to work in order to support his family and becoming independent.

loans.use: purchase a new vehicle.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto, tiene 44 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Choloma, Cortes.
Hace 7 años don Humberto decidió establecer su propio taller de ebanistería donde elabora muebles de todo estilo como ser juegos de comedor, chineros, puertas, etc.  Este negocio lo tiene en su casa. Cuenta con varios años de experiencia la cual adquirió en una empresa privada. El préstamo que solicita es por 20,000 lempiras y los va invertir en la compra de madera de color para elaborar muebles. El considera que esta inversión le ayudara a obtener mejores ganancias ya que esta aprovechando una oferta de madera.
Su meta es colocar el taller en otro lugar para ampliarlo y poner dos empleados a trabajar.
texts.en:
Humberto is 44, married, has two children and lives in a village in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes.
7 years ago Humberto decided to start his own woodworking shop where he makes furniture of all types such as dining sets, cupboards, doors, etc.  He established his business at home.  He has several years of experience that he acquired working for a private company.  The loan he is requesting is for 20,000 HNL and he will invest them in buying colored wood to make furniture.  He thinks this investment will help him make more profit because he is taking advantage of a wood sale.  His goal is to establish a shop in a different location where he can expand and hire two employees.

loans.use: to buy colored wood to make furniture.

loans.name: Fortunato

texts.es: Fortunato es una persona que trabaja en una entidad del estado en área de administración como asistente, él pertenece al banco comunal “Sol Naciente de Mojopata” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal para pagar la matricula de sus hijos. (Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Fortunato works as an assistant in the administrative area of a government agency.  He belongs to the communal bank, “Sol Naciente de Mojopata” [Rising Sun of Mojopata]. 

On this occasion he is requesting a loan for personal use, in order to pay for his children’s tuition. (This loan is part of the credit line, “Credi Yapa” from Asociación Arariwa, which allows borrowers with a good credit history to receive a special loan. It consists of a small loan in addition to their regular loan.)

He expresses his gratitude and appreciation for the loan, and he promises to make his monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to pay for his children's tuition.

loans.name: Carlos Hilario

texts.es: HILARIO es una persona responsable y trabajadora que se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y venta de flores, él pertenece al banco comunal “Sol Naciente de Mojopata” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas. (Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Hilario is a very responsible and hardworking person.  He makes a living in farming, raising livestock, and selling flowers.  He belongs to the "Sol Naciente de Mojopata" communal bank.  At this time, he is requesting a loan to buy seeds.  (This loan is included as part of the special Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa" line of credit, which allows borrowers with a good repayment history to receive a special loan; this small loan is in addition to the regular loan).  

He is thankful for and values the loan, and he promises to responsibly pay his monthly installments.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.en:
This is Jonathan, 36, resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. He is single and he has one child who is now in Grade school. He is working hard to provide for their everyday needs.

Jonathan operates a cellphone and computer repair shop. He offers repair and check-up of all types of cell phones  and computer. His shop is located adjacent to his house. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of 400 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day. 

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting a Php10, 000 loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy spare parts and other materials needed in repairing cell phones and computers.

Jonathan dreams that his business will grow bigger and hopes to give his child a good education. He meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and other materials needed in repairing cell phones and computers.

loans.name: Vilma Cecilia

texts.es: Vilma, tiene, 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 4 hijos y reside en  una aldea del municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. Ella tiene su propio negocio de venta de golosinas como ser: refrescos, churros, pan, confites, jugos, galletas, condimentos, etc. Ha solicitado un préstamo para surtir su negocio con golosinas como refrescos, churros, galletas, confites etc. Para vender variedad de productos y mejorar las ventas. Su meta es crecer con su negocio para ayudar a sus hijos con el estudio.
texts.en:
Vilma is 35 years old and is in a civil union with her partner. They have four children and live in a community in the municipality of Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. She has her own business selling snacks like sodas, churros, bread, candy, juices, cookies, condiments, etc.

She has requested a loan to stock her business with snacks like sodas, churros, cookies, candy, etc. in order to sell a variety of products and increase her sales. Her goal is to grow her business to help her children with their studies.

loans.use: to stock her business with snacks like sodas, churros, cookies, candies, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es: Rosa tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 18 años, 8 años y 1 año de edad. Rosa es una mujer emprendedora quien se dedica a la  venta de zapatos, ropa y papelería. Tiene tres años de contar con dicho negocio por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más y demandan sus productos. Dado que desea mejorar sus ventas e ingresos ha tomado la decisión de solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la  compra de mercadería (zapatos, ropa y papelería) con el fin de abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado y mejorar sus ventas y así poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 36 years old and lives at home with her husband and three children aged 18, 8 and 1 year old. Rosa is an enterprising woman who sells shoes, clothes and paper goods. 

She has been running her business for three years and can count on many customers who choose more every day and ask for her products. 

Because she want to improve her sales and income, she has decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of merchandise (shoes, clothes and paper goods).  Her goal is to cover a larger portion of the market and improve her sales and thus improve the quality of her customers' lives and that of her family.

loans.use: To purchase shoes, clothes and paper goods for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, vegetables, beans, sugar, rice, and drinks.

loans.name: Marcial Ramón

texts.es:
El señor Marcial Ramón  vive en la cuidad de Managua  trabaja en una empresa como guarda de seguridad casado, su familia está compuesto por  sus dos pequeños hijos y su esposa.
Don Marcial solicitad un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de zinc y perlines para  cambiar el techo de su vivienda que está deteriorado por los años.
Esto lo hace con el fin de garantizarle a su familia buena comodidad para la llegada del invierno que se avecina.
texts.en: Marcial Ramón lives in the city of Managua.  He works in a company as a security guard.  He is married and his family is made up of his two small children and his wife.  Don Marcial requests a loan to invest in the purchase of zinc and roofing beams in order to change the roof of his home, which has deteriorated over the years. He wants to do this in order to ensure good comfort for his family before the winter season arrives.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anselma

texts.en:
This is Anselma, 30, resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. Her partner is Michael and they have child. She and her partner manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Anselma operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a Php10,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Anselma hopes to expand her business and dreams to have a better living.  She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
Mariée et mère de 2 enfants, Adjo est âgée de 26 ans et  habite dans le quartier de Bè.                        Elle a débuté  en 2009 le commerce ambulant des habits pour enfants et en 2013 elle complète l’activité avec la vente des produits d’alimentation.
Elle s’approvisionne 2 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et consacre à son activité 10heures de travail par jours.                                                                                                         Afin de répondre aux besoins de ses clients et surtout augmenter ses revenus, elle sollicite un prêt pour acheter 8 tas d’habits pour nouveaux bébés et 15 tas d’habits pour enfants.
texts.en: A married mother of two, Adjo is 26 years old and lives in the Bè district. In 2009, she started a business hawking children's clothing. In 2013, she rounded out her business with sales of grocery items. She gets her supplies twice a month at the big market of Lomé and dedicates ten hours of work to her business every day. To respond to the needs of her customer and especially to increase her revenues, she is requesting a loan to purchase 8 loads of clothing for newborns and 15 loads of clothing for children.

loans.use: to purchase 23 loads of used clothing

loans.name: Laureano

texts.es:
Laureano vive en la ciudad de Imperial, es un hombre muy carismático y sobre todo luchador, vive el lado de su esposa y sus 2 hijos, a quienes quiere mucho y a pesar de las adversidades se esfuerza para poder darle una vida digna y tenga mejores oportunidades de las que Laureano Tuvo. Laureano trabaja como vigilante en una pequeña empresa de su ciudad y también  desde hace 4 años tiene su pequeña  bodega, la cual es atendida por su esposa y en la cual vende productos como abarrotes, verduras, bebidas gaseosas, entre otros y de esta manera ha podido ganarse la vida de manera honrada ya que su pequeña bodega le brinda los ingresos para solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Laureano está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales para construir una habitación en su vivienda y un lavadero; de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” convertir su pequeña bodega en un minimarket y terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en: Laureano lives in the city of Imperial.  He is a very charismatic man and above all, he is a fighter.  He lives with his wife and his two children, who he loves very much and in spite of their adversity, he works his hardest to be able to give them a decent life and have better opportunities than what Laureano had.  Laureano works as a security watchmen in a small business in his hometown and also, for the last four years, he has a small bodega, which is attended to by his wife and where she sells products such as groceries, vegetables, soft drinks, among others.  As a result of these activities, he has been able to earn an honest living now that his small bodega brings in income to cover the costs of his home.  Laureano is appreciative of the Kiva lenders and it is thanks to the help they have offered that he will be able to buy materials to build a room in his home and a laundry area.  As a result, he will be able to improve their quality of life and continue working hard to be able to accomplish his dream: to convert his small bodega into a mini market and to finish building his home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Novimon

texts.fr:
Novimon est une veuve avec  4 enfants à sa charge. Elle est âgée de 37 ans et habite le quartier d’ Attiégou.                                                                                                                                                            En 2010 elle a débuté son activité avec le commerce des produits d’alimentations générale et  peu après avec les chaussures hommes et dames, dans une boutique non loin de son domicile. 
Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Très accueillante et vu sa clientèle qui ne cesse de s’accroitre elle sollicite un crédit pour pouvoir arriver à satisfaire les besoins de ses  clients. Avec ce crédit, elle aimerait acheter 3 douzaines de chaussures pour homme, 2 douzaines de chaussures pour femmes est  3 douzaines pour enfant.
texts.en: Novimon is a widow and has four children to support. She is 37 years old and lives in the Attiégou district. In 2010, she started working in the commerce of grocery items and, soon afterward, shoes for men and women, in a shop near her home. She gets her supplies from the big market of Lomé. A very accommodating woman, she is requesting a loan to be able to meet the needs of her customer base, given that it is every-increasing. With this loan, she would like to purchase 3 dozen men's shoes, 2 dozen women's shoes, and 3 dozen for children.

loans.use: to purchase shoes for her shop

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio vive en la ciudad de Huaraz, distrito de independencia;  desde hace 14 años se dedica a su negocio de carpintería, este pequeño negocio es su única fuente de ingresos para poder salir adelante y poder solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Antonio está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar madera, clavos, cola, entre otros materiales necesarios para poder seguir realizando su trabajo y poder atender el pedido de sus clientes; de esta manera podrá seguir trabajando y esforzándose para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Antonio lives in the city of Huaraz, in the district of Independencia. He has worked in his carpentry business for 14 years. This little business is his only source of income to be able to get ahead and to pay his household expenses.

Antonio is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support, he will be able to buy wood, nails, and glue, among other materials necessary to be able to continue doing his work and attending to the orders of his customers. In this way he will be able to continue working and striving to be able to make a reality of his great dream: to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy materials such as wood and nails, among other items.

loans.name: Viwassi

texts.fr:
VIWASSI a 30 ans. Il est très dynamique et vend les produits cosmétiques et les produits d’entretien  grâce au peu de moyen dont il dispose. il a commencé par mener cette activité depuis 2011. Ses produits sont appréciés et beaucoup en témoigne de la qualité de ses produits. Il s’approvisionne une fois par mois dans le grand marché de Lomé et vend tous les jours de la semaine.
Avec la volonté de satisfaire ses clients et d’atteindre un nombre important de personnes, il sollicite un prêt. Ce micro crédit lui servira à acheter 01 carton de tea Zingzing, 01 douzaine de vergétue, et  01 carton de savon liquide ANNISSI.
texts.en: VIWASSI is 30 years old. A very energetic man, he sells cosmetic and grooming products with the little money he has. He started this business in 2011. His products are appreciated, and many people bear witness to their quality. He gets his supplies once a month at the big market of Lomé, and he sells his goods every day of the week. With the desire to satisfy his customers and to reach a significant number of people, he is requesting a loan. This micro-loan will be used to purchase a box of tea Zingzing, a dozen 'vergétue', and a box of ANNISSI liquid soap.

loans.use: to purchase liquid soap and accessories

loans.name: Buena Fe De Tunajá 1 Group

texts.es:
La señora Pabla es madre soltera. Tiene 20 años de edad. De escolaridad primaria completa. Tiene 2 hijos que no estan estudiando. Se dedica a la crianza de ganado porcino. Inició este negocio con un capital pequeño ya que tenia la necesidad de sacar a sus hijos adelante y a la fecha tiene 12 años de experiencia. 

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de cerditos y concentrado para ellos. Desea en el futuro poder contar con un mayor capital y tener una grnaja grande.

Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales de corral y a la tejeduría.

En la Fotografá solamente aparecen 9 personas puesto que dos de ellas no pudieron asistir cuando se tomo la foto. El total del grupo lo integran 11 personas.
texts.en:
Señora Pabla is a single mother. She is 20 years old and completed primary school. She has two children who are not in school. She raises pigs. She began this business with a little bit of capital since she needed to raise her children, and at this date she has 12 years of experience.

She is organizing a group and is applying for a loan that she will use to purchase piglets and concentrated feed for them. In the future she wants to be able to have more capital and have a big farm.

The other members of the group raise barnyard animals and do weaving.

In the photograph only 9 people appear, since 2 of them were not able to attend when the photo was taken. In total, the group has 11 people.

loans.use: to buy piglets

loans.name: Gianella Mehilin

texts.es: Gianella es una joven laboratorista estudia prótesis dental  ya que cuenta con familiares en la misma rama y en un futuro poder asociarse y crecer en ese rubro, ya termina su carrera le toca lo más complicado que es sacar su titulo para el cual está utilizando el préstamo que le está otorgando EDAPROSPO, ella sabe que el obstáculo más difícil que ha tenido en la vida es el medio económico, Gianella  sueña terminar pronto su carrera y alcanzar su meta que es poner su propio consultorio  y ser la mejor en ese rubro, Gianella se siente feliz de saber que personas de todo el mundo la ayudan a salir adelante y agradece a KIVA por la ayuda y aprovecha para decirles que sigan ayudando a estudiantes como ella a cumplir sus metas. Muchas Bendiciones KIVA.
texts.en:
Gianella is a young lab technician who is studying dental prostheses as she has family members who are in the same field. In the future she will be able to enter into this field and grow. She already finished her courses but now she is confronted with the most complicated part, which is getting her degree. This is why she is using this loan that EDAPROSPO has offered her. She knows that the most difficult obstacle that she has had in life has been financial.

Gianella dreams of finishing her degree soon and achieving her goal of setting up her own consultation while being the best in her field. Gianella is feels happy to know that people around the world are helping her to get ahead. She is grateful to Kiva for the help and wants to take this opportunity to ask you to continue helping students like her to achieve their goals. Many blessings, Kiva.

loans.use: to get her degree.

loans.name: 08-01-11-Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Diện operates a food stall/restaurant selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetable to resell. She is 36 years old and married with four children. Diện is the group leader of the 08-01-11-Phú Sơn 2 solidarity group, which consists of five members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with four dependents

In 2013, Diện joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Diện has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Diện faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Diện hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Adiatou

texts.fr:
Adiatou est couturière et exerce cette activité depuis 2 ans. Personne en situation de handicap, adiatou est sourde depuis son enfance. Malgré sa situation, elle se bat pour subvenir à ses besoins par la vente des sacs et trousses qu’elle fabrique avec  les pagnes pour  revendre dans  son église.
Avec le crédit qu’elle sollicite pour augmenter  la quantité de production de ses sacs et trousses étant donné que la demande devient sans cesse croissante, elle achètera 04 pièces de pagnes. Pour confectionner ses trousses et sacs, adiatou se rend une fois par mois pour  s’approvisionner.
texts.en: Adiatou is a seamstress and has been in this work for two years. A disabled individual, Adiatou has been deaf since childhood. Despite her situation, she struggles to support herself by selling bags, kits, and cases that she makes using 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) for resale at her church. With the loan she is requesting, she will purchase 4 lengths of 'pagne' cloth to improve the production quality of her bags and other products, since the demand is ever-increasing. To make her products, Adiatou goes and gets supplies once a month.

loans.use: to purchase 4 lengths of 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Mariano Mercedes

texts.es: Mariano se dedica a la construcción de casas y en sus horas libres se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes. (Este préstamo es parte de una de las linea de créditos de la Asociación Arariwa "Credi Yapa", que permite a los prestatarios con un buen historial crediticio recibir un especial préstamo: un pequeño préstamo y además de su préstamo regular.) Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Mariano works in home construction and during his free time, he raises small animals such as guinea pigs.  On this occasion he requests a loan in order to buy guinea pigs.  (This loan is part of one of the lines of credit of the Arariwa "Credi Yapa" Association, which allows borrowers with a good credit history to receive a special loan: a small loan in addition to their regular loan).  He appreciates and values the loan and agrees to be fully responsible in his repayment of his monthly installments.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs.

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Julio Alberto vive en el municipio de Ticuantepe  trabaja como operario en una empresa de vigilancia 
Casado  tiene  a su cargo su esposa y sus hijos los cuales tres de ellos están en edad escolar.
Don julio está  solicitando un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de zinc y perlines para cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que el que tiene en estos momentos está deteriorado por los años de uso  y en el tiempo de lluvia se le pasa el agua.
Es por esta razón que le pide a los socios de kiva ese refinanciamiento ya que es la única manera de poder llevar a cabo las mejoras de su vivienda  y mejorar las condiciones de vida para el y su familia
texts.en:
Julio Alberto lives in the city of Ticuantepe. He works as an operator at a security company.
He is married and he lives with his wife and children. Three children are school-age. 
Don Julia is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of zinc and purlins in order to change the roof of his home. At this time, it is deteriorating due to years of use and during the rainy season, water passes through. 
This is the reason he is asking the Kiva members for this refinancing. This is the only way he can make the improvements to his home and improve the living conditions for himself and his family.

loans.use: buy construction materials.

loans.name: 06.14.01 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Vân has a service business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase cloth for sewing clothes. Vân is 35 years old and married with two children. She is the group leader of the 06.14.01 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents

In 2011, Vân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women and has been involved in this business for four years. The main hardship that Vân faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Vân hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase cloth for sewing clothes.

loans.name: 05.08.02 Điện Biên Group

texts.en:
Phượng has a service business providing housing rentals. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. 

Phượng is 33 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa Province.

Phượng is the group leader of the 05.08.02 Điện Biên solidarity group, which consists of 3 members.

In 2009, Phượng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Phượng has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to build a small house for renting.

With her business profit, Phượng hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase materials to build a small house for renting.

loans.name: Dédé

texts.fr:
Dédé est mariée et a deux enfants. Elle habite le quartier Attiégougan .
Auparavant en 1998, Dédé vendait des glacières et thermos qu’elle s’en procurait au Nigéria.  Elle n’a pas pu continuer ses activités suite à une maladie et elle a utilisé ses fonds pour une opération chirurgicale. 
En 2010, elle a commencé un nouveau commerce de bois de chauffe, maïs et habits fripés au marché Akodessewa. Dédé s’approvisionne 04 fois par mois auprès des agriculteurs à Anié et chez les grossistes au marché de Hedzranawoé. Grâce aux formations d’Assilassimé, Dédé suit de près son stock afin de répondre au besoin de ses clients.
Ce micro crédit permettra à Dédé d’acheter deux sac de maïs  et 02 ballots de vêtements fripés pour augmenter son stock et de réduire des coûts de transport.
texts.en:
Dédé is married and has two children. She lives in the Attiégougan district. In 1998, she used to sell insulated containers and thermos that she procured in Nigeria. She was not able to continue her business due to an illness. She used her funds for medical treatment. In 2010, Dédé started a new business selling firewood, corn, and secondhand clothing at the Akodessewa market. She gets her supplies four times a month from farmers in Anié and from wholesalers at the Hedzranawoé market. Thanks to training from Assilassimé, she closely monitors her inventory in order to respond to customer needs. 

This micro-loan will enable Dédé to purchase 2 sacks of corn and 2 bales of used clothing to increase her inventory and to reduce her transportation costs.

loans.use: to purchase 2 bales of secondhand clothing and 2 sacks of corn

loans.name: 02170101001Cẩm Vinh - Hoằng Tân Group

texts.en:
Chung is 38 years old and she is married with one child. She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Chung works in agriculture, raising cattle. She has been involved in this business for six years. The main hardship that Chung faces in her business is lack of capital.

Chung is the group leader of the 02170101001Cẩm Vinh - Hoằng Tân  solidarity group, which consists of four members. This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby cattle to raise and resell in the future.

With her business profit, Chung hopes to make enough money to provide for her child, to buy a motorbike, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase baby cattle to raise and resell

loans.name: 06.10.01 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hòa has a service business shipping goods. She is requesting a loan to purchase a lorry taxi for shipping goods. Hòa is 37 years old and married with two children. Hòa is the group leader of the 06.10.01 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents

In 2011, Hòa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hòa has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Hòa faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hòa hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase a lorry taxi to ship goods.

loans.name: 04-01-02-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lan operates a food stall/restaurant selling bread. She is requesting a loan to purchase bread to resell. Lan is 57 years old and married with three children. She is the group leader of the 04-01-02-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Lan joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Lan has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Lan has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Lan faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Lan hopes for her children to find a good job, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase bread to resell

loans.name: Amivi

texts.fr:
Agée de 39 ans, Amivi est mariée et a trois enfants. Elle habite le quartier Attiegou.
Elle a commencé en 2009 la restauration des ignames et des boules d’Akassa dans une école près de sa maison. Amivi est accueillante et chaleureuse. Les enfants l’adorent et les fidélisent grâce à ses petits cadeaux. Elle consacre à son activité plus de cinq heures de tps par jour et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois.
Afin d’augmenter son stock et son chiffre d’affaire, elle sollicite un micro crédit pour acheter 15 tubercules d’igname, 02 cartons de spaghetti, 01 sac de maïs et 01 bidon d’huile.
texts.en: Amivi  is 39 years old and married, and she has three children. She lives in the Attiegou district. In 2009, she started selling cooked yams and "boules d'Akass" [made from cornmeal] at a school near her house. Amivi is accommodating and welcoming. The children love her. And she earns their loyalty with small gifts. She dedicates over five hours of time to her business each day. She gets her supplies twice a month. To increase her inventory and her sales, she is requesting a micro-loan to purchase 15 yam tubers, 2 boxes of spaghetti, a sack of corn, and a container of oil.

loans.use: to purchase 15 yam tubers and other ingredients for her catering business.

loans.name: José Roberto

texts.es:
José de 33 años de edad,  esta casado, tiene una hija de 6 años, que estudia en kinder. José se graduó de bachiller general. Pero sus padres ya no pudieron darle el estudio en una universidad, por lo que se le hace difícil encontrar un empleo formal, se dedica a las labores agrícolas en la cooperativa donde vive.    


José  tiene 10 años de estar trabajando como jornal en los cañales de la cooperativa donde vive, ahí trabaja todos los días de las 8 de la mañana, hasta las 12 meridiano, camina cortas distancias para desplazarce.


El prestamo que esta soliictando  a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar un molino de nixtamal, con el cual dará servicio de moler el maíz que las señoras de la comunidad ocupan para hacer las tortillas, esto ayudara mucho ya que los ingresos diarios que obtendrá, servirán para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

José  planea trabajar duro, para ahorrar y ampliar y hacer muy bonita su casa..
texts.en:
José is 33 years old. He is married and has a daughter who is 6 years old and goes to kindergarten. José graduated from high school, but his parents were not able to send him to the university, which makes it difficult for him to find formal employment. He does agricultural work in the cooperative where he lives.

José has been working for 10 years as a day laborer in the sugar cane fields of the cooperative where he lives. He works there every day from 8 in the morning until noon. He walks a short distance to get there.

The loan that he has applied for from CrediCampo is to buy a mill for nixtamal (corn), with which he will provide the service of grinding corn, which the women of the community use to make tortillas. This will help a lot, since the daily income that he will obtain will serve to improve the quality of life of his family.

José plans to work hard, to save, and to enlarge his house and make it very nice.

loans.use: to buy a nixtamal (corn) mill

loans.name: Amele

texts.fr:
Amélé est une veuve âgée de 42 ans et habite le quartier de kélégougan. Elle a 3 enfants à sa charge. Dans le souci de construire l’avenir de ses enfants, elle s’est lancée depuis 2012 à la vente de la bouillie et des gâteaux. Elle s’approvisionne dans la boutique dogato à Kégué. 
Afin de palier l’insuffisance de bouillie due au moyen financier très limité, elle sollicite un micro crédit pour satisfaire au besoin de ses clients. Avec cette somme elle va acheter 1 sac de mais et 1 sac de sucre.
texts.en: Amélé is a 42-year-old widow and lives in the Kélégougan district. She has three children to support. Concerned about build a future for her children, she got started selling porridge and cakes in 2012. She gets her supplies from [Boutique do Gato] in Kégué. To alleviate the shortage of porridge due to very limited financial means, she is requesting a micro-loan to meet customer needs. With the funds, she is going to purchase a sack of corn and a bag of sugar.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn

loans.name: Bảo

texts.en:
Bảo is 59 years old and she is married with two children. She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. She operates a food stall selling fish. Bảo has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Bảo faces in her life is not having a clean water system and hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.


This is Bảo's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. In the future, Bảo hopes for her business to do well, to build a new house, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Sáu

texts.en:
Sáu is 53 years old and she is married with three children. She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Sáu operates a fishing business. She has been involved in this business for five years.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a clean water system and hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet. This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With her business profit, Sáu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain  a successful business, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Nga is 27 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives with two dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Nga operates a fishing business. She has been involved in this business for four years. In 2012, Nga joined Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women to improve her business. Nga has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Poor Women. With her business profit, Nga hopes to build a new house, remodel her house and for her children to find a good job.

The main hardship that Nga faces in her life is not having a clean water system and a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Louelyn

texts.en:
Louelyn is 30 years old and lives in Manga Tangub City Misamis Occidental. She is single and has three children. 

Louelyn has a Sari-sari store which is a general store. She has had this business for 2 years. She requested a loan for additional capital for her sari-sari store.

Louelyn has been a member of PMPC for 5 months.  In the future, Louelyn hopes to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods for her business

loans.name: Thắng

texts.en:
Thắng is 34 years old and she is married with two children. She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Thắng operates a fishing business. She has been involved in this business for seven years.

In 2014, Thắng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Thắng has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Thắng faces in her life is not having a clean water syterm and hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business, Thắng hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids and to maintain a successful business, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Wotsa

texts.fr:
Wotsa  âgée de 37 est mariée et mère de 4 enfants.  Elle vit dans le quartier de Bè.

Elle débute  en 1998 le commerce de produits d’alimentation générale, de tubercules d’ignames et   de maïs.
Wotsa est une bénéficiaire qui se bât  beaucoup en exerçant seul son commerce chez elle a son domicile. Elle s’approvisionne 3 fois par mois aussi on lui fait la livraison de ses marchandises à domicile. Voyant de jour au jour l’accroissement de sa clientèle, elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter une calebasse d’igname et 42 bols de maïs.
texts.en: Wotsa, aged 37, is a married mother of four. She lives in the Bè district. In 1998, she started a business selling grocery items, yam tubers, and corn. Wotsa is a beneficiary who really struggles working alone at home. She gets her supplies three times a month and also has goods delivered to her house. Seeing her customer base grow day to day, she is requesting this loan to purchase a calabash of yams and 42 bowls of corn.

loans.use: to purchase 42 bowls of corn

loans.name: Rem's Group

texts.en:
Age 40, Rem is married and lives with her family in a rural area located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She is a mother of four children. She earns a living through farming rice which she has been in for 15 years while her husband is a paid worker to help support the family. 

This is the fourth loan for Rem with VisionFund. Rem is now leading her group to ask for another loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of Battambang province; Pov is 58 years old and married. To endure her family's hardship, she does rice farming as the main source of income on two-hectares of farmland. She also earns extra income via a paid-working job for a fee. This business has earned her 30,000 KHR per day and she has involved in it for 37 years. 

She is the first cycle client with VisionFund. She has completely paid back a previous loan and it has enabled her to improve her living conditions. She is leading her group to seek a loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for plowing costs for her farmland. She strongly hopes to gain more yields than before to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for plowing costs for her farmland.

loans.name: Tiếu

texts.en:
Tiếu is 60 years old, and she is married with four children; three of them are grown up. Tiếu lives with one dependent in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Tiếu has a retail business selling medication. Tiếu has been involved in this business for more than ten years. In 2005, Tiếu joined Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women to improve her business. Tiếu has successfully repaid eight loans from Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. With her business profit, Tiếu hopes to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a latrine, so her family shares the neighbor's latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.
